NK103(pe)022:1: // rgyud ye shes gsang ba bzhugs so //
NK103(pe)022:3: dz+ny+aa na gu h+ya n+aa ma tan tra /
NK103(pe)022:5: ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
NK103(pe)022:6: ye shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin dang mtshid dang rnam
NK103(pe)022:7: pa gsum ma rtogs pas gsang ba de rgyal ba
NK103(pe)022:8: kun gyi thugs kyi bcud chos thams cad kyi rang
NK103(pe)022:10: e gnas 'di don dgongs pa tshangs pa'i skad 'khor
NK103(pe)022:11: la bshad ma de bstan pa'i dus matha'i skad gcig
NK103(pe)022:12: gi tshe na // ye shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin /
NK103(pe)022:13: ngo bo chos thams cad rten pa'i gnas /
NK103(pe)022:14: chos nyid che ba rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i kyi mkha' klong la spros pa'i /
NK103(pe)022:15: mtha' mtshid dang de la ltos pa'i dbus med pa'i
NK103(pe)022:16: rtog pa blos gzhal ba las yas ngo bo khang
NK103(pe)022:17: pa'i pa na // mnyam pa'i klong du 'khrul pa
NK103(pe)022:18: rang sar grol bas bcom sku gsum lhun grub tu
NK103(pe)022:19: mu matha'i phyogs ris las 'das 'khor 'das lhag ma
NK103(pe)022:20: med par rdzogs pa che ba lngas khyad par du
NK103(pe)022:21: gyur pas chen po ngo bo nyid kyi rtag par
NK103(pe)022:22: pa'i pa na // bzhugs so // bcos slad med pa rang bzhin gyi gzhi 'khor dang /
NK103(pe)022:23: rang bzhin la mthong tshul tha dad du lta ba'i rim pa 'khor dang /
NK103(pe)022:24: rang bzhin ji lta bar rtogs pa'i mngon du gyur pa /
NK103(pe)022:25: 'bras bus 'khor dang gsum la 'di lta ste //
NK103(pe)022:26: sra ba sa dang rlan pa chu dang dro ba
NK103(pe)022:27: me dang bskyod pa rlung dang mi sgrib pa nam
NK103(pe)022:28: mkha' dang snang srid 'khor 'das rgyu 'bras kyi snang
NK103(pe)022:30: yongs su rgyu 'bras can thams cad 'du rnal 'byor zhes bya ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:31: rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub can chen po zhes bya ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:32: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor blang dor can zhes bya ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:33: de dag las grol ba yo ga bzhir theg pa kun gyi bsdu ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:34: shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba dang //
NK103(pe)022:35: sngar 'das mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK103(pe)022:36: rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang sems can 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK103(pe)022:37: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas zhing tha dad na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:38: ston 'khor gnas gsum so sor 'byed pa mi mnga'
NK103(pe)022:39: ba'i rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i thugs rjes thabs gcig
NK103(pe)022:40: tu gnas bya gnas byed las grol bar bzhugs so
NK103(pe)022:41: // gleng gzhi 'tshogs pa de nas lha'i dbang pos
NK103(pe)022:42: sprul pa brgya byin gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ye
NK103(pe)022:43: shes can ma lus pa thams cad la sems lhag
NK103(pe)022:44: can gyi don du tshig 'di skad ces gnang nas
NK103(pe)022:45: // bskul lo // gsung lnga'am gsum dag gi mnga'
NK103(pe)022:46: snyems pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas ma thams cad kyis
NK103(pe)022:47: // bskul lo // / rtsol ba'i dang bcas pa theg pa brgyad po mthar bton par gsungs nas //
NK103(pe)022:48: rtsol med mthar thug gi theg pa mi gsung ba de khyed kyi //
NK103(pe)022:49: thugs rje chen po mi mnga' bar yal lam ci yin des na /
NK103(pe)022:50: a ti'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i gdul bya sems lhag can mchis pas na //
NK103(pe)022:51: rtsol med lhun gyi grub pa'i theg pa rdzogs pa chen po gsung du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:53: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa
NK103(pe)022:54: chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la thugs rje ye shes
NK103(pe)022:55: kyi nyi ma shar nas bka'i 'gro ba'i gsung mthun
NK103(pe)022:57: gang la gsungs na rgyal tshab rdo rje sems dpa'
NK103(pe)022:58: la gsungs ji ltar gsungs na 'og gi 'di skad
NK103(pe)022:59: ces bskul ba'i tshig gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:60: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'byed pa mi mnga' bas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas gang gsungs na /
NK103(pe)022:61: ma lus pa thams cad kyi gzhan don mdzad pa'i /
NK103(pe)022:62: thugs rje'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' khyod yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:63: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab par khyod shar ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:64: gsung gi mnga' bdag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK103(pe)022:65: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin khyod yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:66: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su khyod kyi dgongs pa la gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:67: lhag ma ma lus pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
NK103(pe)022:68: gzhi rten du gyur pa'i sku yi ngo bor rdo rje sems dpa' de ldan pas //
NK103(pe)022:69: chos sku rmad du byung ba'i rol pa mi 'gag
NK103(pe)022:70: pa'i sku ru bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar ba'o
NK103(pe)022:71: // gsung gi mnga' bdag thams cad kyi //
NK103(pe)022:72: go brda' sprod pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid khyod yin
NK103(pe)022:73: pas ma brjod kyang don dang phrad pas rig pa'i
NK103(pe)022:74: gsung brjod pa dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)022:75: rmad du byung rol pa'i cir yang 'char ba gsung
NK103(pe)022:76: sems kyis zin ma zin gnyis ka las byung ba'i
NK103(pe)022:78: tshig gcig gis rtogs pa'i don la theg pa kun
NK103(pe)022:79: gyi lam 'bras kyi don ma lus pa rdzogs pa'i
NK103(pe)022:80: thabs kyi bdag nyid de lta bu'o //
NK103(pe)022:81: rin chen 'phrul tshig gyi snying po'i sgo dang //
NK103(pe)022:82: gdul bya skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la bstan du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:83: ming la mi zad par 'byung bas /
NK103(pe)022:84: rin chen 'phrul gyi thabs te che mang mkhas pa'i thabs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pas //
NK103(pe)022:85: gdul bya rang rang gi gang 'dod pa so so
NK103(pe)022:86: dang mthun pa'i thabs sna tshogs pa'i sgo de nas
NK103(pe)022:87: // rtsol ba'i chu bo nyer bzhi med pa'i dbyig
NK103(pe)022:88: rang bzhin gnyug ma'i don dang rtogs shing nyams su
NK103(pe)022:90: brjod bya byang rang bzhin chub rnam pa sems mtshan nyid kyi dngos po la phyogs ris med pa //
NK103(pe)022:91: ngag tu brjod pa'i tha snyad ma lus pa kun dang bral yang //
NK103(pe)022:92: don de nyid ma rtogs pa'i blo la rjod byed kyi tshig gi lam gyi sgo nas //
NK103(pe)022:93: khyed kyi gsung tshig gi sgron mas don gsal bar rtogs par gyis //
NK103(pe)022:94: zhes pa'i bskul tshig gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:95: de ma thag pa de nas longs sku rdo rje
NK103(pe)022:96: sems dpas thugs rje sprul pa'i phyag g.yas pa na
NK103(pe)022:97: rdo rje rtse lnga can rang bzhin mngon du mdzad
NK103(pe)022:98: pa'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyungs nas /
NK103(pe)022:99: mkhyen pas bdud 'joms rgyun du gcod //
NK103(pe)022:100: rab 'bar rtsal gyis bstan pa sgrogs //
NK103(pe)022:102: rin po che las grub pa 'od zer rang 'bar gyi 'khor lo lag tu gtad nas /
NK103(pe)022:103: bskul ba'i tshig 'di skad ces gsang bdag la gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:104: sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis su med par rang
NK103(pe)022:105: bzhin ye shes gsang ba'i don rang byung gi de
NK103(pe)022:106: kho na nyid de la thob par /
NK103(pe)022:107: bya rgyu med pas lam gyis mi rtsol bar ye nas sangs rgyas //
NK103(pe)022:108: mtha' dbus kyi mtshan ma rang sar grol ba'i dbu
NK103(pe)022:109: ma chen po ldem dgongs min pas drang po'i nges
NK103(pe)022:110: pa lam // de nyid 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la bstan par gyis //
NK103(pe)022:112: de nas gnod 'dul gsang ba'i mnga' bdag sems dpa'
NK103(pe)022:113: rdo rjes rdo rje sems dpal la 'di skad ces
NK103(pe)022:114: zhus so // mi phyed pas rdo rje rang gsal
NK103(pe)022:115: mi 'gyur bas sems dpa' kun la khyab pas nam
NK103(pe)022:116: mkha' la rgya chad phyogs lhung med pas che //
NK103(pe)022:117: tshig mtha' can gi brjod pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na //
NK103(pe)022:118: gsang bdag bdag gis tshig tu bgro bar shin tu dka' yang /
NK103(pe)022:119: don ma rtogs pa'i gang zag dbang po chig chod
NK103(pe)022:120: dam sbyangs pa'i 'phro can la tshig tu brjod pa'i
NK103(pe)022:121: sgo nas // brda' yis don de mtshon nas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir du /
NK103(pe)022:122: don dang 'tshams shing ci rigs par ni rnam par bgro /
NK103(pe)022:123: zhes bgro bar zhal gyis bzhed pa'i tshig gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:124: de nas ra chod bsal ba'i phyir du sems dpa' rdo rjes //
NK103(pe)022:125: tshig la brten nas don shar ba'i phyogs rang sems
NK103(pe)022:126: skye med rtogs pas rdo rje des rang bzhin dang
NK103(pe)022:127: ched du byas pa dang ltos pa'i rtog pa rnam
NK103(pe)022:128: par gnon pa'i thams cad du khyab pa'i zhing khams
NK103(pe)022:129: na // rang bzhin ji lta ba de bzhin du
NK103(pe)022:130: mngon du gyur pas gshegs pa rdo rje shes pa
NK103(pe)022:131: gsum dang ldan pas ma rtogs pas gsang ba zhes
NK103(pe)022:132: na // bya ba // ston pa dang rang bzhin
NK103(pe)022:133: gnyis su mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang bcas nas bzhugs
NK103(pe)022:134: pa la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:135: sems nyid la skad cig gi skye 'gag med pas rdo rje lta bur mi 'gyur la //
NK103(pe)022:136: skye ba dang 'gag par snang zhing 'byung ba'i don ji ltar lags //
NK103(pe)022:137: zhes zhu ba'i tshig gsol ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:138: de bzhin gshegs pa sems nyid la phyin ci log
NK103(pe)022:139: gi spang bya mi dmigs pas yang dag pa de
NK103(pe)022:140: la 'bras bu lus pa med par rdzogs pa'i lta
NK103(pe)022:141: ngan dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis khyab pas sangs
NK103(pe)022:142: rgyas rdo rje gsang bas bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:143: sems kyi chos nyid dus gsum du cis kyang mi 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu de la //
NK103(pe)022:144: rgyu las skye ba dang rkyen dang gnyen pos 'gag pa ni gshis la yod pa ma yin kyang //
NK103(pe)022:145: sgro btags kyi rnam par rtog pa khams gsum gyi
NK103(pe)022:146: sems dang sems byung gi blo la skye 'gag tu
NK103(pe)022:148: mi rtog pa'i dgongs pa zhes gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:149: de nas yon tan rang las byung ba'i lho phyogs
NK103(pe)022:150: kyi lo ka'i sgras 'jig pa'i chos dang ldan pas
NK103(pe)022:151: 'jig rten gyi khams ni rigs kyi don te snod
NK103(pe)022:152: gtso bor byas pa sems nyid nor bu rin po
NK103(pe)022:153: che la ji ltar bltas pa ltar snang ba zhes
NK103(pe)022:154: bya ba na / de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog
NK103(pe)022:155: la re ba skong bas rin po che ma bgrod
NK103(pe)022:156: par son pas zhabs zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)022:157: rin po che rang 'bar gyi 'od kyis snang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:158: ra byed pa khri la mi 'gyur bar bzhugs te
NK103(pe)022:159: / nyid kyi lhan cig pa'i 'khor la smra med
NK103(pe)022:160: cing spyod yul dang bral bas gsang yon tan gyi
NK103(pe)022:161: 'byung gnas su sngags kyi ma nor bas de kho
NK103(pe)022:162: na nyid dgongs par brda'i sgo nas ston cing bzhugs
NK103(pe)022:163: / pa la / sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:164: byang chub kyi sems lhun grub gsum kyi ngo bo
NK103(pe)022:165: rgyal bas ma mdzad 'gro bas ma bcos pa'i rang
NK103(pe)022:167: bde bshegs snying po'i rgyu la tshogs gnyis kyi rkyen
NK103(pe)022:168: dang gang zag gi rtsol bas ched du ma bsgrubs
NK103(pe)022:169: par // gnas skabs mthar thug yon tan dang 'bras bus sangs rgyas dgongs pa ji ltar 'char //
NK103(pe)022:171: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zhabs kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK103(pe)022:172: dag sha ka klu 'jog po yi gtsug gi rgyan
NK103(pe)022:173: la ye nas dgos pa lhun gyis grub pa bzhin
NK103(pe)022:174: du / rgyu 'bras dbyer med pas lam mthar phyin
NK103(pe)022:175: pa'i 'bras bu gzhi nas lhun grub tu rdzogs pas
NK103(pe)022:176: du / / yon tan thams cad gzhan las mi
NK103(pe)022:177: thob pas rang byung shes sgrub kyi bcud 'dus pas
NK103(pe)022:178: snying po'i 'du ma byas pas mchog tu gyur pa
NK103(pe)022:180: gsang ba'i spyi blugs kyi gdams ngag gi thabs kyis ji bzhin par rtogs par gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:181: nyi ma'i 'od rkyen la rag ma lus pa ltar du 'bras bu rtsol med du 'char //
NK103(pe)022:183: de nas gong ma la bsnan pas yang zhe'o rtogs
NK103(pe)022:184: pas 'khrul zhes yul dang bcas pa nub pa'i phyogs
NK103(pe)022:185: skyon yon tan du rtogs pas pad+ma de la nges
NK103(pe)022:186: par gnas pas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams
NK103(pe)022:187: na / bdud bzhi 'bras bur mnga' mdzad kyang ngo
NK103(pe)022:188: bo ma grub pas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i yang dag
NK103(pe)022:189: pa'i 'od gsal bas zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)022:190: gshis la 'khrul pa'i dri ma gdod nas med pa
NK103(pe)022:191: pad+ma'i mi 'gyur bas gdan la mngon du mdzad pas
NK103(pe)022:192: bzhugs te / nyid kyi dgongs pa las tha mi
NK103(pe)022:193: dad pa'i 'khor la sems kyi dal rang bzhin gyis
NK103(pe)022:194: 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid
NK103(pe)022:196: sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:197: sems nyid ni pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos pa ltar 'khrul pa ye nas dag pa la //
NK103(pe)022:198: gzung ba yul dang 'dzin pa shes pa gnyis la zhen pa'i dri ma ji ltar byung //
NK103(pe)022:200: bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 'od kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK103(pe)022:201: me tog pad+ma ni 'dam gyi nang na gnas bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:202: 'dam gyi skyon gyis gos pa med pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:203: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni //
NK103(pe)022:204: dus nam yang 'khor ba'i 'khrul pa rtog par 'i dbang du mi 'gyur te //
NK103(pe)022:205: rnam par rtog pas sgro btags pa'i blo la 'khor ba'i snang ba byung //
NK103(pe)022:207: go ba'i yul na bde ba che //
NK103(pe)022:208: de nyid rnam dag 'jig rten yin //
NK103(pe)022:210: de nas sgrib pa ma lus byang ba'i phyogs spyod
NK103(pe)022:211: yul ye shes su rnam par dag pas bdag gzhan
NK103(pe)022:212: gyi don grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
NK103(pe)022:213: khams na / de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)022:214: don grub pas phyogs med par snang ba zhes bya
NK103(pe)022:215: khams na / ba / byed rtsol med pas rang
NK103(pe)022:216: bzhin gyis 'gro ba don sna tshogs su snang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:218: nyid kyi 'khor la gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston cing bzhugs pa la /
NK103(pe)022:219: sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:220: bya brtsal gyi rtog pa med pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin de nyid la //
NK103(pe)022:221: 'gro ba'i don du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdzad pa ji ltar ji ltar du 'byung //
NK103(pe)022:223: de bzhin gshegs pa grub par snang bas bka' stsal pa /
NK103(pe)022:224: gzhi rang byung gi ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:225: 'gro don gyi mdzad pa thams cad rang byung ye
NK103(pe)022:226: shes la lhun gyis grub pa'i byin gyis rlabs las
NK103(pe)022:227: ni ci yang mi 'gag pa gdul bya'i snang ba
NK103(pe)022:230: the tshom bzhi bcad pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun rig chos sku longs spyod rdzogs //
NK103(pe)022:231: rigs bdag rje btsun dam pa des //
NK103(pe)022:232: rtsol bral ngang las bskul bas bslang //
NK103(pe)022:234: dgongs pa chos sku la mdzad pa longs sku'i rnam
NK103(pe)022:235: par snang bar mdzad pa de nyid gyis bka' stsal
NK103(pe)022:236: pa / 'dir 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs khyed rnams kyis /
NK103(pe)022:237: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin dang
NK103(pe)022:238: ngo bo nyid kyang yin pas thugs kyi bcud 'dus
NK103(pe)022:239: pa'i snying po ni ye shes gsang ba yin pas
NK103(pe)022:241: zhes pa'i bskul ba dam pa gsungs pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:242: de nas gdul bya'i snang ngo la sems dpa' rdo rje stan las langs te /
NK103(pe)022:243: gus pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
NK103(pe)022:244: snang mdzad rigs thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas
NK103(pe)022:245: thams cad kyi rje btsun dam pa de la zhus
NK103(pe)022:246: pa / ston pa khyod kyi gsung ni zil gyis
NK103(pe)022:247: gnon cing nyam nga ba med pas gsung gi seng
NK103(pe)022:248: pa / ge lags ste / ye shes gsang ba
NK103(pe)022:249: ni lhun grub gsum ste de'i don ma rtogs na
NK103(pe)022:250: pa / ge lags ste / // bim pa ra
NK103(pe)022:251: yi 'bru thang shing smug po smin kyang 'bras bu
NK103(pe)022:253: theg pa brgyad kyi rang sa'i 'bras bu smin kyang
NK103(pe)022:254: mthar thug gi 'bras bu de la mi 'byung ba'i
NK103(pe)022:255: skyon yod pa de bas na //
NK103(pe)022:256: ye shes gsang ba rtogs par gyis shig ces so //
NK103(pe)022:257: rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje'i ma lus pa la
NK103(pe)022:258: mnga' snyems pas bdag po rnam snang khyod kyis bstan
NK103(pe)022:259: pa'i don // de dag nged cag 'dus pa'i 'khor kyis ma rig pas //
NK103(pe)022:260: ye shes gsang ba'i don de bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:262: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK103(pe)022:263: sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis da yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig /
NK103(pe)022:264: byang chub kyi sems ye shes gsang ba'i de rang bzhin yin lugs ni //
NK103(pe)022:265: sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis rang bzhin skye med kyi ngang du mi phyed pas gnyis su med //
NK103(pe)022:266: dper na nam mkha' yis lus can kun la khyab
NK103(pe)022:267: pa bzhin du 'khor 'das kun la khyab pas gshis
NK103(pe)022:268: la // ma rig pa dang ye shes gnyis tha dad du grub pa med //
NK103(pe)022:269: ma rtogs 'khrul pa yang rtogs pa'i rgyal ba lam du rang bzhin gcig /
NK103(pe)022:270: ye shes gsang ba'i mtshan nyid rang gsal ni //
NK103(pe)022:271: skye 'gag gi rgyud las grol ba'i rang rig nyi
NK103(pe)022:272: ma'i snying po ltar du 'od gsal ba gzung 'dzin
NK103(pe)022:273: gyi dri ma ye nas rnam par dag pas //
NK103(pe)022:274: yul gyi rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni nyid du rkyen la rag ma lus par gnas //
NK103(pe)022:275: ye nas gnas pa gzhi bzhag ma bcos pas rang
NK103(pe)022:276: lugs dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin skong bas rin
NK103(pe)022:277: chen mdzod de // rang byung yin pas rgyu rkyen
NK103(pe)022:278: dang byed pa pos ma brtsal bar gdod nas ma
NK103(pe)022:279: chen mdzod de // gnas pa'o // ye shes gsang ba'i rnam pa cir yang ma 'gags pas ni //
NK103(pe)022:280: mi 'dra ba sna tshogs mang por rang snang ba
NK103(pe)022:281: de la bden pa'i ngos gzung du grub pa med
NK103(pe)022:282: // phyogs ris gang du yang bden par mi dmigs
NK103(pe)022:283: pas sgyu ma ma btsal gdod nas gnas pa'i lhun
NK103(pe)022:284: // grub ni // dus rtag mar 'dzin pa med
NK103(pe)022:285: par bsal na de nyid rtogs pa'i lta ba yin
NK103(pe)022:287: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las gleng ba rgyud kyi
NK103(pe)022:288: 'byung ba'i gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas de bzhin
NK103(pe)022:289: gshegs gang la zhus pa rnam par snang mdzad la
NK103(pe)022:290: / gang gis sems dpa' rdo rjes gang ltar 'di zhes gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:291: gang dag gsang ba le'u gnyis pa ji ltar gsang
NK103(pe)022:292: ba rtogs dka' ba gsum pa gang zhen drug log
NK103(pe)022:293: gsum theg brgyad sku gsum rnams la gsang ba'i le'u
NK103(pe)022:295: thabs kyi ngo bo don lam lnga /
NK103(pe)022:301: thabs kyi 'bras bur gsum pa'ang 'dod la bcu gcig
NK103(pe)022:302: pa ji ltar 'byung ba le'u bcu pas bstan pa
NK103(pe)022:303: ste / thabs nyid gang gis rtogs pa dag gi rgyud don rnam par dbye bar bya //
NK103(pe)022:305: de nas lan ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK103(pe)022:306: byang ba rang bzhin spros bral chub pa rnam pa
NK103(pe)022:307: sgyu ma sems mtshan nyid rang rig gsum kyi rang
NK103(pe)022:308: bzhin gyis lhun gyis grub pa dag gis ni //
NK103(pe)022:309: snang 1ba srid 2pa snod 1 bcud 2kun la ma bsgos par khyab cing //
NK103(pe)022:310: 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo shar bas //
NK103(pe)022:311: sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang ye shes thugs gsum dang //
NK103(pe)022:312: sems can gyi lus ngag yid gsum yang //
NK103(pe)022:313: thams cad dbyer med pa byang chub kyi sems su dag pas //
NK103(pe)022:314: de ltar du dag par gnas pa'i don rig cing rtogs na //
NK103(pe)022:315: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung
NK103(pe)022:316: thugs su spyod yul yongs su dag pa yin no
NK103(pe)022:317: // rang byung gi ye shes nyid yon tan gyi
NK103(pe)022:318: ldog cha nas ye shes lnga ru snang ba la
NK103(pe)022:319: // // yul du ma grub cing rtogs pa'i rkyen
NK103(pe)022:320: med pas rang byung nyid du rgyu ma rig pas
NK103(pe)022:321: bdag tu bzung zhing gzhan du snang ba'i cha las
NK103(pe)022:322: // // / rkyen zhen pa nyon mongs pa lnga ru phyin ci log pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:325: khams gsum gyi sems can byung ngo //
NK103(pe)022:326: dpe ni nam mkha' lta bu ste //
NK103(pe)022:327: mtha' dang dbus med gdod nas dagka /
NK103(pe)022:328: rkyen byed kyi rgyu khayis ma bsgrubs par ye ganas grub //
NK103(pe)022:329: 'jig byed kyi rkyen gyis mi shigs dus dang rnam pa kun tu 'gyur ba med //
NK103(pe)022:330: caphyi nang med pas ye nas gsal bas lus can kun la khyab //
NK103(pe)022:331: 'bras gzugs de'i rnam par 'byung bas sam rgyun du
NK103(pe)022:332: 'byung bas 'byung ba khyab pa rgya che rten pa
NK103(pe)022:333: ltos che gnas pa tha gru che bas chen chapo
NK103(pe)022:334: sa chu me rlung bzhi po thams cad kun //
NK103(pe)022:335: nam mkha'i ngang du 'dus pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:336: 'di ltar ka snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa kun //
NK103(pe)022:337: bden pa'i rang bzhin med de gdod ma nas dag /
NK103(pe)022:338: las kyi shugs kyis 'khor ba'i 'dis 'dir 'di nyon mongs pa 'dod chags zhe sdang kun //
NK103(pe)022:339: ched du ma brtsal bar rang byung gi rgyal por rang shar //
NK103(pe)022:340: gabrda dang tha snyad dpe la sogs pa cis kyang
NK103(pe)022:341: mtshon pa las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni
NK103(pe)022:343: mi 'gyur bar ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs sa la rtsol ba'i zug rngu med pas bde chen sku //
NK103(pe)022:344: gang yang ma spangs pas yangs po kun la khyab pas che'o bde chen sku //
NK103(pe)022:345: gdod ma nas 'khrul pa snang ma myong bas dag go chos kyi sku //
NK103(pe)022:346: de la rtog pa'i blos bsam du med do bsgom pa'i dmigs pa dang bral /
NK103(pe)022:347: gang du yang mi bsam pa'i rang bzhin la re dogs kyis mi rtsol bar lhug par bzhag /
NK103(pe)022:348: nang du mi bsdu phyi yul la mi spro bar skyon rang byung rang zhi gyi nar bzhag /
NK103(pe)022:349: chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi shes sgrub kyi
NK103(pe)022:350: bcud 'dus pa'i snying po'i don de nyid rgyu yis
NK103(pe)022:351: ma bskyed pas rang byung rkyen dang bral bas 'gyur
NK103(pe)022:352: ba med do // duhkha kun 'byung 'gog pa lam bden bzhi rnam pa bcu drug tu /
NK103(pe)022:353: rtogs pa'i rgyu shes bzod kyi ye shes dang 'di nyid bral bas nyan thos /
NK103(pe)022:354: gdod nas lhun rdzogs su yod pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis mi sogs //
NK103(pe)022:355: 'khrul pa ye nas grub ma ma myongs par dag
NK103(pe)022:356: pas nyon mongs dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis mi
NK103(pe)022:357: sbyong bas byang sems kyi bsam gtan las grol //
NK103(pe)022:358: 'khrul pa rang rgyud pa dag pa'i lha rigs gsum gyi dal la 'dir rag ma lus //
NK103(pe)022:359: mngon byang lnga cho 'khrul bzhi ste /
NK103(pe)022:360: dgu yi bsam gtan gyi yan lag gis 'bras bu sgrub par mi byed //
NK103(pe)022:361: ye nas de yin par sangs rgyas pas rang la lhun gyis grub //
NK103(pe)022:364: lta spyod gong 'og gi rjes su 'brengs te phyogs
NK103(pe)022:365: gcig tu nges pa med pa dag gis 'bras bu
NK103(pe)022:367: lha rigs bzhi dpon g.yog tu 'dod pa'i rtsol ba bral bas thub pa'i bsam gtan las grol lo //
NK103(pe)022:368: cis kyang mtshon du med pa'i sems kyi ngo bo de la //
NK103(pe)022:369: shes rab thabs gnyis med kyis bde ba mtshon du med pas ma h+aa las //
NK103(pe)022:370: rgyu 'bras kyi phyogs ris dang bral ba'i rig pa la //
NK103(pe)022:371: snang ba dbyings 1dang dran rtog ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu med pas a nu las grol lo //
NK103(pe)022:372: 'bras bu brtsal ba med pas thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu 'byung ba lnga la yang rag ma lus //
NK103(pe)022:373: khyab brdal chen po'i klong du sangs rgyas pas sku
NK103(pe)022:374: gsung thugs la yang blo'i rten so mi 'cha' 'o
NK103(pe)022:375: // bems po las log pas rig pa'i blo sems
NK103(pe)022:376: dang sems las byung ba yis ma dpyad na shes
NK103(pe)022:377: rab dang gtan tshigs kyis ma byas pas /
NK103(pe)022:378: rang bzhin yin lugs kyi gshis thog tu rnal du phebs par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)022:379: brjod pa dang bral bas gdod ma nas rna ba'i
NK103(pe)022:380: dbang pos gzhan las ma thos pa'i chos nyid rtogs
NK103(pe)022:382: blo yul du ma grub pas bsam pa'i shes rab
NK103(pe)022:383: dang bral bas na de bzhin du dge ba yin
NK103(pe)022:384: no // sems kyi rig pas yul med rang gsal du rtogs par gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:385: sems kyi rtogs pa'i yon tan dang tshad rtags bsam gyis mi khyab //
NK103(pe)022:386: shes pa'i rgyud dgrol ba la thos pa'i tshig gis ma bkrol bar ni shes byed kyi //
NK103(pe)022:387: gtan tshigs rang gi rig pas mngon du 'byin par nus //
NK103(pe)022:388: thos pa ming la dmigs bsam pa gnyis ka la
NK103(pe)022:389: bsgom pa don la gsum gyis ngo mtshar skye rim
NK103(pe)022:390: par 'phel phyogs ris med pas rtogs pa zla ba
NK103(pe)022:391: dang skar ma dang nyi ma bzhin no //
NK103(pe)022:392: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las /
NK103(pe)022:393: de ltar gnyis med rtogs bya'i phyir //
NK103(pe)022:394: rdzogs chen gzhung las nges thos pas //
NK103(pe)022:395: thos pa zla ba lta bur bshad //
NK103(pe)022:396: don la dpyod pa nges ma nges //
NK103(pe)022:397: spong len bsam pa skar ma ltar //
NK103(pe)022:398: nges par gsal snyoms 'du shes bral //
NK103(pe)022:399: sgom pa nye la lta bur bshad //
NK103(pe)022:401: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo lhun grub gsum po ni //
NK103(pe)022:402: blo dman pa'i 'og ma sems kyi sgra tshad kyis ma rtogs te 'o na gang gis rtogs na /
NK103(pe)022:403: gtan tshigs gsum gyis gzhigs pas shes par bya ste /
NK103(pe)022:404: ma g.yos mtshon pa ngang gi gtan tshigs ni rig
NK103(pe)022:405: pa cir yang snang bas gang du'ang ma nges pa
NK103(pe)022:406: gsal ba ste // ma nor bcos med rang bzhin
NK103(pe)022:407: gyis gtan tshigs ni rig pa'i rang snang cir yang
NK103(pe)022:408: mi 'gag par snang ba ni ye shes rang snang
NK103(pe)022:410: bdag nyid chen po dbyer med ni snang ba dang
NK103(pe)022:411: stong pa tha dad ru 'dzin pa'i rtog pa med
NK103(pe)022:412: pa'o // gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba dag gi rang bzhin rtogs pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:413: 'khrul pa'i sel med par thams cad byang chub kyi sems su ngo shes pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:414: bdag nyid chen po gcig gi gtan tshigs kyis //
NK103(pe)022:415: thams cad thig le nyag gcig byang chub kyi sems
NK103(pe)022:416: su shes pa la gzhan snang bzang ngan gyi rtog
NK103(pe)022:417: pa / gang ltar gnas kyang ma grub par chos nyid 'ba' zhig nyid do //
NK103(pe)022:418: dbyings dang ye shes gtan tshigs ni //
NK103(pe)022:419: dbyings ni ma 'gags par yul ma 'gags par yul
NK103(pe)022:420: du snang ba rnams rang snang du dag pa'i rgyu
NK103(pe)022:421: yin te // rig pa mi rtog pa'i ye shes
NK103(pe)022:422: 'bras bu nyid du gsal pa gnyis mtshan nyid mi
NK103(pe)022:423: yin te // gnyis pas // gcig tu 'dus pas gzung 'dzin mtha' yis gos pa med pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:424: de ltar byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dang mtshon pa'i dpe dang mtshon bya'i don dang ni //
NK103(pe)022:425: shes byed kyi gtan tshigs dang bzhi ru le'u gnyis pa'i don shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:427: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NK103(pe)022:428: byang chub sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes /
NK103(pe)022:429: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces zhus so //
NK103(pe)022:430: gang gsang ba'i smra ba la mtshungs pa med pas khyod ni smra ba'i seng ge ste //
NK103(pe)022:431: rdzogs pa chen po rtsol bral gyi bstan pa khyod kyi thugs la rdzogs //
NK103(pe)022:432: mi 'byed par phan 'dogs pas byams mgon spros bral
NK103(pe)022:433: gyis snyoms par khyab pas thugs rje lam pa la
NK103(pe)022:434: khyad par 'phags pas chen po yis //
NK103(pe)022:435: snying po rnal ma'i skal ba dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa'i 'khor rab tu mang bas tshogs la //
NK103(pe)022:436: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin lngar gsung pa de dag ji ltar du yul //
NK103(pe)022:437: gang la gsang ba bstan du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:439: de bzhin nyid la spros pa'i zug rngu med pas
NK103(pe)022:440: bde bar son pa ni nyes pa gnyis las grol
NK103(pe)022:441: bas gshegs pas de bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:442: rgyud kyi ston pa sku gsum //
NK103(pe)022:443: kun byed le'u bcu bzhi pa las /
NK103(pe)022:444: nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa la //
NK103(pe)022:445: nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum mi bstan gsang //
NK103(pe)022:446: nga la gnas pa'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la //
NK103(pe)022:447: nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya //
NK103(pe)022:448: nga la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad la //
NK103(pe)022:449: nga'i rang bzhin nga yis byas pa'i khams gsum sems can la //
NK103(pe)022:450: nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya //
NK103(pe)022:451: gsum dang rtsol bcas kyi theg pa rim pa brgyad dang /
NK103(pe)022:452: don la phyin ci log rgyang phan rtag chad gsum
NK103(pe)022:453: dang las kyis 'gro ba rigs drug dang de dag
NK103(pe)022:454: la // rang gnas gyi ye shes ji lta bar ma rtogs pas gsang ba nyid du bstan no //
NK103(pe)022:455: rang bzhin gyi snang ba lam gyis ma bcos pa
NK103(pe)022:456: ji lta ba mthar phyin pa ni chos kyi sku
NK103(pe)022:457: // rang rig pa bde ba chen po rtsol bas
NK103(pe)022:458: ma sbyangs par mthar phyin pa ni longs spyod rdzogs
NK103(pe)022:459: // pa'i sku // de nyid kyi thugs rje yis
NK103(pe)022:460: rigs drug gi don mdzad pas sprul pa'i sku ru
NK103(pe)022:461: // pa'i sku // shar ba'o // chos kyi skus
NK103(pe)022:462: nam mkha'i yis khyab pa mtha' la thug pa med
NK103(pe)022:463: pa bzhin du ma lus par kun la khyab //
NK103(pe)022:464: 'dul ba dang bzhugs pa'i zhing khams ni snang ba snod dang srid pa bcud thams cad yin //
NK103(pe)022:465: 'das dang ma 'ongs dang da ltar dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad dang //
NK103(pe)022:466: kyi sgra ni rgyu dang 'byung khungs dang 'dzin pa
NK103(pe)022:467: dang rigs kyi don la 'jug pa la rigs te
NK103(pe)022:468: khams 'dod gzugs gzugs med gsum gyi sems can thams
NK103(pe)022:470: chos kyi sku ma bcos pa de'i 'khor du 'dus //
NK103(pe)022:471: bskyed pa rdzogs pa de'i tha snyad dang bral ba
NK103(pe)022:472: rim pa gsum gyi bstan pa byin gyi rlabs kyis
NK103(pe)022:473: sgrogs // smra bsam dang bral bas gsang rgyal ba
NK103(pe)022:474: kun gyis sngags pa mi zad pa gter gyi mdzad
NK103(pe)022:476: chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi brda mjal bas go zhing rtogs //
NK103(pe)022:477: thams cad spros med byang chub kyi sems su shar //
NK103(pe)022:478: de la 'khor 'das thams cad 'dus shing rtogs ma rtogs kyi rkyen gyis 'phel ba'i phyir na //
NK103(pe)022:479: 'khor 'das thams cad chos kyi sku de yi 'khor du 'dus par ngas bshad do //
NK103(pe)022:480: chos sku dag la skad cig ma dang phyogs ris gang gis kyang 'gyur ba med pas //
NK103(pe)022:481: ma rtag pa kun gyi dngos gzhi yin kyang phyogs
NK103(pe)022:482: gcig pa gang gis kyang ma bcos par ye nas
NK103(pe)022:483: rang byung ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi rtag pa
NK103(pe)022:484: yin te ther zug dang rgyun gyi rtag pa las
NK103(pe)022:485: grol ba'o // chos sku ni rgyu rkyen med pas rang byung mu matha'i spros pa med pas //
NK103(pe)022:486: ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshogs chos sku rtogs pa'i ngo la spros pa med par gsal //
NK103(pe)022:487: des na rang la gnas pas byin cir yang mi 'gag pas brlabs kyis bshad pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:488: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni kun mkhyen gyi rang rig bde chen nyid yin te //
NK103(pe)022:489: sku mtshan dpe dang ldan pa'i gzugs su lhan cig
NK103(pe)022:490: pa'i 'khor gyi 'dzin cha la snang ba ni gzung
NK103(pe)022:491: ba yul gyi rnam pa yin //
NK103(pe)022:492: 'dod khams kyi 'gags na phrad par 'dod pa'i tshor ba bde ba thams cad dang //
NK103(pe)022:493: 'gro ba'i rgyud kun ma lus pa'i zag bcas thun mong gi //
NK103(pe)022:494: bde ba myong ba'i dngos por 'dzin pa'i rang rig kyang //
NK103(pe)022:495: rig pa bde ba chen po nyid la gdod ma nas rdzogs la /
NK103(pe)022:496: bsam gtan bzhi yi dang po dben pa las skyes pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:497: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:498: gsum pa dga' ba med pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:499: bzhi pa btang snyoms kyi bde ba yang //
NK103(pe)022:500: gzugs khams kyi lha ris bcu bdun po yi bde ba'i longs spyod yin de //
NK103(pe)022:501: sems nyid kyi bde ba chen po la rang bzhin kyis tshang ngo //
NK103(pe)022:503: rnam shes mtha' yas 1ci yang med pa1 /
NK103(pe)022:505: skye mched mu bzhi'i zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyud gyis brlan pa'i bde ba yang //
NK103(pe)022:506: rang byung byang chub kyi sems nyid la rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)022:507: gzung ba rdul phran la 'dzin pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:508: gzung ba med pa'i 'dzin pa gnyis ldan pa'i nyan rang gi 'gog zhi bde ba dang //
NK103(pe)022:509: bsod nams dang ye shes gnyis kyi tshogs rdzogs pa
NK103(pe)022:510: la ldan pa'i chos sku dang gzugs skur mthar phyin
NK103(pe)022:512: tshogs gnyis kyi rgyus ma bsgrubs pa'i bde ba rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)022:513: kri yi dag pa gsum gyi bde ba dang lta
NK103(pe)022:514: spyod gong 'og gnyis su kyi rjes su lta ba
NK103(pe)022:515: u pa ya'i bde ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:516: mngon byang lnga brgyud pas byin rlabs lhar snang ba yo ga ba'i bde ba yang //
NK103(pe)022:517: sems nyid bde chen du rtogs pa nyid la rdzogs par gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:518: de dag kyang gsal bya chos nyid rtogs pa'i rim pas lta ba'i don tha dad du 'dzin cing //
NK103(pe)022:519: rang rang gi 'bras bu myur du 'dod pa'i stobs
NK103(pe)022:520: kyis lam nye bar sgrub ste sa lam rim par
NK103(pe)022:521: bgrod pa'i rim gyis rang sa'i 'bras bu thob ste
NK103(pe)022:522: rdzogs chen gyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro
NK103(pe)022:523: // lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba thabs dang shes rab rol pa las byung ba dag kyang //
NK103(pe)022:524: rang rig kun mkhyen nyid bde ba nyid la rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:525: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa la
NK103(pe)022:526: longs spyod pa dbyings dang sems rig pa'i ye shes
NK103(pe)022:527: gnyis 'du 'bral med pa'i bde bar lta ba de
NK103(pe)022:528: la yang // ting 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rtsal che ste blo yang rab du gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:529: rgyu ni snang ba dbyings su rdzogs par bsgom pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:531: 'bras bu dran rtog ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'char ba'i bde ba yang //
NK103(pe)022:532: rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i sems nyid la rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:533: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa la
NK103(pe)022:534: long spyod pa des na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
NK103(pe)022:535: yin no // mu bzhi mtha' drug gang ltar yang mi gnas pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
NK103(pe)022:536: drin gyis ma bcos par chos kyi skur mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs tsam na ston pa /
NK103(pe)022:537: gnas phyin ci ma ni ma log pas yang dag
NK103(pe)022:538: don gyi 'og min mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gnas
NK103(pe)022:539: te // 'khor ni byang chub kyi sems la byung zhing 'dus pa thams cad nyid kyi 'khor //
NK103(pe)022:540: chos sku spros med kyi byin brlabs ma 'gags par phyogs bcur gsal //
NK103(pe)022:541: bstan pa ni phyi skyed pa ma h+aa nang rdzogs
NK103(pe)022:542: pa a nu gsang ba a ti yo ga gsum
NK103(pe)022:543: // ma skyes pas rang byung rang gsal bas ye
NK103(pe)022:544: shes su ston pa chos sku dang cha mthun pas
NK103(pe)022:545: // na / chos kyi sku yi bstan pa yin par bshad //
NK103(pe)022:546: sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang //
NK103(pe)022:547: snang srid snod bcud ma lus pa thams cad du shar kyang /
NK103(pe)022:548: chos nyid kyi ngang las ma g.yos pas //
NK103(pe)022:549: sems nyid gdal khyab chen po ni /
NK103(pe)022:550: chos sku'i zhing khams yin no //
NK103(pe)022:551: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i zhing khams ni //
NK103(pe)022:552: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad yin de //
NK103(pe)022:553: 'khor 'das kyi bde sdug ma lus pa la longs
NK103(pe)022:554: spyod kyang bdag nyid chen po'i phyir spyod yul du
NK103(pe)022:555: ma chags par zhen pa dang bral bas longs spyod
NK103(pe)022:556: yin // chos bzod pa las 'das nas sa thob
NK103(pe)022:557: pa'i rig 'dzin dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de
NK103(pe)022:558: yin // la // thugs kyi dgongs pa dang sku'i
NK103(pe)022:559: brda dang ye shes kyi sgo nas bshad pa de
NK103(pe)022:560: yin // la // // 'khor gyis ting 'dzin dang rig pa'i gdeng gis go //
NK103(pe)022:561: mtshan ma'i rang rgyud pa sku gsum mi mnga' bar //
NK103(pe)022:562: bstan pa ni phyi pa'i gsang sngags gsum //
NK103(pe)022:563: mtshan dpe dang ldan pa'i lhar snang ba yis longs sku dang cha mthun par yod pas na //
NK103(pe)022:564: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan par phyi rgyud gsum bshad //
NK103(pe)022:565: gnas ni steng 'og gi tha snyad dang bral ba'i 'og min rig pa'i gnas //
NK103(pe)022:566: rig pa'i sa bcu thob pa'i 'khor rnams la //
NK103(pe)022:567: rang gi ngo bos chos nyid rang shar du gsal bar ston //
NK103(pe)022:568: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mdzad pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:569: theg pa 'og ma bas rang gi 'dod pas 'bras bu mthar thug tu 'dod kyang //
NK103(pe)022:570: rnal ma'i mthar thug ma bcos bla ma'i sa la ma reg pas //
NK103(pe)022:571: de la longs spyod rdzogs sku'i mdzad par shar //
NK103(pe)022:572: gdul bya theg dman la sbyangs pa'i 'khor de la //
NK103(pe)022:573: rgyal thabs spyi blugs don dus gcig la thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbang bskur bas de nas //
NK103(pe)022:574: gzhan nas thob pa med par rang gi byang chub kyi sems dang ngo phrad //
NK103(pe)022:575: lam dang sa 'og nas gong du ma bgrod par
NK103(pe)022:576: 'khrul pa'i rtog pa'i tshogs brgyad yul dang bcas pa
NK103(pe)022:578: thun mong ma yin pa bde ba blo las 'das pas phrag brgya'i don de nyid thob nas //
NK103(pe)022:579: spyod yul yongs su dag pas zhing khams thams cad bde bar spyod //
NK103(pe)022:580: rgyal thabs spyi blugs don tshangs pa'i dbang 'di ma thob par //
NK103(pe)022:581: theg brgyad kyi rang sa'i 'bras bu thob kyang rdzogs chen 'jug dgos pas mthar ma phyin //
NK103(pe)022:583: des na lung gsum rgyud pa dang ldan pa'i bla ma chu bo bzhi rdzogs pa yis //
NK103(pe)022:584: rgyal ba'i rgyud 'dzin pa'i sras slob ma 'di la spyod pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la //
NK103(pe)022:585: man ngag gi khrid kyi rim pas rang gi sems kyi don phyin ci ma log par bstan pas //
NK103(pe)022:586: sems nyid rin chen gnyug ma gnyis su med pa'i don la dbang //
NK103(pe)022:587: bskur bar bya ba dang byed cha gnyis mi rtog kyang //
NK103(pe)022:588: snang srid kyi brda don phyogs med du sprad pa'i
NK103(pe)022:589: mngon sum gnyis kyi man ngag thug phrad sbyin no
NK103(pe)022:590: // 'od zer thugs rje'i rnam par sprul pa'i rang bzhin sprul par shar //
NK103(pe)022:591: 'gro ba'i mos pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya'i bsam pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)022:592: mos spyod kyi sa lam tshogs sbyor gnyis thob pa dang kyang 'gro drug ba rigs gi 'khor //
NK103(pe)022:593: bstan pa sde snod gsum du bstan //
NK103(pe)022:594: bzhugs pa'i zhing khams stong gsum mi 'byed kyi 'jig
NK103(pe)022:595: pa la 'jig pa rten gyi khams byed pa med
NK103(pe)022:596: la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas thugs rje'i yis
NK103(pe)022:597: 'gro ba 'dul ba gnas la gdul bya'i dbang gis
NK103(pe)022:599: gzhi'i ngo bo ma bcos pa rang byung ye shes kyi snang tshul ni //
NK103(pe)022:600: rang byung ye shes lngar yon tan gyi chas snang ba la //
NK103(pe)022:601: rtogs pa'i rkyen bzhi las phyin ci log gi bsam pa yis //
NK103(pe)022:602: rang byung gi ye shes nyid du ma rtogs te
NK103(pe)022:603: bdag tu bzung bas gzhan du snang ba'i cha las
NK103(pe)022:604: yang dag bden par zhen pa'i dug lnga ru mthong
NK103(pe)022:605: // zhen pa nyon mongs pa lnga yi 'bras bu ni //
NK103(pe)022:606: khams gsum sems can 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu'am
NK103(pe)022:607: so drug gzugs khams bcu bdun gzugs med skye mched
NK103(pe)022:608: mu bzhi nyid du shar kyang //
NK103(pe)022:609: ngo bo sems las gzhan du 'gyur zhing nyams ba med //
NK103(pe)022:610: srid pa dang longs spyod la zhen pas 'dod chags
NK103(pe)022:611: dang bcas pa'i dge bcu dbyings bskyed pa'i las kyi
NK103(pe)022:612: rnam smin gyis // 'dod khams kyi lha yi gzhal
NK103(pe)022:613: med khang gi gnas su bardzusa nas skyes nas kyang
NK103(pe)022:614: rnam smin gyis // // lus kyi kha dog mi sdug 'gyur ba dang //
NK103(pe)022:615: stan la mi dga' me tog phreng rnying dang //
NK103(pe)022:616: gos la dri ma chags dang lus las ni //
NK103(pe)022:617: sngon chad med pa'i rdul 'byung zhes bgyi ba //
NK103(pe)022:618: mtho ris 'chi 'pho sbron byed snga ltas lnga //
NK103(pe)022:619: lha yul gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'byung ste //
NK103(pe)022:621: ngan song du ltung ba'i sdug bsngal dag 'chi ltas byung ba'i tshe nyams su myong yang //
NK103(pe)022:622: 'dod chags de dngos po'i gshis las ma grub pas //
NK103(pe)022:623: gnas lugs byang chub kyi sems la bskyod pa rdul tsam yang med //
NK103(pe)022:625: nga rgyal gyis kun nas bslangs pa'i dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin gyis //
NK103(pe)022:626: lha min gyi gnas su ri rab khong seng du skyes nas kyang //
NK103(pe)022:627: lus kyi 'thab pa dang ngag gi rtsod pa'i sdug
NK103(pe)022:628: lha min dag na'ang rang bzhin gyis lha'i dpal la
NK103(pe)022:629: sdang phyir sems kyi duhkha che //
NK103(pe)022:631: sems khengs pas nga rgyal ngo bo shes pas na //
NK103(pe)022:632: nga rgyal ma spangs bar gnas su dag /
NK103(pe)022:633: des na nga rgyal gyi ngo bo mi gnas pas stong //
NK103(pe)022:634: gzhan gyi yon tan la mi dga' bas phrag dog las kyi rnam smin gyis //
NK103(pe)022:636: mi yi gnas su mngal skyes gtso che skyes nas kyang //
NK103(pe)022:637: sdug bsngal brgyad la sogs pa sna tshogs su snang ba 'di rnams myong 'gyur yang //
NK103(pe)022:638: phrag dog ngo bo chos kyi dbyings yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:639: phrag dog ma spangs kyang gdod nas dag /
NK103(pe)022:640: de bas na byang chub kyi sems las mi bskyod //
NK103(pe)022:641: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kun tu 'dzin pas ser sna
NK103(pe)022:642: de yis kun nas bslang ba'i mi dge ba'i las
NK103(pe)022:644: yi dwags bkres skom gyi gnas su rgyal po'i khab
NK103(pe)022:645: kyis dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og tu skyes pa ni
NK103(pe)022:646: rtsa ba de las kha 'thor ba gzhon //
NK103(pe)022:647: yi dwags na yang 'dod pas phongs pa yi //
NK103(pe)022:648: bskyed pa'i duhkha rgyun chags mi 'chos pa //
NK103(pe)022:649: bkres skom grang dro ngal dang 'jigs pa yis //
NK103(pe)022:650: bskyed pa shin tu mi bzad bstan 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)022:651: zhes pa la sogs pa bshes pa'i 'phrin yig las klu sgrub kyis gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:652: bkres skom sdug bsngal myong ba gyur yang //
NK103(pe)022:653: ser sna ma bcos byang chub sems //
NK103(pe)022:655: des na dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
NK103(pe)022:656: yang dag pa'i don mi shes pas /
NK103(pe)022:657: gti mug dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin gyis //
NK103(pe)022:658: dud 'gro'i rtsa ba'i gnas phyi'i rgya mtsho kha 'thor
NK103(pe)022:659: nges pa med de thang dang chu dang nam mkha'i
NK103(pe)022:660: spyod yul gyi gnas su shes pa blun cing ngag
NK103(pe)022:661: lkugs pa myong su 'gro'i skye gnas na yang bsad
NK103(pe)022:662: pa dang / bcing dang brdeg btsog sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa zhes so //
NK103(pe)022:663: gnas bde sdug bza' btung 'gro 'dug rig pa mngon shes phra mo'i chos yod kyang //
NK103(pe)022:664: gti mug ma bcos byang chub sems //
NK103(pe)022:665: theg pa 'dis yul yang de ltar rtogs shing rig pas na //
NK103(pe)022:666: gti mug 'og ma pa ltar du ma spangs pa rang sar gnas su dag /
NK103(pe)022:667: kun nas mnar sems pa'i zhe sdang dang bsod nams
NK103(pe)022:668: ma yin pa'i las kyi rnam smin gyis rgyud spyi
NK103(pe)022:669: // 'dzam bu gling gi 'og dmyal ba'i gnas su
NK103(pe)022:670: tsha dmyal brgyad dang grang dmyal brgyad kyi duhkha myong
NK103(pe)022:671: // yang // zhe sdang rang byung gi ye shes
NK103(pe)022:672: nyid du shes pas ma spangs par rang grol lo
NK103(pe)022:673: // yang // // thabs la brten nas chos thams
NK103(pe)022:674: cad de ltar du byang chub kyi sems su shes
NK103(pe)022:675: // yang // // pas na // mu mtha' ci
NK103(pe)022:676: yang grub pa med par 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams
NK103(pe)022:677: // yang // // pas na // thams cad shes
NK103(pe)022:678: // ji ltar ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad
NK103(pe)022:679: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs su mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK103(pe)022:680: spyan gyi ni mig lnga'i mchog yin te /
NK103(pe)022:681: snying po don gyi chos rnams ji bzhin par gsal bas so //
NK103(pe)022:682: bstan pa ni rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar ston pa'i theg pa mtshan nyid sde gsum //
NK103(pe)022:683: rigs drug 'dul bar mdzad pa'i ston pa ni thub pa drug tu snang ste mtshan spyi dang mthun /
NK103(pe)022:684: lha yi dbang po brgya byin phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:685: lha min dbang po dmag dpung gi srid mi 'jig pa ra thub par 'dzin //
NK103(pe)022:686: mi la sku gsung thugs thun mong ma yin pa'i
NK103(pe)022:687: thub pa'am 'khor ba'i dpung 'joms pas thub pa'i mi
NK103(pe)022:688: dbang por snang // dud 'gro'i ston pa gti mug gi mun pa gsal bar byed par 'bar //
NK103(pe)022:689: yi dwags 'dul ba'i stobs mnga' bas stobs kyi bdag /
NK103(pe)022:690: chu bsil bar byed pa me 'bar bas duhkha zhi bar byed pas thugs rje'i bdag /
NK103(pe)022:691: gdul bya 'gro ba rigs drug yod pas na //
NK103(pe)022:692: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyid thub pa rnam pa
NK103(pe)022:693: drug tu rigs drug gi ngo la chu zla ltar
NK103(pe)022:694: du shar // gang zag so so'i blo la 'tsham pa'i phyogs su //
NK103(pe)022:695: gang dang mtha' yas pa'i gdul bya mthun pa'i sgo nas bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i mdzad pa ston //
NK103(pe)022:697: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NK103(pe)022:698: sku gsum gyi zhing khams bstan pa logs pa gsal bar ni 'grel pas gang gsang bar mdzad /
NK103(pe)022:699: gzhung gis gang la gsang bar gsol bstan pa'i le'u gsum pa'o////de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes /
NK103(pe)022:700: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:701: rang bzhin dang mdzad pa thugs rjes kun la khyab
NK103(pe)022:702: pa'i bdag po de kho na nyid ma bcos pa
NK103(pe)022:703: lhun rang bzhin mtshan nyid rnam pa grub gsum chos
NK103(pe)022:705: rtsol ba'i chu bo nyer bzhi med sar rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)022:706: ngang du gnas pas 'bras bu mngon sum par sangs
NK103(pe)022:707: rgyas te // mdzad pa la phyogs ris mi mnga'
NK103(pe)022:708: ba ni dper na nyi zla 'i 'od kyis khyab
NK103(pe)022:709: rgyas te // pa bzhin no // mkhyen pa dang
NK103(pe)022:710: mdzad pa dang thugs rje'i ye shes kyi 'od zer
NK103(pe)022:711: gyis phyogs bcur khyab par bdal ba'i phyir dbyer med
NK103(pe)022:712: rgyas te // pa bzhin no // kyi // snying
NK103(pe)022:713: rjes don kyang rtsol ba med pas mdzad kyang rtsol
NK103(pe)022:714: ba med pas lhun gyis grub ste ma lus 'gro
NK103(pe)022:715: don rdo rjer grub ces so //
NK103(pe)022:716: bshad pa ltar phyogs ris mi mnga' ba'i sku mchog khyed gis //
NK103(pe)022:717: blo che chung gi rim pa dang mtshams pa'i theg
NK103(pe)022:718: pa brgyad don 'di nyid rang bzhin dang lta ba
NK103(pe)022:719: dang rtogs pa'i 'khor la gsang ste de dag gis
NK103(pe)022:721: 'dus pa'i tshogs la bstan du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:723: bkra shis shing bar chad med pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:724: ston pa gsum la phyogs ris kyi ngos bzung mi mnga' ste //
NK103(pe)022:725: theg brgyad kyis rang rang gi 'dod pa'i grub mtha'
NK103(pe)022:726: la zhen cing rtag chad gnyis kyis don las log
NK103(pe)022:727: / rgyang phan pa kha gcig gis las rgyu 'bras
NK103(pe)022:728: dang lam dang 'bras bu ma rig pas gang yang
NK103(pe)022:729: / khas mi len // 'gro ba drug gis nyon
NK103(pe)022:730: mongs lnga yi 'bras bu skyes gnas bde sdug spyod
NK103(pe)022:732: de dag zhen pas phyogs bral mi mthong ba des na ye shes gsang ba yin no //
NK103(pe)022:734: chos sku gdod nas phyogs 'dzin gyi shes pa rnam par dag la //
NK103(pe)022:735: rang bzhin dang ched du byas pas ltos pa'i kun
NK103(pe)022:736: tu brtags pa'i gzung 'dzin sna tshogs ngang gis med
NK103(pe)022:737: pa de gzung 'dzin can gyis mi mthong bas des
NK103(pe)022:738: na chos nyid kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la
NK103(pe)022:739: / phyogs su blta bas grub pa med /
NK103(pe)022:740: ces nam mkha' che las so //
NK103(pe)022:742: thams cad la ma zhen par longs spyod pa'i sku
NK103(pe)022:743: ni rnam pa kun rig pa bde chen phyogs med
NK103(pe)022:745: rtogs pa yis phyi nang med par shar ba'i sems nyid de'i ro ma myongs pas gsang //
NK103(pe)022:746: de nyid chos can du sgrub pa ma yin phyogs su zhen pa'i chos nyid min //
NK103(pe)022:747: mu mtha' ci yang ma yin phyogs bral du rtogs pa'i ngang la rang tang zhog /
NK103(pe)022:748: sprul pa ni sku sgra cha byad sna tshogs gdul
NK103(pe)022:749: bya la 'dul thabs cir yang ston pas ma nges
NK103(pe)022:750: pa de nges par bzung bas ma mthong bas gsang
NK103(pe)022:751: ste / zhen pa'i bsam pa so sor snang ba tsam las des ma brtags par //
NK103(pe)022:752: yang dag dngos por rang rgyud pa grub pa med //
NK103(pe)022:753: dper na thag pa la sbrul du mthong yang //
NK103(pe)022:754: thag pa'i mtshan nyid sbrul ma yin pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:755: ma bcos rol pa'i snang ba la kun brtags 'khrul par zhen pas brtags pa ltar snang mod kyang //
NK103(pe)022:756: ma bcos pa'i snang ba zhen pas brtags pa'i snang bar 'gyur ba min //
NK103(pe)022:757: rol pa'i snang ba la rang bzhin med pas sgyu
NK103(pe)022:758: ma rang snang ba la rang bzhin med pas lhun
NK103(pe)022:759: grub ste // snang ba la ched du byas pa'i
NK103(pe)022:760: rtsol ba rang rgyud pa med pas sgyu ma de
NK103(pe)022:761: rtogs na re dogs chod pas bde mchog yin //
NK103(pe)022:762: gnas skabs 'bab chu ltar snang yang ngo bo cis
NK103(pe)022:763: kyang mi 'gyur rdo rje btsan po yin te de'i
NK103(pe)022:764: ngo bo // ma bcos lhun grub chen po de phyogs thams cad pa yin la //
NK103(pe)022:765: phyogs gcig tu nges pa med pa la ma gtogs
NK103(pe)022:766: pas nges par bzung bas bar bshad des na gsum
NK103(pe)022:767: la ngos gzung med ces so //
NK103(pe)022:769: gang zhig nyan thos pas yul sems tha dad gnyis su mthong ba ni //
NK103(pe)022:770: tha mal pa dang mu stegs kyi rags pa'i gzugs
NK103(pe)022:771: med la phra rab kyi so sor rdul cha med
NK103(pe)022:772: du bden par mthong 'dzin pa skad cig mar 'dod
NK103(pe)022:773: do // sems nyid la rdul du grub pa med bzhin blos brtags pas phyin ci log /
NK103(pe)022:774: yang na chos kyi gang zag bdag med pa 'ba'
NK103(pe)022:775: zhig tu nges par gzung bas chos nyid ma mthong
NK103(pe)022:776: bas gsang ngo // gang zhig rang rgyal bas gang
NK103(pe)022:777: zag gi bdag med rtogs pa la sogs pa nyan
NK103(pe)022:778: bas gsang ngo // thos dang / cha mthun la nang 'dzin pa chos kyi bdag 'dod pas ni //
NK103(pe)022:779: gzugs chos bco lnga 'dus ma byas dang gzung yul
NK103(pe)022:780: bcu drug gi chos kyi bdag la gcig 'bras bu
NK103(pe)022:782: rgyu rkyen la rten 'brel ba'i chos phyi nang gi
NK103(pe)022:783: nyer bzhi la nges par brtags bco lnga rten 'brel
NK103(pe)022:785: skyed byed kyi rgyu med par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi don des ma mthong bas gsang ngo //
NK103(pe)022:786: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bden pa gnyis med
NK103(pe)022:787: kyi chos kyi sku yi ngo bor gnas pa la
NK103(pe)022:788: // yul bden 2pa gnyis su blo 'khrul ma 'khrul gyis lta 1 ba rnam 3par phye ste //
NK103(pe)022:789: de yang don dam par spros pa'i stong pa dngos po rnam rang bzhin med par 'dod pa de //
NK103(pe)022:790: chos nyid la sogs pa rigs pa bzhi dang rten
NK103(pe)022:791: 'brel la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs bzhi po dag gis
NK103(pe)022:792: tshol // don bden pa gnyis gyi ngo bo spyi rnam tsam rtogs nas ni //
NK103(pe)022:793: tshogs sbyor du zhi gnas gang zag gi rim pas
NK103(pe)022:794: dran pa nyer bzhag nas stobs lnga'i bar gang 'dod
NK103(pe)022:795: pa bzhin sgom // lhag mthong ni rang gi mtshan
NK103(pe)022:796: nyid gsal ba'i skabs mthong sgom mthar lam gsum du
NK103(pe)022:797: pa bzhin sgom // 'dod // lam tshogs sbyor gnyis ni mthong lam la sbyor ba'i lam yin te //
NK103(pe)022:798: sa dang por de kho na nyid kyi don mthong
NK103(pe)022:799: ste rags pa mthong spang gi nyon mongs pa'i rtog
NK103(pe)022:800: pa skye 'gag dus mnyam du sbyangs pasa'ajigasa pas dang
NK103(pe)022:801: lnga dang bral // dbus mtha' las /
NK103(pe)022:802: chos kyi dbyings la ma rig pa //
NK103(pe)022:803: nyon mongs can min sgrib pa bcu //
NK103(pe)022:805: phra shes bya'i sgrib ba'i rim pa sa du dbyings
NK103(pe)022:806: rtogs pa ye shes re skye zhing sbyongs bcu yi
NK103(pe)022:807: bar // shin tu cha phra ba'i shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad mkhyen pa la //
NK103(pe)022:808: sgrib pa de mthar thug gi sa bar chad med
NK103(pe)022:809: lam rdo rje lta bu yi sbyor bas rgyun gcod
NK103(pe)022:810: do // des kun tu 'od thob pa ni rang 'dod rtogs pa'i mthar thug gi 'bras bu yin //
NK103(pe)022:811: des na ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas de la mos pa rnams drang ba'i sa yin no /
NK103(pe)022:812: sa lam bgrod du med pa la bgrod pas ye shes de'i don mi mthong bas gsang //
NK103(pe)022:813: bya brtsal med pa la brtsal bas grub pa med //
NK103(pe)022:814: bdag dang mi mthun log pa bzhin te mthar thug min no //
NK103(pe)022:815: des na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyed kyis //
NK103(pe)022:816: brtsal med chos la brtsal mi bya //
NK103(pe)022:817: bgrod med chos la rang bzhin zhog cig par gdams pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:818: rgyal ba'i w+aa tshis bdag la rgyas btab nas bsgoms
NK103(pe)022:819: pas rgyal rtags ye shes pa bdag nyid du ma
NK103(pe)022:820: rtogs pa'i phyi pas mthong ba'i kun rdzob don dam
NK103(pe)022:821: spyir mthun pas ma smos so ni //
NK103(pe)022:822: mtho 'jam dma' rtsub gsum de bzhin pad+ma rdo rje'i
NK103(pe)022:823: rigs dang gsum du 'dod de de ltar dag pas
NK103(pe)022:824: // phyi nang rdzas dag pa phyi dag pa khrus
NK103(pe)022:825: dang gtsang sbra nang dag pa sngags dang phyag rgya
NK103(pe)022:826: rdzas dag pa dkar gsum mnga' gsum gsum gyi sgor
NK103(pe)022:827: zhugs nas cho ga lnga byin rlabs drug ste bcu
NK103(pe)022:829: dam tshig sems dpa' dang lha ye shes pa rje bo dang 'bangs kyi tshul du lta ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:830: rang sa mngon gyur du rtogs pas ma lus rdo rje 'dzin du snang ba'i sa //
NK103(pe)022:831: rang gis nges par mthong yang de nyid bcos ma'i sa yin la //
NK103(pe)022:832: sa thob nas rang gis kyang rang gi skyon me long gi tshul du rtogs nas //
NK103(pe)022:833: rim pa'am cig char gyi 'jug rim gnyis gyis ma bcos pa'i sa la 'jug /
NK103(pe)022:834: rgyal thabs spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang bstan pas dus //
NK103(pe)022:835: skad cig nyid kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas par //
NK103(pe)022:836: gang gis rtogs pa'i dus na dus thams cad du //
NK103(pe)022:837: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i tshod du ldan pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:838: gzhi ye nas snod bcud 'bras bu rnam snang dang
NK103(pe)022:839: rnam snang chen por rgya ma chad yin pa'i don
NK103(pe)022:840: // kun rdzob tu yan lag dgu yis bskyed pa'i
NK103(pe)022:841: don dam mthun dam tshig pa dang ye shes sems
NK103(pe)022:842: dpa' grogs po dam par lta ba yis //
NK103(pe)022:843: mtshan ma'i lha sku dngos po ci gsal du goms
NK103(pe)022:844: pas chu zla'i tshul du rig pa snang stong dbyer
NK103(pe)022:845: med du // mthong bas mtshan ma lha grangs kyi dgongs pa'i ngo bo dang //
NK103(pe)022:846: de nyid mtshan ma rang rgyud pa med par gsal bar bsgoms pas //
NK103(pe)022:847: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa ye shes lnga grub //
NK103(pe)022:848: ye shes gcig la'ang gzugs kyi sku rigs lnga 'byung ba ste rigs pa dang ye shes /
NK103(pe)022:849: lnga lngar ldan pa'ang ting nge de gnyis kyi rnam
NK103(pe)022:850: snang dang chen por gang sgom pa de bzhin du
NK103(pe)022:852: de nyid las gdul bya'i grangs dang mthun par dal so sor sprul pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:853: gdul bya de yi rgyud la'ang byin gyis brlabs te //
NK103(pe)022:854: de la sprul pa grangs las 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de //
NK103(pe)022:855: skal ldan rnams kyi sems la 'bras bu snang ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:856: yo ga rang 'dod bsam pa yis //
NK103(pe)022:858: de dag kyang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu drang don yin
NK103(pe)022:859: gyis nges don min pas de la zhen na phyogs
NK103(pe)022:861: ma bcos ji bzhin nyid ma rtogs pas na //
NK103(pe)022:862: thams cad chos nyid rang snang ma du shar bas
NK103(pe)022:863: shes pas gsum las bcos pa de yul du byas
NK103(pe)022:864: nas ni lam dam pa la /
NK103(pe)022:865: 'jug pa 'i 'jug rim gnyis gyis 'jug pa snga ma bya ba rgyud du bstan pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)022:866: bla mas brda' don sprad pa de gdams ngag thob pas rgyal ba'i gral du bzhag pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:867: bya ba'i theg pa'i spyod pa dag la sgo gsum gis gnas te spyod //
NK103(pe)022:868: yo ga'i theg pa ltar byin rlabs lhar snang ba'i brgyud 1 pa'i lta 2 bar 'dod //
NK103(pe)022:869: bya ba ltar rtsol bas 'jug pa dang lta spyod gong 'og gnyis ga khas len //
NK103(pe)022:870: ting 'dzin yo ga'i spyod pa 'am 'dir lha 1 sngags 1 yi 1 ge /
NK103(pe)022:871: rgya'i de 1111 kho na nyid bzhi las gang gnas pa /
NK103(pe)022:872: de nyid 'bras bu lam du gyur pas 'jug pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:873: rang 'dod rtogs pa'i sa mthar thug yin par 'dod yang //
NK103(pe)022:874: ma bcos tha ma'i sa ma rtogs te 'dus byas mtshan ma'i 'bras bu yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:875: smin kyang mthar thug gi 'bras bu mi 'byung ste //
NK103(pe)022:876: bim pa ra yi 'bras bu bzhin no //
NK103(pe)022:877: cho ga lnga gsum gyis bskyed pa gtsor byed pa'i ma h+aa yo ga ni //
NK103(pe)022:878: phyi pa ltar rnam pa ma sgoms kyi gzhi ye
NK103(pe)022:879: nas 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de bzhin
NK103(pe)022:880: du lam du byed pa te //
NK103(pe)022:881: phyi rgyud ltar tha mal gyi gtsang sme la blangs
NK103(pe)022:882: dor med de mnyam par rtogs pas sha lnga dang
NK103(pe)022:883: dam rdzas lnga la lam du 'dod //
NK103(pe)022:884: gzhi nas 'bras bu yin pa'i don //
NK103(pe)022:885: bskyed pa'i lha rim pas rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:886: rdzogs pa'i rim pa stong pa rtsa thig le sgo
NK103(pe)022:887: gsum bde stong dbyer med la brten pas grub pa
NK103(pe)022:888: yin // lam gnyis ni shes rab gsum gyis grol
NK103(pe)022:889: ba dang thabs yin dbang dang gdams ngag la brten
NK103(pe)022:890: yin // pa gnyis te // de gnyis re re la'ang bskyed dang rdzogs pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:891: grol lam la'ang bzhi bskyed pa'i skyed pa lha cho ga lnga gsum gyis bskyed pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:892: bskyed pa'i rdzogs pa sngags brjod pa dang dus gcig bskyed pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:893: rdzogs pa'i bskyed pa dal bsdus te stong par bsgoms pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:894: rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa ni ye nas dag mnyam du
NK103(pe)022:895: gnas pa'i don rtogs nas rtsol med du 'jog pa'o
NK103(pe)022:896: // thabs lam la nang nang gi skyed pa'i skyed
NK103(pe)022:897: rim ni lha'i lus la 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa dang
NK103(pe)022:898: thig le sgom pa'i rim pa las byung ba dang
NK103(pe)022:899: // / skyed pa'i rdzogs pa thig le de nyid
NK103(pe)022:900: nyams sam lta ba'i rim pas rang bzhin zhu nas
NK103(pe)022:901: thig le chen por gsal ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:902: rdzogs pa'i skyed thabs de dag goms pas lus sems
NK103(pe)022:903: bde ba chen po'i nyams rtags mngon du snang ba
NK103(pe)022:904: dang / rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa mthar phyin pas 'bad
NK103(pe)022:905: rtsol mi dgos par gdags skyed thams cad dang bral
NK103(pe)022:906: dang / ba'o // dang gsang yab yum lhar bskyed
NK103(pe)022:907: la byin gyis brlab rgyan gdags sbyor ba'i brda bskul
NK103(pe)022:908: dang / ba'o // ba dang / dbang po sbyar zhing byang sems bzung ba las skyes pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:909: bzlog pa'i bde chen myong ba las goms pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:910: rten dang bral bas nyams su myong ba nyid goms pas mthar phyin pa dang bzhi'o //
NK103(pe)022:912: de gnyis re re la'ang bzhi bzhi brgyad du ldan pa dang grol lam la bzhi ste //
NK103(pe)022:913: bzhi gsum bcu gnyis dag tu shes par bya //
NK103(pe)022:914: rtogs pa'i lta ba dang lam so so'i spyod pa
NK103(pe)022:915: dang dkyil 'khor bdun la sogs pa dang dbang lnga
NK103(pe)022:916: dang dam tshig gi rtsa ba dang yan lag dang
NK103(pe)022:917: // mchog thun mong gi sgrub pa dang 'phrin las bzhi dang rgyud don bdun gyi las rim ni //
NK103(pe)022:918: phyi grol lam dang nang steng sgo dang gsang ba
NK103(pe)022:919: 'og sgo ste rgyud sde so so'i dgongs pa bdun
NK103(pe)022:920: tshan gsum mo // rang bzhin gyis 'gro ba kun
NK103(pe)022:921: la gnas pa gzhi'i rgyud dang rtsol bas 'jug pa
NK103(pe)022:923: shugs la mthar phyin 'bras bu'i rgyud drangs pas rgyud kyi ngo bo gsum du bstan no //
NK103(pe)022:924: 'jug pa dang po pa cho gas bskyed pa'i lha'i
NK103(pe)022:925: ting nge 'dzin las su rung bar sgom pa ni
NK103(pe)022:926: // bskyed pa'i bshad pa ltar rdzogs pa'i bskyed //
NK103(pe)022:927: blo che chung gi skabs dang sbyar bas blo dang gang 'tshams pa de bzhin du bsgom //
NK103(pe)022:928: dngos grub gnyis rang rig pa'i rlabs ma 'dres la der ro gcig pas rgya mtsho lta bu ni //
NK103(pe)022:929: rgyud btsings pa thobs dang rtogs pas grol ba'i yon
NK103(pe)022:930: tan gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med yongs su rdzogs pas
NK103(pe)022:931: // dus la mi ltos pas de ma thag tu tshigs med par lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:932: lus kyi nang gi rtsa rlung thig le'i lam la gang dag 'jug pa //
NK103(pe)022:933: ting nges bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i me bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang lnga la gdams ngag gi rim pas 'jug /
NK103(pe)022:934: bde ba de nyid rang la rdzogs pas rang lus de nyid kyi bde ba smin pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:935: lte ba'i sor bzhi'i 'og na gsang ba'i pho brang rtsa'i mdud pa gsum //
NK103(pe)022:936: dbyibs gru gsum gtum mo me'i dkyil 'khor los nyams
NK103(pe)022:937: bde zhing dga' ba bskyed pas 'bras ming rgyu la
NK103(pe)022:938: btags pa'o // de yang bde ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po yin no //
NK103(pe)022:939: sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dang lte ba na ldan //
NK103(pe)022:940: de'i dbus su a thung du yi rang bzhin gyis gnas pa chos nyid yin te //
NK103(pe)022:941: de'i phyi rim na rtsa dbyibs chu'i 'khor lo lta bu bzhi dang skor brgyad du ldan no //
NK103(pe)022:942: gsang thigs kyi 'grel pa ltar mchan gdab ste //
NK103(pe)022:943: chos kyi 'khor lo dag la brgyad //
NK103(pe)022:944: de'i dkyil na dngas ma chen po rtsa khrag dbugs gsum yod pa dag de'i dkyil na ste //
NK103(pe)022:945: lnga yod pa de'i dbus na thig le chen po byang chub kyi sems bzhugs so //
NK103(pe)022:946: snying khong stong gi dkyil na rtsa'i dngas ma rtsa
NK103(pe)022:947: bran rgyus pa nad ma 'dra ba brgyad la chos
NK103(pe)022:948: nyid kyi rtsa gsum dang ye shes kyi rtsa gcig
NK103(pe)022:949: / rang rgyud kyi rtsa gsum dag dang yon tan
NK103(pe)022:950: gyi rtsa gcig dang de ltar brgyad tu shes par
NK103(pe)022:951: / bya // de nyid ci 'drar sems pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:952: chos nyid kyi rtsa la 'od zer ser po gcig gnas te //
NK103(pe)022:953: de'i dbyibs zlum po'i tshul dngul zhun ma la gzhon mar gyi zol song ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)022:954: sa bon ni lha min su byol song tri snying po ni //
NK103(pe)022:955: de dag gsum gyi kha dog ni //
NK103(pe)022:956: za 'og gi gur phub pa ltar bur gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:957: ye shes rtsa la 'od mthing ka gcig gnas so //
NK103(pe)022:958: dbyibs gru bzhi zhags pa bsdogs pa'am sbrul 'khyil pa
NK103(pe)022:959: 'dra tshul le brgan lce la shel sgong brgyus pa
NK103(pe)022:960: 'dra // sa bon lha a mi n+ri snying po h'u //
NK103(pe)022:961: rang rgyud kyi rtsa la 'od dmar po gcig gnas ci 'dra na dbyibs zla gam 'dra //
NK103(pe)022:962: tshul ni sos ka'i chu la smyigs rgyu ba'am rtsi
NK103(pe)022:963: skyi'i kha la zil pa chags pa 'dra kha dog
NK103(pe)022:964: zangs ma bzhu ba la ra gan gyis rtsi song
NK103(pe)022:965: ba 'dra ba'i dpe yis shes par bya //
NK103(pe)022:966: sa bon yi dwags pre du dmyal ba snying po +aa //
NK103(pe)022:967: de yang ma rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor ba'i rgyu ste sa bon a n+ri la sogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:968: rtog pas 'i dus na ye shes te sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'o //
NK103(pe)022:969: de gnyis gnyis su med pas rang 'dres pa /
NK103(pe)022:970: byang chub sems la gnas pa'i tshul gong ma dang 'dra bas bsres pa yin zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:971: chos nyid ye shes rang rgyud yon tan rtsa bzhi'i bye brag ni 'od ser po mthing kha /
NK103(pe)022:975: rim pa kun gzhi rnam shes yid nyon yid /
NK103(pe)022:977: brgyad kyi rten ma ste 'od ser /
NK103(pe)022:978: mthing kha dmar dmar nag la rim par /
NK103(pe)022:979: rtsa dbugs khrag gi sgo lnga'i /
NK103(pe)022:980: rgyu ba bzhi yis shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:982: rtsa khrag gi snyigs ma gsum la a n+ri su
NK103(pe)022:983: tri pre du ste sa bon gnyis gnyis su rgyu'o
NK103(pe)022:984: // de yang lha mir skye ba'i kha 'dzin yid
NK103(pe)022:985: kyis byas nas sa bon a n+ri la bag chags
NK103(pe)022:986: sogs byol song lha min kun gzhi su tri yi
NK103(pe)022:987: dwags dmyal ba sgo lnga nyon yid pre du la
NK103(pe)022:988: sogs pas rnam shes brgyad 'gro drug gi tshul dang
NK103(pe)022:989: mthun te 'di ltar sems can la rang rgyud du
NK103(pe)022:990: // gnas so // gang gis bde ba gang rten
NK103(pe)022:991: sdud g.yo smin go 'byed par byed pas de bzhin
NK103(pe)022:992: // gnas so // du yin no // thig le
NK103(pe)022:993: byang chub kyi rang bzhin de yi ngang la rtag
NK103(pe)022:995: bde ba'i rtags sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams 'byung
NK103(pe)022:996: ste nam mkha'i gzugs su skye ste khams gsum thams
NK103(pe)022:997: cad tha dad ma yin bar 'gyur te //
NK103(pe)022:998: rtsa khrag dbugs drod thig le'i dngas ma dag yul lnga ye shes lngar sbyar /
NK103(pe)022:999: g.yo zhing 'phar na rtsol ba glod //
NK103(pe)022:1000: nam zhig de ltar thig le byang chub kyi sems
NK103(pe)022:1001: bar las su rung ste 'od can du gsal gyur
NK103(pe)022:1002: tsam na // gong gi snying po gsum gyi gong dang 'og gi sa bon drug gnas pa //
NK103(pe)022:1003: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od du 'bar te thigs pa la rang bzhin med par 'gro //
NK103(pe)022:1004: thig le'i rang bzhin med par thim pas rtsa khrag dbugs drod snga ma phyi ma gnas te /
NK103(pe)022:1005: rgyu ba rnams rim gyis je phra je phra la 'od du 'bar te gnas //
NK103(pe)022:1006: de ltar dbugs la sogs pa bzhi 'od du 'bar
NK103(pe)022:1007: bas rang bzhin med par 'gyur te nam mkha'i gzugs
NK103(pe)022:1009: khams gsum so so ma yin pa ye shes lhun
NK103(pe)022:1010: gyis grub rtsa bug nam mkha' 'i gzugs ltar snang
NK103(pe)022:1012: de nyid thig le byang chub kyi sems ye shes
NK103(pe)022:1013: khyab bdal kun tu bzang po nyid yin te chos
NK103(pe)022:1014: kyi sku'o // des na chos dbyings gsal ba'i go skabs 'byed ces bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1015: gsang ba'i shes rab ni yum kun tu bzang mo'i
NK103(pe)022:1016: rang bzhin gyi thig le de chos kyi dbyings yin
NK103(pe)022:1017: // gang na gnas na lte ba na rtsa gnyis
NK103(pe)022:1018: dang drug cu'i dkyil na nyi ma la bzhugs so
NK103(pe)022:1019: // // thig le las byung ba thams cad thabs
NK103(pe)022:1020: yab thig le rang bzhin med par shes rab yum
NK103(pe)022:1021: de ltar shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa thig
NK103(pe)022:1022: le la snyoms par 'jug la thig le de las
NK103(pe)022:1023: khams gsum thams cad 'byung ste de /
NK103(pe)022:1024: thams cad zhi gnyis su rgyas gdab pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK103(pe)022:1025: du gyur la de thig le chos kyi dbyings de
NK103(pe)022:1026: yin no // de la ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid du lhun gyis grub pas blta //
NK103(pe)022:1027: gong gi dwangs ma chen po'i drod mar 'phro dang
NK103(pe)022:1028: 'bar ba de steng 'og tu thim la de'i 'od
NK103(pe)022:1029: snying dngas ma chen po la thim pa'i drod des
NK103(pe)022:1030: // steng gi snying po'i thig le 'od du 'bar
NK103(pe)022:1031: bar bskul bar byas pas dbugs kyi dngas ma 'od
NK103(pe)022:1032: du 'bar nas thigs pa 'od can du gyur nas
NK103(pe)022:1033: dbugs kyi gzhi med de je zhan la rgyu ba
NK103(pe)022:1034: med pas 'bras bu rgyu ba med de /
NK103(pe)022:1035: bde ba chen po'i ra gnas pa mchod pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1036: dwangs ma chen po de'i 'od des mgrin pa'i thig le la mnyam par sbyor te thim pas //
NK103(pe)022:1037: de gang la bzhugs na rtsa drug dang bcu yi dkyil du pad+ma'i ge sar la bzhugs pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:1038: de la 'og gi drod kyis bskul bas 'od du
NK103(pe)022:1039: 'bar te dgyes pa chen po'i ro de yis ni
NK103(pe)022:1040: // lhun grub de las mi g.yo bas bde ba chen po stobs par byed ces bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1041: shes bya yul dang gzung ba rtog pa zad pa
NK103(pe)022:1042: ni thig le 'od can yin pas rnam rtog zad
NK103(pe)022:1043: pa'i ye shes zhes de la bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1045: yul thig le de rnams rang bzhin med de sgyu
NK103(pe)022:1046: mar rang snang ba ste bde ba de'i 'od ni
NK103(pe)022:1047: // rol mo ste de'i bde ba tha dag gis //
NK103(pe)022:1048: bde ba chen po'i gnas na 'ben thig le bzhugs pa la phog go //
NK103(pe)022:1049: rtsa sum cu gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil na nam mkhar song ba'i dkyil na //
NK103(pe)022:1050: zla ba la thig le byang chub kyi sems de yi mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas so //
NK103(pe)022:1051: thig le ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po yang
NK103(pe)022:1052: de yin la de ni kun gyi gtso bo chos
NK103(pe)022:1053: kyi sku phyogs // bcu dang dus bzhir ni dkyil
NK103(pe)022:1054: 'khor du mngon par rdzogs pa yang de yin pas
NK103(pe)022:1055: kyi sku phyogs // // sku gsung thugs gsum dang
NK103(pe)022:1056: yon tan phrin las gnyis su'ang thigs pa de yang
NK103(pe)022:1058: 'on kyang mgrin pa'i thig le'i 'od bde ba chen
NK103(pe)022:1059: po'i thig le la phog pas 'od du zhu nas
NK103(pe)022:1060: spyi lugs su gyur pas bde chen gyi ring du
NK103(pe)022:1061: gyur te khams gsum thams cad dbyer med du gyur
NK103(pe)022:1062: te ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su skyes te chos
NK103(pe)022:1064: kun kyang ngo bor bdag nyid gnas pa ste de
NK103(pe)022:1065: ltar gyur nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal dus
NK103(pe)022:1066: gcig mthong ba'o // skal med pa gsang ba'i thabs
NK103(pe)022:1067: kyi lam la 'jug cing gang gnas pa ni rten
NK103(pe)022:1068: can gyi bde bas rang rig bde chen de //
NK103(pe)022:1069: mtshon par byed pa rig ma'i las dang ting nge
NK103(pe)022:1070: dang ye shes kyi lha mo la rol pa las
NK103(pe)022:1072: ring lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:1073: bde ba ye shes gsal la mi rtog stong pa gnyis zung du 'jug pa //
NK103(pe)022:1074: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob pa yin yang //
NK103(pe)022:1075: de yis mthar thug gi don rnams mi mthong ste //
NK103(pe)022:1076: dper na rgyal po dang de yi cha mi 'dra ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)022:1077: rnam par shes pa dbang po la sogs pa'i rkyen bzhin bskyed pa'i blo bur du byung bas //
NK103(pe)022:1078: rang gnas rang byung gi ye shes nyid des mi rtogs te //
NK103(pe)022:1079: zhe la 'dzin cing brtags pas rang rig ye nas gnas pa'i don mi rtogs pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:1080: lha dang bde ba la sogs pa la dngos por
NK103(pe)022:1081: 'dzin pa la brtags shing zhen pa'i rang rig gis
NK103(pe)022:1082: // ye nas ma bcos pa'i lhun grub de kho na'i rang rig chen po'i don mi mthong ngo //
NK103(pe)022:1083: rang gi mthar thug gi sa yi ge 'khor lo
NK103(pe)022:1084: thob nas ma bcos pa'i sa la bcos ma'i sa
NK103(pe)022:1085: // snga ma bshad pa bzhin te rim cig car
NK103(pe)022:1086: gyis 'jug pa 'dra ste rgyal thabs kyis mthar phyin
NK103(pe)022:1087: // pa'o // rgyu 'bras can gyi theg pa thams cad mthar phyin pa a nu yo ga yang //
NK103(pe)022:1088: rang bzhin gyi snang ba ni chos kyi dbyings dang
NK103(pe)022:1089: rig pa'i ye shes dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen
NK103(pe)022:1090: po yin la // 'khrul pa'i snang ba dang gdul
NK103(pe)022:1091: bya'i 'khor gyi snang ba dang gnyis ni rang bzhin
NK103(pe)022:1092: dang lam sna tshogs su 'khrul pas rang rgyud pa'o
NK103(pe)022:1093: po yin la // // bde gshegs kyi snang ba
NK103(pe)022:1094: ni chos kyi dbyings ji bzhin pa nyid du ma
NK103(pe)022:1095: bcos par gsal zhing thugs su chud pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1096: de yang rang bzhin snang ba ni 'khor 'das kyi
NK103(pe)022:1097: chos thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir ye nas gnas pa'o
NK103(pe)022:1098: // bde gshegs kyi snang ba ni lam gyi mngon du byas pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1099: gdul bya 'khor gyi snang ba ni bstan pa blo
NK103(pe)022:1100: dang 'tsham par snang zhing 'jug pa lam pa ste
NK103(pe)022:1101: // lam de la phyi lha'i bskyed rim nang rtsa
NK103(pe)022:1102: rlung thig le gsang ba dbang dang reg ma rten
NK103(pe)022:1103: // pa gsum // de bzhin nyid la cig car
NK103(pe)022:1104: 'jug pa dang rnal 'byor lta spyod kyi rim pa'ang
NK103(pe)022:1105: ma h+aa dang de bzhin du mthun no //
NK103(pe)022:1106: rim pa 'jug pa'i tshul gyis ni //
NK103(pe)022:1107: rig pa'i rtsal ye shes sgyu ma'i skur bskyed pa
NK103(pe)022:1108: rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs par brtan par gyur nas ni
NK103(pe)022:1109: // lha rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgoms pa dang don
NK103(pe)022:1110: chos nyid mi rtog pa la 'ang 'jug par bya'o
NK103(pe)022:1111: // // mos rang rang gi mos pa tha dad
NK103(pe)022:1112: pas nang 'khor lo lnga'i bde ba yang ma h+aa'i
NK103(pe)022:1113: skabs su bstan pa de bzhin du bsgoms te //
NK103(pe)022:1114: gsang ba'i rig ma'i bde bas rtogs pa don de la dran pas bsgom mo //
NK103(pe)022:1115: lam de dag gi 'bras bu ni dbyings dang ye
NK103(pe)022:1116: shes gnyis su med pa kun tu bzang po dbye
NK103(pe)022:1118: rang gi 'dod pa'i rang sa'i 'bras bu thob mod kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1119: rdzogs chen ma rtogs pas mthar thug gi 'bras bu'i de yang ma yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1120: des na rtsol bas 'di rtogs pa la ngam e
NK103(pe)022:1121: ma'o phyogs med kyi ye shes phyogs 'dzin gyi mi
NK103(pe)022:1122: rtogs pas gsang ba'i ma bcos bla ma sa ni
NK103(pe)022:1123: theg brgyad // rtsol ba'i chu bo nyer bzhis 'jug pa'i lam gyis thob pa ma yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1124: las kyi dbang gis 'gro drug gi snod bcud so
NK103(pe)022:1125: sor zhen pa'i snang ba mi mthun par la rang
NK103(pe)022:1126: rgyud par 'thad cing bden par 'dzin pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:1127: mu stegs pa rang rang gi bsam pas rtags chad du 'dzin pas don las log pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:1128: theg brgyad kyis rang rang gi lung rigs kyi 'dod
NK103(pe)022:1129: pas phyogs med kyi dbyings la phyogs ris su bltas
NK103(pe)022:1130: // ye shes pa phyi dang dam tshig pa nang
NK103(pe)022:1131: na med pa'i thig le chen po la spro bsdu
NK103(pe)022:1132: // ched du byas // ngo bo nyid bstan cing
NK103(pe)022:1133: rtag tu med pa la sa so'i grub mtha' ngan
NK103(pe)022:1135: 'bras bu rang byung ga ye shes nyid la lam gyi rgyu yis btsal //
NK103(pe)022:1136: ma bcos pa'i chos nyid mu bzhi mtha' drug ci yang ma yin pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1137: mu mtha' cir yang 'dzin pa'i sems kyis phyogs su brtags //
NK103(pe)022:1138: lam gyis bgrod du med pa'i 'bras bu sku gsum ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1139: lam brgyad bgrod pas rang la bgrod med du gnas pa mi shes pas bslad pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1140: tshul des na ma bcos dngos po la //
NK103(pe)022:1141: rang rang gi log rtog 'dzin pa'i blo yis ni //
NK103(pe)022:1142: ji ltar bzung zhing dpyad kyang gtan la phebs pa ma yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:1143: bdag nyid chen po la bya byed gnyis med pas
NK103(pe)022:1144: ma dpyad par rang bzhin bla mas bstan pa'i don
NK103(pe)022:1146: dpyad du med pa'i sems nyid la dpyad pas lam rim las /
NK103(pe)022:1147: dpyod pa zhugs na rtog pa'i gzhi /
NK103(pe)022:1150: don rtogs pa ma yin par log ste dung dkar
NK103(pe)022:1151: las zla gcig las gzhan gnyis su lta ba bzhin
NK103(pe)022:1153: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las yul gang zhen log
NK103(pe)022:1154: rtsol ba la gsang ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste
NK103(pe)022:1155: bzhi pa'o////gsang ba rtogs byed kyi thabs ston pas de
NK103(pe)022:1156: nas zhe'o gang gis sems dpa' rdo rjes gang bas
NK103(pe)022:1157: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la ji
NK103(pe)022:1159: thugs rje'i bdag pos khyed kyi sngar gsungs pas na //
NK103(pe)022:1160: 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis rtogs pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:1161: gang bdag pa'i ngo bo sems kyi rang bzhin phyogs bral ye nas kun khyab tu gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1162: rang rang gi mthong snang la zhen pa rigs drug
NK103(pe)022:1163: rang don la log pa rtag chad rgyang phan gsum
NK103(pe)022:1164: dang rang 'dod pa'i don la sgo gyi rtsol ba
NK103(pe)022:1166: de kho na nyid sems kyi rang bzhin mi rtogs te gsang bar gsungs //
NK103(pe)022:1167: ston pa sku gsum la phyogs ris kyi ngos bzung
NK103(pe)022:1168: med pas bstan bya ston byed kyi tha snyad las
NK103(pe)022:1169: grol bas gsang // 'khor gsum po thams cad kun la gsang bas na //
NK103(pe)022:1170: de nyid de dag las khyad par du gyur pa'i thabs gang gis don de shes par 'gyur //
NK103(pe)022:1171: gang gis kyang mi rtogs na gsung gi mnga' bdag rnam snang khyed kyis kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1172: kun la gsang ba de ji ltar rtogs //
NK103(pe)022:1174: de nas gsung gi mnga' bdag gis bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:1175: rdzogs chen ma bcos pa'i theg pa chen po sems kyi rang bzhin de la //
NK103(pe)022:1176: brjod pa'i sgra dang btags pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das te brjod pa dang bral kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1177: brjod pa kun gyi ngo bor shar bas snod ldan
NK103(pe)022:1178: de kho na nyid ma bcos pa'i don rtogs par
NK103(pe)022:1179: 'dod pa yis // thun mong ma yin pa'i gtan
NK103(pe)022:1180: tshigs chos nyid rtogs pa la mi bslu ba'i tshad
NK103(pe)022:1182: de nyid gsal byed kyi rgyu mtshon cing rtogs pa'i thabs su bshad par bya ste /
NK103(pe)022:1183: bya brtsal dang bral bar ston pa'i rdzogs pa'i lung
NK103(pe)022:1184: dang rig pas chos nyid rtogs pa'i ngang du goms
NK103(pe)022:1186: dron tshegs chung la thabs che bas rtogs ba'i man ngag gi rim pa dang gsum gyis //
NK103(pe)022:1187: ye shes gsang ba'i don rtogs pa'i rig pa'i mchog yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1188: rang rang gi blo dang 'tsham par thabs chen pos
NK103(pe)022:1189: rgyud nas ston pa theg brgyad kyi lung dang bya
NK103(pe)022:1190: bral du ston pa rdzogs chen kyi lung dang /
NK103(pe)022:1191: chos nyid kyi mkha' yis kun la khyab pa byang chub sems kyi lung gis //
NK103(pe)022:1192: snang srid snod bcud ma lus pa kun sems su brda sprod pas gtan la 'bebs //
NK103(pe)022:1193: de nyid ye shes gsang ba'i ngo bo chos nyid skye med spros bral gyi klong du ston //
NK103(pe)022:1194: de nyid bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1195: dkyil 'khor snang srid ye shes rang snang du 'char
NK103(pe)022:1196: bas ston // de lta bu'i lung rig pa dang
NK103(pe)022:1197: stong pa dang bde chen gsum du snang bas ston
NK103(pe)022:1198: pa'i rgyud dag rgyal ba bka' //
NK103(pe)022:1199: yin pas ston pa kun byed nga yi bka' dang mthun no //
NK103(pe)022:1200: de ltar bstan pa'i don nyid rig pas sgra tsam
NK103(pe)022:1201: ma yin par nyams su myong bar lon pa'i tshe
NK103(pe)022:1202: na // yid ches thag chod nas sgra rjes su mi 'brang bas rig pa'i gtan tshigs so //
NK103(pe)022:1203: rnam pa gsum gyi lung gi ngo bo ni //
NK103(pe)022:1204: tshig gsum tha dad kyang nyams su dus gcig la myong bas //
NK103(pe)022:1205: sems nyid rig pa'i yon tan gyi chos su snang ba dbyer med yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1206: snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad sems su 'dus par thabs khyad par can gyis rtogs pas na //
NK103(pe)022:1207: yul shes sna tshogs su snang yang sems ma yin pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi snang ngo //
NK103(pe)022:1208: blo la ji ltar yang snang du rung ba'i chos chos can rnams ni //
NK103(pe)022:1209: he du sems la dang po ma 'gags par snang
NK103(pe)022:1210: bar du gnas tha ma der gcig pa'i phyir tha
NK103(pe)022:1211: mi dad pa rang gi sems yin te dam bca'
NK103(pe)022:1212: // snang srid ji ltar snang yang sems nyid rig pa ma yin na //
NK103(pe)022:1213: dang po sna tshogs de nyid bdag nyid rig pa
NK103(pe)022:1214: ji ltar snang bar 'gyur te snang ba des na
NK103(pe)022:1215: sems yin no // tha dad du mthong ba ni
NK103(pe)022:1216: yul sems rgyu 'bras logs pa tha dad blos brtags
NK103(pe)022:1218: de dag rgyud la zhen pa'i bag chags log pas sems dkrugs pa'i mthu snang tsam na //
NK103(pe)022:1219: don la med kyang log par brtags pa'i snang tshul mtha' yas snang ba yin ste //
NK103(pe)022:1220: dper na dung dkar po la ser por mthong ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)022:1221: de yang dung nyid ser po rang gtan ma yin na //
NK103(pe)022:1222: ji ltar du dung de la ser po mthong bar 'gyur //
NK103(pe)022:1223: des na ser po'ang yin par 'dod na //
NK103(pe)022:1224: dung la ser por bden pa yod pa yin na //
NK103(pe)022:1225: mig ma 'khrul pas shes pas gtan tshigs cis ser po mi mthong //
NK103(pe)022:1226: thog ma med pa nas zhen cing rtog pa'i 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i dbang gis na //
NK103(pe)022:1227: rang gi rig pa mthong yang grub matha'i gzhung gis
NK103(pe)022:1228: brtags pas mi mthun pa sna tshogs pa dag tu
NK103(pe)022:1230: des na ser po'ang yin 'dod na //
NK103(pe)022:1231: dang po bla mas snang ba sems su bstan pas
NK103(pe)022:1232: sems la mtshan ma'i dngos por zhen pa'i rang rig
NK103(pe)022:1233: yin ste // yul dang sems gnyis pa med par mthong pas rang rig yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1234: sems de gnyis par skye ba med pa chos nyid
