NK103(pe)022:1235: du bstan pas yul shes gnyi ga med par mthong
NK103(pe)022:1236: pa ste // de nyid kyang mtshan gzhi gnyis pa
NK103(pe)022:1237: med pa'i de la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis med
NK103(pe)022:1238: pa ste // ni // mi srid de dper na
NK103(pe)022:1239: mtshan gzhi me med pa'i mtshan nyid tsha ba mi
NK103(pe)022:1240: srid bzhin du de la'ang mi zhen no //
NK103(pe)022:1241: 'o na stong pa 'ba' zhig go zhe na gsum
NK103(pe)022:1242: pa de nyid bde bar bstan pas ni zhen pa'i
NK103(pe)022:1244: bde ba'i don la rtag tu zhen pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)022:1245: gnyis med dang lha dang bde ba gang la zhen
NK103(pe)022:1246: pas kyang ma bcos rnal ma'i rang rig gi don
NK103(pe)022:1247: mi mthong ngo // de nyid ma bcos rnal mar bstan pas /
NK103(pe)022:1248: bcos 'dzin blo las grol bar rtogs pas /
NK103(pe)022:1249: bzhi pa ma bcos rang rig ni //
NK103(pe)022:1250: ched du byas pa'i ngos gzung med pas phyogs su 'dzin pa'i grub mtha' gang yang min //
NK103(pe)022:1251: pa nyid rgya mtsho rlabs su shar ba ltar chos
NK103(pe)022:1252: thams cad du ye shes kyi rol pa ma 'gags
NK103(pe)022:1254: bla ma'i zhal nas snyan rgyud rim par brgyud pa'i man ngag gis /
NK103(pe)022:1256: rol pa'i ye shes rang snang bas rig pas gzhan
NK103(pe)022:1257: pa med pas de nyid phyogs ris las grol ba
NK103(pe)022:1258: dang // ma rtogs par snang brtags rang rgyud pa
NK103(pe)022:1259: dang grub matha'i rtogs pa'i zhen pa sna tshogs pa
NK103(pe)022:1260: dag khyad par med ces de gnyis kyi //
NK103(pe)022:1261: bye brag ma shes par gang la'ang yid ches med
NK103(pe)022:1262: pa lta spyod log pa ni gti mug gi blo
NK103(pe)022:1263: // des na bla ma'i gdams ngag byang chub sems kyi lung gis ni //
NK103(pe)022:1264: snang srid thams cad sems su rang snang ba'i rtags nyams 'char bas gtan la phebs pa //
NK103(pe)022:1265: des na lung gsum ni thams cad byang chub sems su gtan la 'bebs byed kyi lung yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1266: ma bcos pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin gzhi bzhag nyid shes bya yin la //
NK103(pe)022:1267: snang srid byang chub sems kyi rang rig pa'i nyams bde chen phyogs bral du mthong bas ni //
NK103(pe)022:1268: byang chub snying por bskal pa dang skye ba du
NK103(pe)022:1269: mar sbyang mi dgos par skad cig de ma thag
NK103(pe)022:1270: / tu bla ma'i byin rlabs dang man ngag la
NK103(pe)022:1271: brten nas rig pa'i nyams tshad ma nyid kyis shes
NK103(pe)022:1272: / so // rig pa'i tshad ma de nyid kyis yid ches ma skyes par de dang bral na //
NK103(pe)022:1273: thun mong gi lung rigs dang sgra yi tshad mas brgyud pa'i thabs ci bstan kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1274: sgra yi sa mtshon pa'i don yid la byed pa dang gang zag de phrad nas //
NK103(pe)022:1275: sgra spyi la don du zhen pa'i rjes su blos
NK103(pe)022:1276: rtog par 'gyur bas sgra rten yid la byed de
NK103(pe)022:1277: don // spyi'i rnam pa la rtogs pa de gnas pa yin kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1278: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni de ma yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1279: rig pa'i nyams tshad mas don rang gi mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)022:1280: yul dang yul can med par rang gsal du mthong
NK103(pe)022:1281: na // mthong ba'i dus de nyid na gtan la
NK103(pe)022:1282: 'bebs pa'i rig pa'i don thun mong ma yin pa
NK103(pe)022:1283: na // dang ldan pas // theg pa gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)022:1284: lung dang rigs pa la sogs pa rtogs pa'i yan
NK103(pe)022:1285: lag gi tshad ma rnams 'dir mi dgos so //
NK103(pe)022:1286: gcig gi chos nyid rtogs pa de ltar du mthong
NK103(pe)022:1287: thos dran rtog rgyu ba ma lus pa de ni
NK103(pe)022:1288: rtogs pa de bzhin du mthun pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1289: de ltar rtogs pa'i nyams de la slob tshul ni 'og ma ltar rim pa ma yin te //
NK103(pe)022:1290: rim par ma bgrod par rtogs grol dus cig char du mthar phyin par 'jug pa'i sa dang lam //
NK103(pe)022:1291: de bzhin du 'khor 'das cir snang yang gzhi las ma g.yos pas //
NK103(pe)022:1292: lam mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhi las g.yos pa med pa ste /
NK103(pe)022:1293: de dbang po yang rab kyi dbang du gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:1294: ji snyed pa'i chos ma lus pa rdzogs pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin la ni //
NK103(pe)022:1295: bla ma'i man ngag gis brda' don phrad pas mthar phyin par rtogs kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1296: chu la ral gri btab pa ltar slar 'khrul rtog
NK103(pe)022:1297: 'byung ba ni thog ma med pa nas nges par
NK103(pe)022:1298: 'dzin pa'i bag chags stug po la zhen pa yis
NK103(pe)022:1299: // rtog pa skye lugs gsum byang chub kyi sems su ngo shes pa'i lta ba la //
NK103(pe)022:1300: blo yi che chung gi bye brag gis bsam gyis
NK103(pe)022:1301: mi khyab pa ni nyams kyi mang na 'khrul pa'i
NK103(pe)022:1302: shes pa skye ba'i rim pa dang po gnyis pa
NK103(pe)022:1303: gsum pa dang / lugs gsum yin la de yang blos /
NK103(pe)022:1304: mthong ba'i snang ba sna tshogs pa'i rig pa'i nyams kyi rim pa //
NK103(pe)022:1305: skye tshul ni dang po sems gnas pa'i ting nge
NK103(pe)022:1306: 'dzin ni brtag mi thub cing gnas su mi 'dod
NK103(pe)022:1307: de ri gzar po'i g.yo ba'i nyams chu drag po
NK103(pe)022:1308: 'bab pa'i dpe yis don de bstan te de nyid
NK103(pe)022:1309: tha mal pa la med pa nyams pa yin no
NK103(pe)022:1310: // cung zad gnas la myur du 'phro ba dang
NK103(pe)022:1311: de bas dal goms par gnas bas 'bab chu'i drag
NK103(pe)022:1312: // dal dang 'dra'o // nyams rim gnyis pa la
NK103(pe)022:1313: ni skyon rnams rang grol te rtogs pa'i ngang las
NK103(pe)022:1314: brtan pa'i nyams mi g.yo ba ra gnas pa ni
NK103(pe)022:1315: // dal dang 'dra'o // / dper na rgya mtsho'i
NK103(pe)022:1316: steng na rlabs rgyu yang gting 'dom bdun man chad
NK103(pe)022:1317: g.yo ba med pa bzhin du mi g.yo ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:1318: gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni gong ma gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i ste mthar phyin pa nyams so //
NK103(pe)022:1319: mnyam pa nyid dang ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i nyams yin te //
NK103(pe)022:1320: 'khor 'das kyi snang ba thams cad rnam rtog yin
NK103(pe)022:1321: te cir yang mi lta bas ji lta bur yang
NK103(pe)022:1322: ma gzigs te / dran pa dang phyogs 'dzin gyi rtog pa kun spangs te //
NK103(pe)022:1323: lhun gyis grub par gnas pas rtsol bral du bzhag pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1324: rin chen brgyud pas lta ba shes pa'i thabs la yang //
NK103(pe)022:1325: slob dpon dang slob ma'i bye brag gnyis dang //
NK103(pe)022:1326: gdams pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang tug phrad kyi dus gsum gyi tshod ldan dang //
NK103(pe)022:1327: sku gsum du bstan pa'i don la blo ma bcos par bzhag pa'i tshul lo //
NK103(pe)022:1328: slob dpon de yi thun mong khyad par gyi yon tan dang gnyis su dbye ba dang //
NK103(pe)022:1329: phrin las gnyis dang ldan pa dang dam tshig dang ldan pa'i don rnams ston pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1330: sngags phyi nang gi rgyud sde drug dang mdo sde
NK103(pe)022:1331: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gsum thugs la rdzogs shing
NK103(pe)022:1333: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bka' rgyud dang slob dpon gyis
NK103(pe)022:1334: gzhung dang rigs pa'i so so'i 'dod pa dang bral
NK103(pe)022:1336: dman pa'i bcos ma'i dbang dang 'og ma'i grub mtha'
NK103(pe)022:1337: shes nas de blo spangs ba'i khyad par 'di nyid
NK103(pe)022:1338: kyi lta spyod la sogs pa kun mkhyen pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1339: rig pa'i ye shes phyogs med rtogs pa'i shes rab
NK103(pe)022:1340: dang ting nge 'dzin nyid la dus thams cad du
NK103(pe)022:1342: zang zing gi rdzas dang lo ka'i gnyen dang 'brel
NK103(pe)022:1343: ba'i ngor man ngag mi gtong ba ni chu srin
NK103(pe)022:1344: gyi sder mo sa zin pa mi gtong ba bzhin
NK103(pe)022:1345: no // snod med la man ngag mi ster kyang
NK103(pe)022:1346: thugs rje phyogs ris su mi mdzad par gang gis
NK103(pe)022:1347: 'dul ba ltar kun la snyoms par don mdzad kyang
NK103(pe)022:1348: no // // dman pa'i sa bcu gnyug ma sangs
NK103(pe)022:1349: rgyas thams cad kyang thabs 'di la re thag las
NK103(pe)022:1350: pas de blang pa'i sa ru yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1351: slob dpon gyi dbye ba ni rnam pa gnyis su bstan te //
NK103(pe)022:1352: snang srid bde ba mtshon pa'i brda ru shes nas
NK103(pe)022:1353: slob ma'i sems nyid don dang sprod pa'i slob dpon
NK103(pe)022:1354: ni // rang gi rgyud rnam par rtogs pas ma
NK103(pe)022:1355: bcos par rtogs pa'i gdeng gis de nyid rnam par
NK103(pe)022:1356: ni // dag pa la // rtogs pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i sgra tshig gis //
NK103(pe)022:1357: slob ma rang la gnas pa'i ma bcos pa'i ye
NK103(pe)022:1358: shes rang rig pa'i ngo bo mngon du ston nus
NK103(pe)022:1359: pas rang bzhin // skye ba med pa'i don de brda yis don de nyid dang sprad //
NK103(pe)022:1360: de ltar 'dzin med du rtogs pa ma yin na
NK103(pe)022:1361: gang du zhen pa'i brda don kun phral bas zhen
NK103(pe)022:1362: pa med do // gang gis don ma nor bar
NK103(pe)022:1363: nges par rtogs pa'i nang rang rig gi slob dpon
NK103(pe)022:1364: pa med do // gyis // rang rgyud las /
NK103(pe)022:1365: gang la bstan tha dad ma yin pa'i slob ma de nyid la //
NK103(pe)022:1367: ston byed kyi thabs sgra dang tshad ma mi mnga' bar //
NK103(pe)022:1369: de kho na nyid ji bzhin par gnas pa'i rig pa'i ngo bo de nyid bstan pas //
NK103(pe)022:1370: yul dang shes pa gang du'ang mi rtog par phyogs
NK103(pe)022:1371: med rang gsal du brda mjal go gang ltar rtogs
NK103(pe)022:1373: bde bar gshegs pa sku gsum po kun gyi ngo bo 'ang yin la //
NK103(pe)022:1374: khams gsum gyi sems can ma lus pa kun gyis
NK103(pe)022:1375: dngos po'i gnas lugs kyi gzhi 'ang de yin no
NK103(pe)022:1376: // de ltar ye nas gnas pa de yi stobs
NK103(pe)022:1377: kyis thabs la brten pas don de gsal bar rtogs
NK103(pe)022:1378: // zhing // dran rtogs ci skyes pa de nyid
NK103(pe)022:1379: ma bcos bde chen du rtogs pa'i ngang du goms
NK103(pe)022:1381: don ji ltar rnams bar rig cing rtogs pa'i klong las mi 'da' bas phyag rgya can no //
NK103(pe)022:1382: de'i ngang las mi g.yo ba ni cis she na
NK103(pe)022:1383: 'khrul pa rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i sman chen
NK103(pe)022:1384: gyis // tha mal dang rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal gyi
NK103(pe)022:1385: gcong snying nyid rig pa'i ye shes phyogs med nyid
NK103(pe)022:1386: gyis // du spar ba'o // de ltar rtogs pa
