NK103(pe)022:1388: gyis // du spar ba'o // ste // gang gis
NK103(pe)022:1389: sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis1
NK103(pe)022:1390: gyis // du spar ba'o // ste // // dpe
NK103(pe)022:1391: ji ltar gzigs na dug chen sman du btul ba
NK103(pe)022:1392: gyis // du spar ba'o // ste // // ltar1
NK103(pe)022:1393: // gang 'khor 1ba'i 'khrul pa rnams rang byung gi
NK103(pe)022:1394: ye shes snying po'i don nyid du 1gzigs1111 //
NK103(pe)022:1395: ma lus pa'i snying po don gyi de kho na nyid ni ji lta bu zhe na /
NK103(pe)022:1396: de ni phyogs gang ltar yang mi 'dug cing bden rdzun ci yang ma yin pas na //
NK103(pe)022:1397: thams cad ji lta bar mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa de la //
NK103(pe)022:1398: shes bya rnam bden par gzigs pa'ang mi mnga' ba yin la //
NK103(pe)022:1399: de bzhin du brdzun par mkhyen pa yang min //
NK103(pe)022:1400: 'khos 'das thams cad bden rdzun gang du yang ma mkhyen pas na //
NK103(pe)022:1401: de la snying po don gyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1402: gang du rgyu de ma bcos par rtogs pa'i ngang
NK103(pe)022:1403: du gnas pa'i thugs ye shes lhun grub kyi phrin
NK103(pe)022:1404: las dang ldan pa can no //
NK103(pe)022:1405: thabs gzhan cis kyang bcos pa med pas rkyen dang /
NK103(pe)022:1407: 'khrul pa gdod nas dag pas ma bcos par rtogs pa'i chos nyid kyi ngang la //
NK103(pe)022:1408: dngos po dran pa'i rkyen gyis man ngag gi de bzhin du goms pas gnas //
NK103(pe)022:1409: 'bad rtsol med par lhun grub rang rig tu gsal ba'i sems la gnas 'jog gi rtsol ba med //
NK103(pe)022:1410: nyams dang rtogs goms kyi ngo bo ni rang byung
NK103(pe)022:1411: gi ye shes nyid la rgyu rkyen kyi rten dang
NK103(pe)022:1412: 'bral bas med // phyogs 'dzin gang yang mi gnas
NK103(pe)022:1413: pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa la phyi nang gi ris
NK103(pe)022:1415: de'i yon tan gyi bye brag ye shes lngar snang
NK103(pe)022:1416: bzhi stong nyid kyi pa'i ye shes la ni dngos
NK103(pe)022:1417: po rang rgyud pa'i phyogs 'dzin ngo bo med //
NK103(pe)022:1418: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni //
NK103(pe)022:1419: shes bya kun rang gsal ba la mngon du sgrib pa'i phyogs med pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:1420: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni de kho na nyid la che chung gis bzang ngan med pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1421: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes ni phyogs bral gyi
NK103(pe)022:1422: rig pa nyid phyogs thams cad du ma 'dres par
NK103(pe)022:1423: gsal // bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes don
NK103(pe)022:1424: thams cad lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa'i thugs rje'i
NK103(pe)022:1425: gsal // dngos po // de dag kyang gong gi
NK103(pe)022:1426: rang byung gi ye shes thig le nyag gcig la
NK103(pe)022:1427: gsal // dngos po // // yon tan gyi ldog cha res mings grangs du mar bgrangs pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1428: 'og ma las khyad par gsum gyi spags te /
NK103(pe)022:1429: rang rig pa nyid la yul du grub pa med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1430: dmigs pa'i yul gyis bskyed pa'i 'og ma ye shes lta bu ni de nyid min //
NK103(pe)022:1431: rang byung nyid la skyed byed kyi rgyu med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1432: tshogs gnyis kyi rgyu las bskyed pa'i ye shes ni 'dir min //
NK103(pe)022:1433: lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes nyid la nyi ma dang 'od bzhin du rtsol ba med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1434: rtsol bas 'i chu bo nyer bzhi bskyed cing bsgrubs pa'i ye shes ni min no //
NK103(pe)022:1435: dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i mtha' dbus med pa'i rang byung ye shes de'i rang bzhin la //
NK103(pe)022:1436: phyogs dang ris med par kun la khyab par ye
NK103(pe)022:1437: nas brdal ba la rtogs goms kyi gdeng dang ldan
NK103(pe)022:1438: pas ched du 'bad rtsol med pas rang bzhin lhun
NK103(pe)022:1439: gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1440: gdod nas rnam par dag pa'i dbyings gong du bstan
NK103(pe)022:1441: pa'i phrin las kyi dgongs pa la gnas bzhin du
NK103(pe)022:1442: // de nyid rgya ma chad pas yang la phyogs
NK103(pe)022:1443: ris med par snyoms pa'i thugs rje ji ltar mthun
NK103(pe)022:1445: mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba mos pa ji snyed pa gang gi ngo dag tu //
NK103(pe)022:1446: thabs kyi khyad par gang la 'tsham pa'i thugs rje
NK103(pe)022:1447: mthun par 'byung zhing de dag gis 'dul bar snang
NK103(pe)022:1448: ngo // gang dang phrad pa ni de'i skal ba
NK103(pe)022:1449: dang ldan pa yin te gdul bya gnas pa 'khor
NK103(pe)022:1450: ba ji srid de srid du na //
NK103(pe)022:1451: mtha' yas pa'i thugs rje'ang thabs dang dus kyang gdul bya de bzhin du 'byung ngo //
NK103(pe)022:1452: gdul bya rang gi rig pa las ma rtogs pa
NK103(pe)022:1453: gang yang mi gnas na de nyid rang cir yang
NK103(pe)022:1454: mi dmigs pas gdul bya 'dul byed ma grub pas
NK103(pe)022:1455: thugs rje'i mdzad pa ga la 'char //
NK103(pe)022:1456: gang zhig skal ldan gdul bya la //
NK103(pe)022:1457: thugs rje gzhan nas 'char ba med pa las gzhan
NK103(pe)022:1458: zhig nas 'char zhing skyobs par 'dod pa de nis
NK103(pe)022:1459: // rang nyid thugs rjer 'char mi 'char kun gyi ngo bor snang ba de ma rtogs te //
NK103(pe)022:1460: gzung ba dang 'dzin pas bdag gzhan tha dad du 'khrul pa'i blo yis brtags pa mi grol lo //
NK103(pe)022:1461: gal te thugs rje bdag nyid las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas las 'char ba gcig yin na //
NK103(pe)022:1462: yul sdug bsngal drag po'i yis nyen pa 'khor ba pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1463: mi skyob par 'dug pas duhkha las skyobs pa'i rgyal
NK103(pe)022:1464: ba thugs rje chen po mnga' ba yal lam ci
NK103(pe)022:1465: yin // dus nam zhig rang nyid kyi rgyud dag nas grol tsam na //
NK103(pe)022:1466: bdag la thugs rje gzhan gyis bskyab mi dgos pa des ci zhig bgyi //
NK103(pe)022:1467: las dag ma dag gis dbang gis rtogs pa phra
NK103(pe)022:1468: rags dang ldan pa'i gdul bya dag ma dag gi
NK103(pe)022:1469: ngo la gzhan nas snang mod kyi rtogs pa'i ngo
NK103(pe)022:1470: bo la ye nas rig pa'i thugs rje ma bcos
NK103(pe)022:1471: pa de nyid de ltar 'char de ltar phan 'dogs
NK103(pe)022:1472: pa nyid 'gro 'dul thugs rje'i phrin las so //
NK103(pe)022:1473: dam tshig ni rang bzhin gyi 'dod pa phun sum
NK103(pe)022:1474: tshogs pa 'byung bas yid bzhin gyi rin po che
NK103(pe)022:1475: dang 'dra ste yon tan gyi dapa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1476: 'khor ba duhkha yi rgya mtsho mtha' med kyi pha
NK103(pe)022:1477: rol tu sgrol ba'i gru dang 'dra ste dam tshig
NK103(pe)022:1479: ma bcos rnal ma'i don gyi rang rig pa'i chos nyid dbang gis rtogs pa'i ngang de la //
NK103(pe)022:1480: skad cig tsam yang mi 'gyur bar ye shes de
NK103(pe)022:1481: kho na nyid du gsal bar goms pa ma yengs
NK103(pe)022:1482: par gnas pa ni thun mong gi //
NK103(pe)022:1483: rtsol ba'i dam tshig dang bral ba rang gnas rig pa'i don las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig go //
NK103(pe)022:1484: thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig srung ba dang mi ldan pa'i rdo rje slob dpon de //
NK103(pe)022:1485: mdo sde'i bka' phyi nang gi rgyud sde'i tshig don
NK103(pe)022:1486: mtha' dag la sbyangs pas mkhas shing shes rab gsal
NK103(pe)022:1487: ba yang // dper na sbrel ma g.yang du gcig
NK103(pe)022:1488: gis gcig khrid de 'gre ba bzhin du nyes pa
NK103(pe)022:1489: can des khrid pa'i slob dpon bdag dang gzhan la
NK103(pe)022:1490: gzhan slob ma gnyis ka rdo rje'i dmyal ba khab
NK103(pe)022:1491: tu 'gro ba'i skyon tshe tshad rgyud sde 'ga' zhig
NK103(pe)022:1492: ba yang // las bshad pa'o // des na gong
NK103(pe)022:1493: du bstan pa'i dam tshig gi gzhung dang ldan pa'i
NK103(pe)022:1494: ba yang // las bshad pa'o // slob dpon ni
NK103(pe)022:1495: // 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i chos brgyad thag ring
NK103(pe)022:1496: du gyur pas de'i ngor chos mi gtong //
NK103(pe)022:1497: dad pas 'bul ba ma bkag kyang zhen chags dang
NK103(pe)022:1498: 'brel pa yis rdzas kyi ched du gnyer bas bshad
NK103(pe)022:1499: pa ma yin // bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa'i las ci yang mi byed //
NK103(pe)022:1500: thugs rje kun la snyoms pa'i par khyab thugs kyis gnas //
NK103(pe)022:1501: 'khor ba bden med du rtogs pas 'jig rten gyi
NK103(pe)022:1502: gnyen 'brel pha ma la sogs pa'i ched mi byed
NK103(pe)022:1503: // skyon de dag dang bral bas chos thams cad /
NK103(pe)022:1504: ma bcos mnyam pa'i dbyings la blos bsgyur yang mi 'gyur bar brtan pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1505: ye shes rtogs pa'i gdeng dang ldan na spyod pa
NK103(pe)022:1506: rtsing zhib med kyi de dag gis ma zin par
NK103(pe)022:1507: // chags sdang gis zhen pa'i las mi byed //
NK103(pe)022:1508: 'o na spyod lam la blang dor byung ba rdzogs chen dang 'gal zhe na /
NK103(pe)022:1509: sems nyid gnas lugs dang de rtogs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1510: gnang ba dang bkag pa'i chos yod pa ma yin pas khyad med kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1511: phyin ci log la zhen pas ye shes ma rtogs par //
NK103(pe)022:1512: lhag pa'i dge ba spyod pa 'og ma pa dang mthun par gtso cher 'dzin dgos //
NK103(pe)022:1513: ci spyod pa de nyid rtogs goms kyis don dang ldan na mchog yin pas legs pa che'o //
NK103(pe)022:1514: slob ma snod du rung mi rung gi bye brag gis gnyis su ston pa dag la //
NK103(pe)022:1515: snang ba ma lus pa'i brda slob ma'i rig pas
NK103(pe)022:1516: don bla ma'i thabs kyis sprad pa'i slob ma ni
NK103(pe)022:1517: // ngan pa bzhi las log pa'i snod dang ldan
NK103(pe)022:1518: pa gong du bstan pa'i dam tshig dang bla ma
NK103(pe)022:1519: dang man ngag la gces spras su 'dzin dgos pa
NK103(pe)022:1520: // la // ma bcos don gyi gdengs med par
NK103(pe)022:1521: sems nyid dag sar gsungs pa'i kha 'byams tshig la
NK103(pe)022:1523: dam tshig dang rnam par dkar ba'i las slangs te mi srung bas tha mal pa'i sems yin la //
NK103(pe)022:1524: rang gi rgyud ngan pas rigs yon tan longs spyod
NK103(pe)022:1525: kyis dregs pas bla ma dang grogs la brnyas pa
NK103(pe)022:1526: dang // theg pa so so ma thos pas rmongs
NK103(pe)022:1527: te shes rab sbram pas man ngag gi blang dor
NK103(pe)022:1529: bla ma'i man ngag gi bcud chen gzhan la spel bas 'dzag pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:1530: ye nas blo 'phangs dma' bas shes rab gsum la mi sbyor ba dang //
NK103(pe)022:1531: 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i khe dang grags pa che ba rgyur man ngag sgrub pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:1532: mu chor smra zhing mi mkhas kyang mkhas pa bla ma'i sa 'dzin par 'dod la //
NK103(pe)022:1533: slob dpon rang gi srog ltar tu gces par mi 'dzin pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:1534: 'khor bas mi 'jig pas man ngag bsgrub byar mi sems par spel byar sems de dag la //
NK103(pe)022:1535: rdzogs pa chen po'i rna brgyud kyi man ngag bstan par byas na //
NK103(pe)022:1536: dper na lho nub dam shod gling gi dur khrod du //
NK103(pe)022:1537: mkha' 'gro rna nyan 'du ba bzhin du dam can rnams 'dus nas //
NK103(pe)022:1538: 'chi ba'i dus kyi sngon rol du dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyis srog bcad de //
NK103(pe)022:1539: sha khrag dngos su za bar byed pa'i skyon yod
NK103(pe)022:1540: pas gzhung nas gsungs pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan
NK103(pe)022:1542: rang gi lus kyi grib ma bzhin du drung du 'khor yang drag po'am thabs kyis spang bar bya //
NK103(pe)022:1543: gsod pas lus sems 'bral bar snang yang man ngag khar dbyung ba min /
NK103(pe)022:1544: 'khon pa dang 'du byed ci byung yang snga ma'i
NK103(pe)022:1545: las kyis byung bas de dang bral kyang yun gyi
NK103(pe)022:1546: sgrib pa dang 'phral gyi rkyen gnyis kar mi 'gyur
NK103(pe)022:1555: ser sna chung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan der
NK103(pe)022:1556: dag dang ldan pa'i slob ma ni shin tu nyung
NK103(pe)022:1557: bas // stong gsum btsal yang gcig 'ga' ldan //
NK103(pe)022:1558: nub pa dang rtsod pa dang the tshom gyis rgyur
NK103(pe)022:1559: 'gyur bas mang yang gsum las 'da' bar mi bya
NK103(pe)022:1560: // rgyal thabs dbang gi man ngag ru'i dgongs pa
NK103(pe)022:1561: 'char du rung ba'i rgyal thebs rigs nges pa gcig
NK103(pe)022:1562: // la bstan no // bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol nas tshogs bsags shing //
NK103(pe)022:1563: rdzogs chen gyi don dang theg pa bcos ma rnams la sbyangs sbyangs pa' 'phro can ni //
NK103(pe)022:1564: ye shes gsang ba'i snod ldan du basngagasa pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1565: dbang po chig chod la ni dper na /
NK103(pe)022:1566: sgo nga'i nang gi khyung phyug gshog pa rdzogs pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)022:1567: 'khor ba 'khrul ba'i dus nyid du gzhi'i rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1568: sgong nga chag nas ma bu mnyam par ni mkha'
NK103(pe)022:1569: la 'phur ba ltar du rang bzhin ma nor bar
NK103(pe)022:1570: rtogs pas sangs rgyas dang dgongs pa dbyer med du
NK103(pe)022:1571: gyur pas ma bcos bla ma'i sa non pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1572: lha dang lha ma yin gyis rgya mtsho'i ba drubs
NK103(pe)022:1573: pa bcud 'dus pa las bdud rtsi byung ba bzhin
NK103(pe)022:1574: du // rgyal ba'i bka' theg pa ma lus pa
NK103(pe)022:1575: yi bcud 'dus pa'i rdzogs chen rna brgyud spyi blugs
NK103(pe)022:1576: du // 'di // snod bshad pa ltar du ldan
NK103(pe)022:1577: pa ngang ring ba tshul shes pa rang bzhin bzang
NK103(pe)022:1578: ba gcig la bstan par bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1579: dbang bskur ba'i thabs dang slob bu'i snod brtag pa'i cho ga dang //
NK103(pe)022:1580: rtogs don 'dod par nus la gsol ba gdab pa
NK103(pe)022:1581: dang rgyal tshab tu gnang ba sbyin pa bzhi ni
NK103(pe)022:1582: sku gsum thug phrad du ngo sprad pa'i sngon du
NK103(pe)022:1584: mtshon bya don gyi dbang ni dus gsum gyi bde
NK103(pe)022:1585: bar gshegs pa ma lus pa'i dgongs pa rtogs dka'
NK103(pe)022:1587: srid pa gsum gyi sems can kun la gdod ma nas lhun grub tu gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1588: snod ldan gang gis de ji lta bar thabs kyis rig cing rtogs par 'gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:1589: theg pa thams cad kyi dbang rnams ma lus pa
NK103(pe)022:1590: 'di la dus gcig tu rdzogs pas kun gyi mchog
NK103(pe)022:1592: srid pa khams gsum kun la gdod nas gnas pas ye dbang du rtogs pas bskur //
NK103(pe)022:1593: de ltar rang dbang dam par gnas pas de thob tu rung ba'i snod du byas kyang //
NK103(pe)022:1594: gzhi nas dbang thob pa de la 'og ma ltar rtsol bas bskur 'dir mi dgos so //
NK103(pe)022:1595: de nyid rtogs pa'i thabs pra khrid drug dang sprad
NK103(pe)022:1596: pa gsum gyi thabs kyis ngo shes par byas la
NK103(pe)022:1597: // theg brgyad bcos ma'i dbang yid sbyor ba'am le'u bzhi par bstan pa rnal ma'i dbang nyid //
NK103(pe)022:1598: gdul bya gang la mos pa skye ba dang mthun pa'i thabs kyi sgo nas bstan te //
NK103(pe)022:1599: bshad rgyu de'ang klong ltar theg pa rang rang gi thabs sbyor bcos ma'i sgo nas ni //
NK103(pe)022:1600: ji ltar na 'phrul gyi me long rgyal po me
NK103(pe)022:1601: long gi gdong pa can gyis bltas pas bzhin du
NK103(pe)022:1602: bstan // des rtogs pa'i dgos pa'i don ni rnal ma'i brgyud nas rtogs pa don du byas //
NK103(pe)022:1603: don rtogs pa'i thabs bcos ma'i sbyor ba de yang //
NK103(pe)022:1604: theg pa so so'i tshig dang des mtshams gyi don
NK103(pe)022:1605: gyi khyad par ma 'dres par bstan pa yin ste
NK103(pe)022:1606: // de'i dgos pa'i don ni gong ma'i rnal ma dbang gi don la 'jug pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:1607: ji skad du brjod pa'i don ni chos thams cad
NK103(pe)022:1608: rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems su bstan cing mthong
NK103(pe)022:1609: ba'o // rnal ma ni dbang gi ma bcos pa'i gzhi nyid ji lta bar ston pa yin te //
NK103(pe)022:1610: lhun grub ring rnam pa la rnyed gsum gyi don rtogs pa la 'jug pa de la'ang //
NK103(pe)022:1611: rim par rtogs pa la 'jug pa ni mngon sum
NK103(pe)022:1612: bzhin sku gsum dang mngon rdzogs rtogs pa'i brten nas
NK103(pe)022:1613: sa gzhi yis na pa so //
NK103(pe)022:1614: bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun grub gsum dang sku gsum gyi dgongs pa //
NK103(pe)022:1615: gdod nas rtsol med du lhun gyis grub pa'i rang byung gi //
NK103(pe)022:1616: ye shes kyis thams cad du khyab pa'i nyi ma'i snying por shar bas thams cad ye shes su //
NK103(pe)022:1617: rang gsal ba la rtog pa dang matha'i mun pa
NK103(pe)022:1618: ye nas dag /'khor 'das ma lus thams cad 'phro
NK103(pe)022:1619: zhing 'dus pa'i thig le chen po nyid kyi rol
NK103(pe)022:1620: pa ji ltar shar kyang bdag nyid las //
NK103(pe)022:1621: mi g.yo ba nyid phyogs 'dzin gyi rnam rtog gi yul las 'das pa yin la //
NK103(pe)022:1622: yul rgyu dang 'bras bur zhen pa'i rtogs pas der 'dzin cing //
NK103(pe)022:1623: yang dag pa'i don mi shes pas sgyu ma'i 'khrul
NK103(pe)022:1624: pa gzung 'dzin gyi blo yis rgyud bcings pa de
NK103(pe)022:1625: dag kyang chos nyid rang snang las mi 'gyur bar
NK103(pe)022:1626: rang gsal bas ma bcos pa'i nyi ma dag yin
NK103(pe)022:1627: te // rgyu chen dang byed pa po gzhan gyis
NK103(pe)022:1628: ma brtsal bar ji bzhin pa'i rang bzhin nyid thams
NK103(pe)022:1629: cad du rang snang bas na thams cad der ro
NK103(pe)022:1630: gcig pas snying po'i sems de las gzhan pa'i gol
NK103(pe)022:1632: dper na rgya mtsho rlabs su shar bas rlabs chur 'dus pa ltar /
NK103(pe)022:1633: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang byung gi ye
NK103(pe)022:1634: shes cis kyang mi sgrib pas gsal ba'i snying por
NK103(pe)022:1635: 'od 'bar ba'o // de ma rtogs shing phyin ci
NK103(pe)022:1636: log tu rtog pa'i blo zhen pas brtas pa yi
NK103(pe)022:1638: snang ba snod dang srid pa bcud du 'khor ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1639: 'gro ba drug po kha yang dang yang du brgyud
NK103(pe)022:1640: kyang // rang bzhin rang byung gi ye shes dang
NK103(pe)022:1641: chos kyi dbyings la ni g.yos pa med pas shes
NK103(pe)022:1642: na spang bya mi dmigs pa ni rang bzhin gyi
NK103(pe)022:1644: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni //
NK103(pe)022:1645: sems can gyi bdag tu rtog pa nyid ma bcos pa rang snang du rtogs pa las byung ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:1646: ma rtogs par bdag tu rtog pa'i blo can la
NK103(pe)022:1647: dngos po sna tshogs la zhen pa'i mtshan mar snang
NK103(pe)022:1648: // yang de ma spangs par thabs kyis gang ltar shar kyang /
NK103(pe)022:1649: mi rtogs rang byung gi ye shes rig pa rang
NK103(pe)022:1650: sar grol ba'i thugs yin par rtogs pas rang byung
NK103(pe)022:1651: gi // ye shes cir yang mi rtog pa nyid
NK103(pe)022:1652: mtshon pa'i me long du thams cad gsal ba ni
NK103(pe)022:1653: dper na nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba bzhin
NK103(pe)022:1654: du snang stong dus gcig tu gsal bar snang rang
NK103(pe)022:1655: de yang chos nyid snang rang byung ye shes ngo
NK103(pe)022:1656: gi // bo la // rol pa cir yang mi
NK103(pe)022:1657: 'gag pa'i khyad par ma 'dres par thams cad du
NK103(pe)022:1658: gi // bo la // snang ba ni // sna
NK103(pe)022:1659: tshogs su snang ba de la ngos phyogs 'dzin gyi
NK103(pe)022:1660: shes pas gzung ba gang yang ma yin te //
NK103(pe)022:1661: dper na chu yi zla ba lta bur snang ngo //
NK103(pe)022:1662: rang snang nyid thams cad du snang yang rang byung ye shes kyi rol pa yin la //
NK103(pe)022:1663: phyogs gcig pa gang yang ma yin te chos nyid ji bzhin pa //
NK103(pe)022:1664: nyid las gzhan pa med pas ji ltar snang yang
NK103(pe)022:1665: rang byung ma bcos pa'i chos nyid de bzhin nyid
NK103(pe)022:1667: dngos po thams cad de kho na nyid las mi
NK103(pe)022:1668: g.yo bar bde bar chen po'i ngang du gsal ba
NK103(pe)022:1669: la sgo gsum gyi rtsol bas //
NK103(pe)022:1670: brtsal zhing rtog pas g.yo ba ci yang med pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1671: rig pa ma skyes pa'i dbyings dang cho 'phrul ma
NK103(pe)022:1672: 'gags pa'i ye shes kyang tha snyad du btags pa
NK103(pe)022:1673: yin de // de ma gnas pa yang ma bcos
NK103(pe)022:1674: pa'i de kho na nyid ma yin pa tha snyad
NK103(pe)022:1675: la blo zhen pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)022:1676: gzhan las rmad du byung ba rig pa'i gzhal yas
NK103(pe)022:1677: khang rgya yongs su ma chad pas phyogs 'dzin gyi
NK103(pe)022:1678: spros pa dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor na //
NK103(pe)022:1679: rnam rtog bde chen du 'bar ba'i ye shes kyis bde gshegs sku gsum dang //
NK103(pe)022:1680: thug phrad pa nyid du ngo sprad la bzhag pa ste //
NK103(pe)022:1681: bla ma'i zhal nas byung ba'i snyan brgyud kyi man ngag gis shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1682: lus ngag gi spyod pa'i ru sgo nas snod du
NK103(pe)022:1683: mi rung gi skyon yon sna tshogs pa brtag pa
NK103(pe)022:1684: ni / lung man ngag dang ldan pa'i bla mas shes par bya //
NK103(pe)022:1685: snod rtog pa'i thabs kyi 'phrul tshig gi sgra yis
NK103(pe)022:1686: dad pa shes rab rigs nges ma nges kyi shes
NK103(pe)022:1687: pa brtag / gang zag khyad par can gang la
NK103(pe)022:1688: man ngag gang zhig bstan pa'i snod de yin na
NK103(pe)022:1689: pa brtag / // thabs de nyid kyis ye shes rtogs pa'i rig par 'char ba la //
NK103(pe)022:1690: snod du rung ba ma yin pa de nyid la man ngag bstan te log pa na //
NK103(pe)022:1691: gdul bya'i rigs dang ma mthun pa'i rang bzhin gyis
NK103(pe)022:1692: log pas mi mos shing skur pas ltung ba ni
NK103(pe)022:1693: dper na // rlung dang mkhris pa gcig la phan pa gcig la gnod pa'i chos bzhin no //
NK103(pe)022:1694: de'i spyod lam la brtags pas chags sdang dang ser
NK103(pe)022:1695: sna che chung ru'i bka' gcogs mi gcog snying rje
NK103(pe)022:1696: che chung la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams shes par
NK103(pe)022:1697: bya // slob dpon de yis brtags thabs dal ba
NK103(pe)022:1698: dang g.yo ba drag pos gnyug ma'i don bstan du
NK103(pe)022:1700: des nas rdo rje slob ma rnal ma'i snod du rung ba de yis //
NK103(pe)022:1701: rang gi rig pa'i don ma nor bar rtogs par
NK103(pe)022:1702: 'dod pas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya'o
NK103(pe)022:1703: // bla ma'i gnang ba thob na de nyid rgyal tshab tu bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1704: bya ba mang po'i rtsol ba dang bral ba'i ye
NK103(pe)022:1705: shes ni snga ma'i bya ba zin pa dang phyi
NK103(pe)022:1706: ma'i bya ba ma bzung ba'i bar na kun las
NK103(pe)022:1707: gnas kyang ma rtogs pas gsang ba'i 'khor lo ye
NK103(pe)022:1708: shes mu mtha' dang bral ba'i gter //
NK103(pe)022:1709: sems kyi rang bzhin gsang sngags kyi ngo bo yon
NK103(pe)022:1710: tan gyi gter zad mi shes gyis mdzod rtogs pas
NK103(pe)022:1711: 'dzin cing // don brjod pa dang bral bar rig
NK103(pe)022:1712: pa'i bstan pa bdag nyid la sgrogs pa'i bdag po'o
NK103(pe)022:1713: 'dzin cing // // bzhi cha dang po rig pa
NK103(pe)022:1714: yul snang la mi zhen par rang gsal ba de
NK103(pe)022:1715: 'dzin cing // // ni // dus gsum gyi bde gshegs ma lus pa'i rtogs pa'i snying po yin //
NK103(pe)022:1716: rtog pa dpyod pa tha snyad 'dogs pa gsum dang
NK103(pe)022:1717: ldan pa'i rig pa ni 'khor ba'i rang bzhin yin
NK103(pe)022:1718: no // dus tshod de dag kyang bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:1719: rtog pa de las dus gnas gzhan du'ang yul snang
NK103(pe)022:1720: thams cad la de bzhin du shes par bya ba
NK103(pe)022:1722: rang rig pa'i shes rab kun la gnas kyang mi
NK103(pe)022:1723: rtogs pas gsang ba'i 'od gsal rig pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK103(pe)022:1724: de ni // sangs rgyas dang bla ma'i dgongs pa'i dgu rum du sbas pa dag yin yang //
NK103(pe)022:1725: de gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma bla ma'i gdams pa khyad par can de yis mthong //
NK103(pe)022:1726: ye nas ma bcos par rang gsal ba'i ye shes
NK103(pe)022:1727: chen po phyogs ris med par khyab par bdal bas
NK103(pe)022:1728: // phyi yul dang nang shes pa med par phyogs
NK103(pe)022:1729: kun la rang gsal bas phyogs 'dzin med kyang 'khor
NK103(pe)022:1730: ba 'i nges par 'dzin pa'i rtog pa rags pa'i
NK103(pe)022:1731: cha yis thog ma med nas bsgribs pas ni //
NK103(pe)022:1732: de kho na nyid zab cing brtag par dka' bas phra ba'i cha ste de'i don mi mthong ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:1733: rang rig bde chen gyi don mthong bas nges pas 'dzin pas bcings pa'i lcags sgrogs rang grol te //
NK103(pe)022:1734: ma lus pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i chen po ye
NK103(pe)022:1735: shes las sel med pas de nyid kyi klong du
NK103(pe)022:1736: go zhing rtogs pa nyid do //
NK103(pe)022:1737: de'i don la ma yengs par nyams su blangs pa
NK103(pe)022:1738: las yang dang yang du goms pas mthar phyin par
NK103(pe)022:1739: 'gyur te // de yang ji ltar dran rtog gi bsam pas yul du bzung ba'i blo //
NK103(pe)022:1740: sems dang sems las byung ba ma lus par ni rang grol te zad par gyur nas //
NK103(pe)022:1741: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi don gsal ba mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:1742: rtogs pa la 'pho 'gyur med sems kyi g.yu drung ste der thag chod pa'i ngang la //
NK103(pe)022:1743: gang du'ang mi dmigs pa'i ye shes rang gsal ba
NK103(pe)022:1744: la dgag sgrub gang yang mi bya bar gyi nar
NK103(pe)022:1745: bzhag / gal te rtogs pa mi brtan na ci
NK103(pe)022:1746: dang cis rtogs pa dran pa'i rkyen gyis de'i ngang
NK103(pe)022:1748: gang dran pa de nyid kyi dus tshod du ci yang mi rtsol bar lhug por zhog /
NK103(pe)022:1749: rang gi rang bzhin ma nor bar rtogs pa'i nang sems kyi slob dpon la //
NK103(pe)022:1750: rang gi nyams rtogs kyi lung nod dran pas thag bcad cing //
NK103(pe)022:1751: phyogs 'dzin gyi bsam pa med la ched du byas
NK103(pe)022:1752: pa'i dran pa med pas de kho na nyid las
NK103(pe)022:1754: gang du yang blos mi dpyad nyes pa spangs pa'i legs pa'i don gcig ched du mi bzung //
NK103(pe)022:1755: gzhi med pas bsdu bar ma yin yul logs pa med pas spro bar min //
NK103(pe)022:1756: cir yang mi rtog par gsal ba la blo ma bcos pa rang bzhag /
NK103(pe)022:1757: rnam rtog ma lus pa zhi bas rdul ma yin
NK103(pe)022:1758: te spros pa'i zug rngu med pas 'jam pa'i ngang
NK103(pe)022:1759: // ched du byas pa'i rtsol bas /
NK103(pe)022:1760: rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa de nyid tsam la gnas par bya ste //
NK103(pe)022:1761: rtogs nas btang bzhag med pas sems nyid rang gzhag la ma bcos par lhug par gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1762: de yang glang chen dul ba lta bu'i sems la ni //
NK103(pe)022:1763: ma bskyod par rang lugs nyid du bzhag na bde //
NK103(pe)022:1764: de cis she na brtsal na glang chen rgun chang
NK103(pe)022:1765: gis myos pa dang 'drar ba 'phro zhing rtog pa
NK103(pe)022:1767: nam mkha'i ngo bo yul dang mkhan po med pas dus kyang ma bcos pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)022:1768: rnal 'byor pas kyang sems nyid kyi rang bzhin ma bcos par bzhag na bde //
NK103(pe)022:1769: khyung chen po nam mkha' la ldings pa la rtsol ba med pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:1770: rig pa mi rtsol bar rang bzhag gyi nar nyid du glod na bde //
NK103(pe)022:1771: gang la'ang zhen pa thams cad btang bas phyogs su 'dzin pa gang yang med //
NK103(pe)022:1772: ched du bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ngang //
NK103(pe)022:1773: ma zhen pa'i rtsol sgrub med pa //
NK103(pe)022:1774: sems kyis ched du bsgrim par mi bya zhing //
NK103(pe)022:1775: lus dang ngag dang gi bya bas brtsal bar mi bya //
NK103(pe)022:1776: 'o na rtsol ba dgos zhe na /
NK103(pe)022:1777: shes pa mi gang du'ang bsdu bar rang yan du khye //
NK103(pe)022:1778: rang 'od kyi rol pa yin pas yul du snang
NK103(pe)022:1779: ba mi dgag bdag dang yul du ma grub pas
NK103(pe)022:1781: mtshan ma'i yul gyi spros pas rgyud 'chel ba na //
NK103(pe)022:1782: tha mal dang theg dman gyi bya ba sna tshogs
NK103(pe)022:1783: pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i sel rtogs goms la byung
NK103(pe)022:1785: lus dang sems glod la ting 'dzin mi g.yo ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1786: gzer chen gdab ste g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag
NK103(pe)022:1787: sbyin / shin tu chags pa'i yul dran pas sems g.yo ba byung na //
NK103(pe)022:1788: stong nyid dang bde ba'i dbyer med pa thig le
NK103(pe)022:1789: man ngag sbyin par bya ste bla mas 'chad par
NK103(pe)022:1790: 'gyur ro // ye shes gsang ba'i rtogs shing goms pa'i dgongs pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1791: phyogs 'dzin gyi 'du shes gang yang ma yin la gang ltar gnas pa de ltar yin pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1793: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las kun la gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1794: don de thabs gang gis gsal ba'i ra ston pa
NK103(pe)022:1795: le'u ste lnga pa'o////lam gyi ngo bo don lam bstan
NK103(pe)022:1796: nas tshig lam zhu bar 'dod pas /
NK103(pe)022:1797: de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes /
NK103(pe)022:1798: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:1799: rtogs na rang gzhan gyi 'dod pa rdzogs pas rin
NK103(pe)022:1800: chen 'khor lo kun gyi yul min pas gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1801: thugs // 'phrul tshig ni tshig gcig gis don mtha' dag rig pa'i ste de sgron ma yis //
NK103(pe)022:1802: rang bzhin rtogs dka' ba dang rgyal ba dang bla
NK103(pe)022:1803: mas dgu rum du sbas pa'i don de gsal na
NK103(pe)022:1804: // rna brgyud dang 'phrul tshig gi de nyid bshad
NK103(pe)022:1805: thabs lde mig gang gis gsal bar rtogs bar bgyi
NK103(pe)022:1807: de nas las ston pa de bzhin gshegs pas sems dpa' rdo rje nyid la slar lan gsungs pa //
NK103(pe)022:1808: phyi rabs kyi don du sems dpa' chen po nga
NK103(pe)022:1809: la tshur ma yengs par nyon cig ces gdams pa'o
NK103(pe)022:1810: // brjod bya don gyi man ngag rin chen rang bzhin gyis gsang ba'i don ni //
NK103(pe)022:1811: bka' sde snod dang phyi nang gi brgyud sde ma lus pa mtha' dag gi //
NK103(pe)022:1812: brjod bya'i don 'dus pas snying po de nyid yin te //
NK103(pe)022:1813: bstan pa ma lus pa'i ming tshig dang don gyi
NK103(pe)022:1814: rnam grangs thams cad rdzogs par sdud pa'i bdag nyid
NK103(pe)022:1816: bstan pa kun klong dgur bsdus nas brjod pas gsung
NK103(pe)022:1817: gi 'khor lo can te skal ldan la bskor zhing
NK103(pe)022:1818: gcod pas // rgyan las lus ni bshad bzhin ces pa bzhi drang /
NK103(pe)022:1819: dus kyi matha'i skad cig nyid la ni //
NK103(pe)022:1820: bstan pa klong dgu'i gzhung tshad bam po nyi khri nyid //
NK103(pe)022:1821: rin chen gsang ba de skal ldan la gsal bar bya'i ba ched du 11gsungs pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1822: de kho na nyid kyi bstan pa klong dgu dang
NK103(pe)022:1823: ldan pa'i sems kyi chos nyid rnal ma'i gzhi de
NK103(pe)022:1825: rin chen gyi lam gyis rtogs shing nyams su blang //
NK103(pe)022:1826: 'og ma ltar rtsol ba ched du ma bsgrubs par
NK103(pe)022:1827: bdag gzhan gyi 'bras bu byung ba ni nyi ma
NK103(pe)022:1828: dang 'od ltar lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1829: ma nor ba'i lta ba ni sems nyid la phyogs ris dang blang dor med par rtogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1830: 'khor mtha' dang gtso bo dbus med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po len pas dkyil 'khor ro //
NK103(pe)022:1831: rig pa'i ye shes thams cad du ma 'gags par
NK103(pe)022:1832: gsal bar snang nas don sgrub pa phrin las sgo
NK103(pe)022:1834: gnang bkag med pa spyod pa'i rgyan //
NK103(pe)022:1835: phyogs gang du'ang mi bsam tha mal gyi zhen pa gang yang mi yengs pa ni dgong pa'i klong //
NK103(pe)022:1836: dper na rgyal po'i thabs thob pas rigs gsum pa
NK103(pe)022:1837: btsal mi dgos pa ltar spyi blugs ni theg pa
NK103(pe)022:1838: thams cad kyi dbang rdzogs pa'i dbang du gnas //
NK103(pe)022:1839: 'khor 'das dbyer med du rtogs pas 'og nas gong
NK103(pe)022:1840: du bgrod la med par mthar phyin pa ni byang
NK103(pe)022:1842: ched du srung bas bcos bslad med pa'i dam tshig
NK103(pe)022:1843: ni bzhir 'dus te de nyid gdod nas dag pa'o
NK103(pe)022:1844: // thob bya thams cad du rang snang ba'i 'bras
NK103(pe)022:1845: bu ni bdag nyid lhun gyis grub pas sel med
NK103(pe)022:1846: // pa'i klong ngo // dgu ste bstan pa thams
NK103(pe)022:1847: cad 'dir 'dus shing 'di las 'phros ba rtsa ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1849: sems kyi chos nyid gang gis kyang ma bcos ma bslad pas rnal ma'i gzhi'i //
NK103(pe)022:1850: don dang nges tshig dang dpe yis bstan te //
NK103(pe)022:1851: de la gzhi'i don ni 'khrul grol ji ltar snang
NK103(pe)022:1852: yang lhun grub rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bor gsal
NK103(pe)022:1853: ba la // rnam pa sgyu ma dang rang bzhin spros bral dang mtshan nyid rang rig rnams //
NK103(pe)022:1854: bde ba chen por ye nas lhun gyis grub pa ni gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)022:1855: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang //
NK103(pe)022:1856: 'gro ba rigs drug gi spyod yul ci snang yang
NK103(pe)022:1857: sems nyid kyi ma bcos pa'i ngo bor gcig pa
NK103(pe)022:1858: // gnyis tha dad ma yin te rang bzhin spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gcig pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1859: rig pa rnam pa thams cad du 'gag pa med
NK103(pe)022:1860: par sgyu ma lhun gyis grub kyang rang rgyud pa
NK103(pe)022:1861: med pa ni // rol pa cir yang snang ba la bden pa'i ngos gzung gang yang med //
NK103(pe)022:1862: chos thams cad rang rig tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)022:1863: la yon tan rdzogs par lhun gyis grub pa de
NK103(pe)022:1864: la // phyi gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa'i shes par blos brtags pa dag ngang gis med //
NK103(pe)022:1865: rig pa phyogs bral de nyid rnam pa 'gag med
NK103(pe)022:1866: de yi rang bzhin yin pas thig le nyag gcig
NK103(pe)022:1867: yin no // 'khor 'das ma lus pa'i don gyi snying po thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi ni //
NK103(pe)022:1868: gnas lugs ngo ma shes par sna tshogs su zhen pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin de //
NK103(pe)022:1869: rtog par tsam snang nyid na rang rgyud pa ma
NK103(pe)022:1870: grub pas mi rtog pa ste dus gcig tu gnas
NK103(pe)022:1871: pa la // thams cad du rol pa rang snang pas 'khor ba'ang yin //
NK103(pe)022:1872: rol pa'i snang ba la 'dzin pa dang brtags pa'i rtog pas goms pa spangs pas sangs rgyas yin //
NK103(pe)022:1873: blang dor gyis 'ching ba phyogs 'dzin dang bral bas lta ba yin //
NK103(pe)022:1874: rang 'od dang 'bar ba sku gsum thugs su gsal
NK103(pe)022:1875: ba'i dkyil 'khor yin pas rang rgyud pa dag pa'o
NK103(pe)022:1876: // thams cad ma lus par thig le khong stong du 'dus pa'i rang gsal ba lus po che //
NK103(pe)022:1877: rig pa dang stong ba gcig po de ni chos kun gyi rang bzhin yin te //
NK103(pe)022:1878: bde ba chen por lhag ma lus pa med par yongs su rdzogs //
NK103(pe)022:1879: mtha' thams cad las nges par grol bas rig pa'i 'khor lo 'bum phrag yas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1880: gzhi de mtshon par byed pa'i dpe yi rang bzhin nges par bya ba ni //
NK103(pe)022:1881: mun pa dang chu dang nyi mas bstan te //
NK103(pe)022:1882: sems nyid rig pa'i ngo bo 'khrul pa ka nas dag pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1883: zhen pas so sor brtags pa'i snang ba gang yang mthong ba med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1884: smag gi mun rum la cir yang mthong ba med pa lta bur bshad //
NK103(pe)022:1885: dngos por grub pa med pa'i rig pa rang snang ba de nyid la //
NK103(pe)022:1886: rang byung ye shes rol pa gang du yang mi 'gag pas sna tshogs su 'char ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)022:1887: chu yi gnyer ma lta bur bshad //
NK103(pe)022:1888: gang gis kyang ma bcos pa sems kyi mtshan nyid ye shes phyogs dang bral ba //
NK103(pe)022:1889: lam gyi rtsol bas ched du bkog pa ma yin yang //
NK103(pe)022:1890: yul shes su zhen pa gdod nas dag pas gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1891: khyab pa dang phyogs ris med pa rang gsal ba'i phyir nyi ma shar ba lta bur bshad pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1892: brtags pas tha dad zhen cing rtag par 'dzin pa'i mtha' dang //
NK103(pe)022:1893: stong pa la zhen nas ye shes kyi rol pa'i snang ba bkag pas chad pa'i mtha' dang //
NK103(pe)022:1894: rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i don la nges par 'dzin pas bcings pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:1895: mtha' dad gsum bsal ba'i dgos pa phyir du rang
NK103(pe)022:1896: bzhin dang rnam par dang mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa'o
NK103(pe)022:1897: // rgyu rkyen gzhan med pas rang snang 'bad rtsol
NK103(pe)022:1898: med pas lhun grub glo bur ba min pas ye
NK103(pe)022:1900: rang rang gi zhen pas bgrod pa'i lam gyis rtsol
NK103(pe)022:1901: bas ched du brtsal ba ni 'dir mi dgos te
NK103(pe)022:1903: mtha' dbus med pas nam mkha' lta bu la //
NK103(pe)022:1904: lam lnga sa bcu la sogs pa bgrod pas mthar phyin par ga la 'gyur //
NK103(pe)022:1905: theg pa mtha' dag sems la yul du byas nas bgrod pas phyin par 'dod na //
NK103(pe)022:1906: dper na nam mkha' la 'dom gyi tshad kyis 'jal ba dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)022:1908: lam bstan gyi dbye bas dang lam gyi dpe dang //
NK103(pe)022:1909: ming gi nges pa'i tshig gi don dang ldan pa ni bgrod med kyi lam de nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1910: mtshon bya don gyi lam dang mtshon byed tshig gi lam mo //
NK103(pe)022:1911: don gyi lam ni sku gsum dang thugs phrad pas
NK103(pe)022:1912: sku gsum gyi don gsal bar rtogs pa yin la
NK103(pe)022:1913: // de yi brda phrad par byed pa ni tshig gi lam mo //
NK103(pe)022:1914: rang byung gi ye shes rtsol bas gzhan du bgrod
NK103(pe)022:1915: pa med rang la lhun gyis rdzogs par shes pa
NK103(pe)022:1917: rnam grol gyi 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan kun gyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu'o //
NK103(pe)022:1918: ye shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin dang rnam pa dang
NK103(pe)022:1919: mtshan nyid gsum gyi don ma nor bar gsal bar
NK103(pe)022:1920: rtogs na de'i mthus las gang nas 'bras bu ci
NK103(pe)022:1921: 'char zhe na / gang gis kyang mi g.yo ba'i sems kyi dkyil 'khor nas1 //
NK103(pe)022:1922: gang 'byung na theg pa kun gyi thob bya'i 'bras bur 'phel 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin du 'char1 //
NK103(pe)022:1923: des na gdul bya kun mnyam pa chen por dgongs pa yi thugs mnga' bar rtogs na //
NK103(pe)022:1924: lam la rim pas bgrod du med de mnyam pa chen po la cig char du 'jug pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1925: rnam rtogs phra rags thams cad chos nyid las byung zhing 'dus par ngo shes pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1926: gal te tshig lam brten mtshan ma yin pas mi
NK103(pe)022:1927: dgos snyam na tshig lam gyi rkyen gyis ma mtshon
NK103(pe)022:1928: na // ma bcos sems kyi don de mi shes //
NK103(pe)022:1929: rna brgyud dbang gis thabs kyi tshig gi lam gyis don la sbyor //
NK103(pe)022:1930: ye shes gsang ba'i don mthong bas duhkha dang rtsol
NK103(pe)022:1931: ba zad pas ma bcos bde ba chen po'i sa
NK103(pe)022:1933: 'dzin pa rags pa'i rtog pa ci byung ba dag /
NK103(pe)022:1934: ma bcos pa de nyid cir yang 'char bas rang
NK103(pe)022:1935: byung yang chu'i ri mo ltar ye shes nyid du
NK103(pe)022:1936: gsal ba la sgo gsum gyi bya bas //
NK103(pe)022:1937: mi rtsol bar ma bcos bde ba chen po'i sems la dus thams cad du gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1938: dus gsum du mi 'gyur zhing mu matha'i spros pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid rtogs bya'i don la //
NK103(pe)022:1939: gang la yang 'dzin pa dang bral ba blang dor
NK103(pe)022:1940: med pa'i btang snyoms las ma yengs pa'i rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)022:1941: gyis // theg pa gzhan la snang ba'i ji snyed
NK103(pe)022:1942: pa'i skyon chos nyid byang chub sems su mthong bas
NK103(pe)022:1943: gyis // thams cad // gnyis su med pa'i don 'od gsal chen po rtogs pa de la //
NK103(pe)022:1944: skyon du bltas nas dang yon tan du bzung bas
NK103(pe)022:1945: blang ba dang dor ba med de chu dang rlabs
NK103(pe)022:1946: bzhin du bsam pa ma lus pa kun sems su
NK103(pe)022:1947: shes pas so // de ltar mthong ba dang goms
NK103(pe)022:1948: pa dang mthar phyin pa ni byang chub sems kyi
NK103(pe)022:1949: lam ste der blo 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)022:1950: rtsol med rang gsal bas mar me bzhin ma gos
NK103(pe)022:1951: par rang snang pad+ma 'dra rtogs pa rgyun du gnas
NK103(pe)022:1956: tshig lam dang don lam la skabs su gang bab kyis sbyor cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:1957: rtsol bas tshi chad cing nad du 'gyur bas lus dang ngag gi rtsol ba dang //
NK103(pe)022:1958: mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi ting 'dzin sems kyi rtsol ba'i rim pa med par //
NK103(pe)022:1959: thabs kyis sgrol ba rdzogs pa'i lam chen po //
NK103(pe)022:1960: rig pa'i gdal khyab chen po gnas su de nyid rtogs pas ji lta bar phyin //
NK103(pe)022:1961: te tshul gcig pa des na mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i lam //
NK103(pe)022:1962: ye shes yod med kyi mtha' ma gos par rnam par dag pa'i lam //
NK103(pe)022:1963: skyon yon la dgag sgrub kyi spyod yul rnam par dag pas kun tu bzang nyid yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:1964: dbyer med de gzhi lam 'bras bu thams cad ro gcig pas mtshungs pa'i lam mo //
NK103(pe)022:1965: byang chub kyi sems nyid la theg pa gzhan ltar rgyu la rag lus pa med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1966: tshogs gnyis kyi rgyu yis bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dir min //
NK103(pe)022:1967: dang po gzhi rang byung gi ye shes la rgyu 'bras grub pa med pas //
NK103(pe)022:1968: chos thams cad kyi ngo bor rang gsal zhing rol
NK103(pe)022:1969: pa sna tshogs su snang yang bdag nyid chen po
NK103(pe)022:1970: nyag gcig la phyogs 'dzin gyi dri ma med //
NK103(pe)022:1971: de la 'bad rtsol med pa ni dper na nam mkha' yis khyab pa bzhin du gnas te /
NK103(pe)022:1972: des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang sems can mtha' yas kun la khyab pa rang bzhin dbyer med //
NK103(pe)022:1973: de nyid ji lta bar rtogs pas mthar thug gi 'bras bu'i sa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1974: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar te dus gsum ma 'gags par snang yang //
NK103(pe)022:1975: skye 'gag tu rtog pa' ngo la snga phyi'i khyad par du snang ba tsam las //
NK103(pe)022:1976: dus gsum chos nyid du bral gyi ngo bor gcig ste snga phyi'i rgyun mthong ba'i khyad par med //
NK103(pe)022:1977: ma bcos par ji lta bar rtogs pa thugs ye shes rig pa la //
NK103(pe)022:1978: 'khrul pa'i ngor snang ba'i sngon med phyis med de thig le nyag gcig tu gsal //
NK103(pe)022:1979: ba de yan glo bur ba min te rang byung
NK103(pe)022:1980: phyogs med pas 'od gsal nyid rgyu rkyen med pa'i
NK103(pe)022:1981: gdod nas skye 'gag med par yod //
NK103(pe)022:1982: skyed byed kyi rgyu med pas bdag gzhan gyi dgos
NK103(pe)022:1983: pa tshang ba'i 'bras bu byang chub kyi sems de
NK103(pe)022:1984: ni // 'bras bu ma lus pa kun gyi bdag nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)022:1985: chos sku phyogs med nyid 'bras bu kun gyi ngo bor rang gsal ba de la 1 //
NK103(pe)022:1986: ji ltar 'char na rin chen 'bar ba la dgos 'dod lhun grub tu 'char ba ltar du 'char //
NK103(pe)022:1987: gang 'char na thugs rje'i byin rlabs gdul bya'i mos
NK103(pe)022:1988: pa ltar 'dod dgur rtsol med du 'char ba ni
NK103(pe)022:1989: // gdul bya sa la gnas pa'i skal ldan gyi
NK103(pe)022:1990: dus na rang gi rkyen las nyi ma bzhin du
NK103(pe)022:1991: zhing dag par longs sku snang //
NK103(pe)022:1992: las dbang po ma dag pa sems can gyi dus
NK103(pe)022:1993: na sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i skabs kyis 'gro ba'i
NK103(pe)022:1994: bsam pa dang mthun par snang //
NK103(pe)022:1995: chos kyi sku lhun gyis grub pa'i dus na yin min gang gi yang phyogs ris med //
NK103(pe)022:1996: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang de kho na
NK103(pe)022:1997: nyid rig pa'i dkyil 'khor las dag ma dag bsam
NK103(pe)022:1999: rang snang zhing rang las 'dus pas 'bras bu ni rgya mtshor lta 'khyil bar //
NK103(pe)022:2000: gsal zhing 'bar kyang 'bras bu'i ngo bo la bdag dang gzhan du grub pa med //
NK103(pe)022:2001: gang yang ma bkag pas bdag dang gzhan du 'bras bu nyid rang snang ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:2003: dngos po yin lugs dang gdul bya'i bsam pa dang sbyar ba'i skabs kyis mi 'gal bar shes //
NK103(pe)022:2004: gsal 'bar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rig pa'i byin rlabs kyi yon tan thams cad ni //
NK103(pe)022:2005: ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid gnas lugs rig pa'i gzhi la lhun grub tu rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)022:2006: thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po don gyi gzhi de thabs khyad par can gyis rtogs na //
NK103(pe)022:2007: rang bzhin gyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing nyon mongs pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:2008: shes bya dang lta ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)022:2009: tshogs gnyis mi sgrub cing sgrib pa gsum spangs pa med pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2010: spang med thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
NK103(pe)022:2011: thabs gang gis kyang mtshon du med pa'i sems kyi
NK103(pe)022:2012: 'bras bu ma sgrubs pa la lhun gyis grub pa
NK103(pe)022:2013: ni // dbang gnyis pa dang gsum pa rig ma
NK103(pe)022:2014: la brten pa'i lus kyi bde bas mtshon du med
NK103(pe)022:2015: ni // // sems nyid 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu la //
NK103(pe)022:2016: theg dman la zhugs pa'i rgyu 'bras gnyis su rtogs pas yul du grub pa min no //
NK103(pe)022:2017: gzhi ji bzhin par gsal bar yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu ni //
NK103(pe)022:2018: thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu 'byung ba lnga yang de
NK103(pe)022:2019: las byung ba des bskyed pa la rag ma las
NK103(pe)022:2020: 'das pa'i // sku gsung thugs la blo rten mi 'cha' ste ngos bzung las grol lo //
NK103(pe)022:2022: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las sems nyid rin chen
NK103(pe)022:2023: tshig lam gyis gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste drug
NK103(pe)022:2024: pa'o////de ma thag pa de nas gang gis sems dpa'
NK103(pe)022:2025: rdo rjes / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar zhu ba 'di skad gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:2026: gang gis kyang ma bsgribs pas 'od gsal spros pa
NK103(pe)022:2027: dang bral bas thugs kun la khyab pas rje'i de
NK103(pe)022:2028: nyid 'bad rtsol med par snang ba lhun grub khyod
NK103(pe)022:2029: // sku gsum thugs kyi rol pa'i mdzad pa mtha'
NK103(pe)022:2030: yas pa gdul bya'i ngo la bsam gyis mi khyab
NK103(pe)022:2032: dgongs pa 'od gsal dbyings la ma g.yos par bzhugs bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:2033: mnyam rjes dang mdzad pa la 'phel 'grib med pas thugs rje'i mdzad pa phyogs bcur khyab par bdal //
NK103(pe)022:2034: 'gro ba'i bsam pa bzhin du snang nas re ba skong ba ni dper na //
NK103(pe)022:2035: yid bzhin nor bu la rnam rtog med par dgos pa 'byung ba lta bur shar //
NK103(pe)022:2036: brgyal ba rnam snang khyod ni gdul bya'i sems snang zhing gsal bas sgron ma ste //
NK103(pe)022:2037: ma rig pa'i mun pa dang bar byed //
NK103(pe)022:2038: nad thams cad sel bas 'jam dpal las sman pa
NK103(pe)022:2039: che mchog ces pa gsum drang sman chen bdud rtsi
NK103(pe)022:2040: phan 'dogs pas byams mgon khyod gyis //
NK103(pe)022:2041: rdzogs chen sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs nas goms pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2042: gang yang bkag pa med pa'i sgo gsum gyi spyod pa ji ltar bgyi //
NK103(pe)022:2043: zhes dri ba'i tshig gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:2044: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gyis bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:2045: gsang sngags kyi nyams dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ni sgo gsum gyi spyod pa'i mchog yin te //
NK103(pe)022:2046: sems kyis phar yul la 'phro tshur nang du 'du'i las ci yang mi byed par //
NK103(pe)022:2047: rtogs pa rang gsal phyogs med kyi klong la ye nas mi 'gyur bar gnas pas //
NK103(pe)022:2048: nam mkha'i rdo rje'i spyod pa zhes bya ste ma bcos par sems //
NK103(pe)022:2049: sgo gsum rdo rje brtsol ba ched du ma brtsal ba'i spyod pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:2050: lus kyis lha'i sku phyag rgya sgom zhing bca' ba'i las mi byed //
NK103(pe)022:2051: tha mal pa'i lus kyi spyod pa'ang de bzhin du med pa yin no //
NK103(pe)022:2052: ngag gis snying po bzlas pa dang sngags brjod pa'i las med //
NK103(pe)022:2053: yin lugs las ma bcos pa'i gsung gi spyod pa la ni //
NK103(pe)022:2054: rang ga mar zhen pa'i tha mal pa ngag la sogs pa gang yang smra ba min //
NK103(pe)022:2055: sems kyis ye shes pa las 'od zer phar 'phro
NK103(pe)022:2056: ba dang dngos grub tshur 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NK103(pe)022:2058: rang gsal rtogs pa'i klong la goms pas ye nas gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2059: yid kyis dran pa dang bsam pa'i rtog pa rgyu ba gang yang med //
NK103(pe)022:2060: mu matha'i spros pa ma spangs par bral ba nam mkha' lta bu'i don la //
NK103(pe)022:2061: chos thams cad rang gsal du rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngang la ched du ma bcos pa //
NK103(pe)022:2062: sgo gsum gyi byed rtsol med par rig pa rang
NK103(pe)022:2063: lugs su bzhag pas re dogs dang bral bas lhug
NK103(pe)022:2064: pa'o // phyogs gang du'ang blo gtad nas ma bzhag
NK103(pe)022:2065: par chos nyid 'od gsal phyogs med du rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2066: mkha' la ma yengs par dus gsum du dran pa
NK103(pe)022:2067: ni rkyen gyis rtogs pa'i nyams rtse gcig tu gzung
NK103(pe)022:2068: pa'o // // de nyid la tha snyad dran pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:2069: rnam rtog dang yul gyi mtshan mas mi gnas par g.yos par gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:2070: bya bral ngang la phyogs med pas nam mkha' snying
NK103(pe)022:2071: po'i don las mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i spyod pa
NK103(pe)022:2072: la // 'od gsal lhag pa'i sems kyis rig pa gang du'ang mi 'phro bar gnas //
NK103(pe)022:2073: rnam rtog snga phyi'i rjes su dran pas nam mkha' rdo rje las g.yos pa na //
NK103(pe)022:2074: sems nyid rin chen cir yang snang bas 'phrul gyi rtogs pa'i snying po'i don gyi sgo //
NK103(pe)022:2075: de dus kun tu dran pa'i rkyen gyis man ngag gi /
NK103(pe)022:2076: ma yengs par gzung bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:2077: ma rtogs pas lus ngag gi spyod pa gtso ru 'jog par byed na //
NK103(pe)022:2078: de yang dkar spyod nyid yin la rdzogs chen gyi ma bcos pa'i spyod pa min no //
NK103(pe)022:2079: phyogs su zhen pa'i spyod pa med par mnyam pa
NK103(pe)022:2080: nyid du chos thams cad rig pa'i spyod pa nyid
NK103(pe)022:2081: la // theg pa gzhan gyis rtsol ba'i spyod pa las byung ba'i 'bras bu'ang lhun gyis grub bo //
NK103(pe)022:2082: gang gis kyang bcos su med pa sems kyi rang bzhin yin pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2083: bcos su yod par go nas ched du bcos pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2084: sgo gsum gyi spyod pa nor bas phyin ci log
NK103(pe)022:2085: tu gyur pa ni dper na phyogs gcig pa'i dngos
NK103(pe)022:2086: po dang bral ba'i rig pa bdag gnyis med pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2087: ngo bo la // mu stegs pas brtags pa'i gang
NK103(pe)022:2088: zag gi bdag tu 'dzin pa log pa bzhin no
NK103(pe)022:2089: ngo bo la // // chos thams cad 'od gsal rig pa lhun grub la //
NK103(pe)022:2090: theg pa gzhan gyi rtsol ba'i spyod pas sems nyid kyi don mi mthong ngo //
NK103(pe)022:2091: rtogs pa'i blos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od gsal gyi sems //
NK103(pe)022:2092: nyid la rtogs goms kyi gdengs dang ldan pas 'gyur ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang //
NK103(pe)022:2093: ye shes kyi rang 'od yon tan thams cad du
NK103(pe)022:2094: rang snang bar lhun gyis grub pa'i byin rlabs las
NK103(pe)022:2095: // gdul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rang rang gi bsam pa sna tshogs pa ji bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:2096: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs kyi spyod pa yang de nyid du snang nas don mdzad pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:2097: rang gi sems nyid skyon gyis ma gos par pad+ma bzhin du rtogs goms kyi gdeng gis dag nas //
NK103(pe)022:2098: gdul bya pha rol ji ltar mos pa bzhin don mdzad pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:2099: 'gro ba chags can g.yem par 'dod pa la g.yem pa nyid spyad pas 'dul te //
NK103(pe)022:2100: gdul bya rang gi sems dug lnga la sogs pa
NK103(pe)022:2101: gang la 'thad pa'i sgo dang bstun nas don mdzad
NK103(pe)022:2102: kyang log pa'i lam du 'gyur ba ni zhe sdang
NK103(pe)022:2103: mnar sems nga rgyal nyid dug gis dug nad gso
NK103(pe)022:2104: ba ltar spyad kyang mi 'ching bar grol ba'i thabs
NK103(pe)022:2105: nyid kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyin ci log nyid
NK103(pe)022:2106: byang chub kyi lam du bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2107: mu stegs dang nyan thos la sogs pa 'jug pa'i sgo theg pa brgyad //
NK103(pe)022:2108: gang la mos pa dang mthun pa'i thabs kyis bstan //
NK103(pe)022:2109: gsang ba a ti'i don rtogs na sgo gsum gyi
NK103(pe)022:2110: spyod pa gang yang ma bkag par spyad kyang rung
NK103(pe)022:2111: // rang byung ye shes nyag gcig la //
NK103(pe)022:2112: skal med la gsang ba'i spyod pa dkyil 'khor kyi rol pa grangs med par snang ba ni /
NK103(pe)022:2113: gdul bya dang mthun 'jug gis 'gro ba bkri ba'i thabs su bstan pa yin //
NK103(pe)022:2114: gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i 'dul
NK103(pe)022:2115: thabs ci yang yin no gdengs dang ldan na spyod
NK103(pe)022:2117: rnal 'byor pa su zhig gis thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du rtogs shing goms pa'i /
NK103(pe)022:2118: gdeng dang ldan no theg pa gzhan las khyad par che //
NK103(pe)022:2119: 'dod yon lnga dang dug lnga la sogs pa ma
NK103(pe)022:2120: bkag par sems nyid du rtogs pa'i khyad par las
NK103(pe)022:2121: // ma rtogs pa'i sgrib par gyur pa'i mi mthun
NK103(pe)022:2122: pa'i chos gang zhig yod de med pas na gang
NK103(pe)022:2123: // yang // ma bkag par ci bder lta ba rtogs pas spyod cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2124: snang gsal gnas lugs rig cing rtogs pa'i gdengs khyad par can dang ldan na //
NK103(pe)022:2125: mtha' yas pa'i gdul bya mos pa'i sna tshogs par gsal ba ngo dag tu //
NK103(pe)022:2126: sna mi 'dra ba tshogs mang ba'i spyod pa che la gting zab pas rgya mtsho yin //
NK103(pe)022:2127: 'khor ba'i dngos po gang yang ma bkag kyang spyod
NK103(pe)022:2128: yul yongs su dag pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod
NK103(pe)022:2129: pa ni 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dus gsum gyi
NK103(pe)022:2130: sangs rgyas kyis // dug lnga spang du med par
NK103(pe)022:2131: bdud rtsir rtogs pa'i thabs kyi rgyal po spyod pa
NK103(pe)022:2132: sangs rgyas kyis // yin no // mthar phyin pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2133: yon tan ni bya btsal kun bral ba la lhun
NK103(pe)022:2134: sangs rgyas kyis // yin no // gyis grub pa'o // dus gsum sangs rgyas gang la yang //
NK103(pe)022:2135: spyod pa khyad par can 'di las yong mi mnga' //
NK103(pe)022:2136: gdod nas rnam par dag pa'i sems nyid kyi spyod pa rtogs na //
NK103(pe)022:2137: lus ngag gi rtsol ba'i spyod pa ni dngos po mi mthun par log pa'i chos //
NK103(pe)022:2138: rtogs pa mthar phyin pas lhag pa'i spyod pa 'od gsal thugs ni //
NK103(pe)022:2139: bsam gyis mi khyab pas ye shes thugs //
NK103(pe)022:2140: dge sdig gi dngos po gang la yang sems nyid rtogs pas lhag spyod kyang //
NK103(pe)022:2141: lhag pa'i spyod pa de la gdul bya mos pas don la drangs nas 'jug pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2142: rdzogs chen gyi skal ldan lhag pa'i spyod pa 'gro ba'i don du 'dzin kyang //
NK103(pe)022:2143: che ba gnas lugs la dmigs pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa kun cha mnyam pas //
NK103(pe)022:2144: theg pa gong 'og tu dmigs pa'i sems dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:2145: rang bzhin las mi 'gyur ba nam mkha' rdo rje'i spyod pa dang //
NK103(pe)022:2148: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las bya ba dang bral
NK103(pe)022:2149: ba'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de ma
NK103(pe)022:2150: thag pa de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes /
NK103(pe)022:2151: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:2152: gsang ba'i don 'dzin cing gdul bya kun skyob pas
NK103(pe)022:2153: thugs rje'i rgyal po rnam snang khyod cir yang mi
NK103(pe)022:2154: 'gag pa'i // rol pa'i chos kyi phung po dpag
NK103(pe)022:2155: tu med pa 'khor lo bskor bas gsung gi mnga'
NK103(pe)022:2156: 'gag pa'i // bdag yin // chos kyi sku yi
NK103(pe)022:2157: 'khor lo phyogs med du bdal bas nam mkha' ltar
NK103(pe)022:2158: 'gag pa'i // bdag yin // du khyab // thams
NK103(pe)022:2159: cad kyi snying po don gyi ngo bo rtogs par
NK103(pe)022:2160: ldan pas shes bya kun mkhyen pa'i thugs dang gsum
NK103(pe)022:2161: 'gag pa'i // bdag yin // du khyab // ldan
NK103(pe)022:2162: pas // sngags kyi bdag nyid gdul bya skyob pa
NK103(pe)022:2163: 'gag pa'i // bdag yin // du khyab // ldan
NK103(pe)022:2164: pas // la zhus // gang gis zhus na 'dus
NK103(pe)022:2166: ji ltar zhus na mos pa yis //
NK103(pe)022:2169: dam tshig gsang ba'i don zhus pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:2171: gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don de khyod kyis bshad du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:2172: zhes zhu ba'i tshig gsol ba dang /
NK103(pe)022:2173: mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang brtse ba'i thugs rjes 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:2174: lhun grub gsum gyi ngo bo ye shes gsang ba 'di la //
NK103(pe)022:2175: lha bsgrub cing bsrung mtshams su bcos pa'i dam tshig med //
NK103(pe)022:2176: rtogs pa'i rig pa gsal ba la mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig ni //
NK103(pe)022:2177: yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'bar ba dang rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i gru dang //
NK103(pe)022:2178: 'joms pas rdo rje dang 'od gsal bas nyi ma lta bur don gsal //
NK103(pe)022:2179: rtsol med lhun grub kyi dam tshig la phyogs ris yod pa ma yin pas //
NK103(pe)022:2180: nar son pa'i sdom pa dang bus pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyogs ris dang bsrung mtshams dang //
NK103(pe)022:2181: sngags phyi pa gsum dang nang pa gnyis dang gsang
NK103(pe)022:2182: ba a ti'i lhag spyod grangs btab kyi dam tshig
NK103(pe)022:2183: min no // ched du rtsol bas ma bcos pa
NK103(pe)022:2184: gsang ba a ti'i rtsol bral rig pa'i dam tshig
NK103(pe)022:2185: min no // ni // phyogs dang grangs kyi bsrung
NK103(pe)022:2186: bya med pa 1dang yin min bden brdzun gyi 'dzin
NK103(pe)022:2187: pa bral bas phyal ba 1dang 'khor 'das dbyer med
NK103(pe)022:2188: min no // ni // gcig pu 1dang // bya
NK103(pe)022:2189: brtsal med pas lhun gyis grub pa'i 111pa'i dam tshig
NK103(pe)022:2190: min no // ni // gcig pu 1dang // go
NK103(pe)022:2191: // chos thams cad rang rig par gdod nas lhun
NK103(pe)022:2192: gyis grub pa nyid kun du rang snang bas de
NK103(pe)022:2193: min no // ni // gcig pu 1dang // go
NK103(pe)022:2194: // nyid la // gnyis pa ma grub pas gzung
NK103(pe)022:2195: 'dzin mtshan ma'i chos med pas na //
NK103(pe)022:2196: ngag gis brjod du med pa'i sems nyid kyis bsrung ji ltar bsrung na //
NK103(pe)022:2197: ched du bsrung du med pa'i ngang du bsdam //
NK103(pe)022:2198: de tsam du yang bsrung du med na rtsol ba med pas bade'o //
NK103(pe)022:2199: bsrung bya srung byed gnyis su med pa'i sems nyid kyi rtogs pa'i dam tshig la //
NK103(pe)022:2200: dus gsum du 'da' ba med par ting nge 'dzin gyi srog gis gnas gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:2201: de nyid yin lugs las ma bcos pas rgyud dag rgyal ba'i dam tshig yin no //
NK103(pe)022:2202: phyogs 'dzin gyi zhen pa med pa nam mkha' lta bur gsal zhing thams cad la khyab pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2203: rig pa mtha' dang dbus med pa don rtogs pa la ma bcos par gnas pas //
NK103(pe)022:2204: nyams la 'di yin 'di min gyi mu matha'i phyogs dang bral //
NK103(pe)022:2205: mnyam pa chen po'i ngo bo phyogs thams cad dang
NK103(pe)022:2206: bral ba'i skyes bu rgyal ba dang dbyer med pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2207: phyogs gcig spang zhing mthun phyogs gcig bsgrub tu med
NK103(pe)022:2208: // phyogs su gtad pa med la zhen 'dzin dang bral bas khyal brdal chen po de la //
NK103(pe)022:2209: phyogs ris dang bsrung mtshams su nges pa'i chos ma yin pas phyal pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2210: bde gshegs te 'das pa dang sems can 'khor ba dang gnyis su bsdus pa thams cad la //
NK103(pe)022:2211: rgyu rkyen dang byed pa po gzhan gyis ma bcos
NK103(pe)022:2212: pa sems kyi rig par 'khor 'das thams cad gcig
NK103(pe)022:2214: rgyu yis ma bskyed de skad cig ma dang bral bas ye nas byung ba de la //
NK103(pe)022:2215: 'jig pa'i rkyen gyis ma sbyangs par chu yi chu bur ltar gdod nas dag /
NK103(pe)022:2216: ma nor bar rtogs pa'i ngang la rang sor bzhag
NK103(pe)022:2217: pa'i 'od gsal ba rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa de
NK103(pe)022:2218: la // sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dgongs pa thams cad tha mi dad pas 'dus te //
NK103(pe)022:2219: de cis na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2220: rang bzhag ma bcos pa'i dgongs pa gcig las med pas so //
NK103(pe)022:2221: sems nyid thams cad du rang snang yang de nyid
NK103(pe)022:2222: las gzhan du mi mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid gnas
NK103(pe)022:2223: lugs de rtogs pa'i ngang la //
NK103(pe)022:2224: bzhag thabs gsum gyis rang sor bzhag pa'i rig pa ma bcos pa de las mi 'da' na //
NK103(pe)022:2225: chos thams cad sems nyid las gzhan pa ma mthong nas gcig pu'i dam tshig yin ste //
NK103(pe)022:2226: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la yang //
NK103(pe)022:2227: dam dam tshig 'di las gzhan yong mi mnga' bas 'di la gnas par gyis shig pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2228: phyogs ris thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang byung
NK103(pe)022:2229: gi ye shes mthas ma bsgribs bas 'od gsal ba
NK103(pe)022:2230: la // lus dang ngag gi rang bzhin dang ched
NK103(pe)022:2231: du byas pa'i bya brtsal sna tshogs med de dgos
NK103(pe)022:2232: la // pa med pa'o // ting nge 'dzin sems
NK103(pe)022:2233: kyis sa lam kyi rim par rtsol ba dang bral
NK103(pe)022:2235: 'di ni 'bad rtsol gyi tshogs thams cad dang bral ba ste //
NK103(pe)022:2236: gyi na ji ltar bzhag kyang dgongs pa lhun gyis
NK103(pe)022:2237: grub pa las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig yin no
NK103(pe)022:2238: // chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)022:2239: las mi 'da' bas dam tshig ste gang gi rtsol
NK103(pe)022:2240: ba thams cad dang bral ba la //
NK103(pe)022:2241: ma rtogs par ched du brtsal ba'i 'dul sdom dam
NK103(pe)022:2242: tshig gsum gyi bsrung bya'i rtsol ba ye nas dngos
NK103(pe)022:2243: po la ma grub cing rtogs pa la'ang bral te
NK103(pe)022:2244: // de las gzhan pa'i sel med pa rin chen gling bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:2245: zhen 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rang byung ba de la //
NK103(pe)022:2246: spang bya mi mthun pa'i skyon gyi rang bzhin ni ngang gis dag /
NK103(pe)022:2247: gzhi phyi mo nas rtsa ba rang gi ngo bor dmigs pa med pa'i sems nyid la //
NK103(pe)022:2248: 'khrul pas brtags pa'i 'dzin pa rnam par dag pas gang gi yang sel med do //
NK103(pe)022:2249: gal te lhun grub 'od gsal dag pa'i chos nyid la //
NK103(pe)022:2250: rnam rtog gis brtags pa 'khrul pa'i sems bden par grub na //
NK103(pe)022:2251: phyin ci log bden pas mu stegs pa la sangs rgyas pas ci'i phyir la rtsod //
NK103(pe)022:2252: sangs rgyas dang sems can du rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir la gdags //
NK103(pe)022:2253: 'khrul pa'i rtog pa dngos po'i gnas lugs la nges par grub pa gcig yin //
NK103(pe)022:2254: man ngag rin chen rtogs pa'i tha ram 'grol ba'i 'phrul gyi lde mig gis //
NK103(pe)022:2255: tha mal pa'i 'khrul pa'i zhen pa bden pa de
NK103(pe)022:2256: ji ltar zlog tu btub des na dngos po la
NK103(pe)022:2257: ma grub bo // lhun grub mnyam pa'i dam tshig la bya brtsal thams cad bral //
NK103(pe)022:2258: ma brtsal bar lhun gyis grub par che ba'i yon
NK103(pe)022:2259: tan thams cad mthun par 'byung ba ni rin chen
NK103(pe)022:2261: gang rdzogs na gcig rdzogs te gang du rdzogs na rang gsal dag par rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)022:2262: gang rdzogs na chos ma lus pa kun rdzogs gang du rdzogs na rang byung sems la rdzogs //
NK103(pe)022:2263: des na gcig dang kun thams cad lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)022:2264: las shar bas de nyid kyi rnam par rdzogs pa
NK103(pe)022:2265: // des na rang byung gi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzogs pa che'o //
NK103(pe)022:2267: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK103(pe)022:2268: dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas sems
NK103(pe)022:2269: dpa' rdo rjes ston pa la 'og gi 'di skad
NK103(pe)022:2271: bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs lam pa dang 'khor ba rnams //
NK103(pe)022:2272: thog ma med pas dus nas sems nyid rin chen rtogs pa'i don dang bral //
NK103(pe)022:2273: sku gsum lhun grub tu gnas kyang nges pa'i gsal ba med pas khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams //
NK103(pe)022:2274: ston 'khor 'dzom pa'i dus 'dir rgyal ba thams cad
NK103(pe)022:2275: kyi rang bzhin rnam snang gi thugs rje'i byin rlabs
NK103(pe)022:2276: kyis // bdag cag rnams kun mkhyen ston pa khyod kyis 'khor du 'dus //
NK103(pe)022:2277: rtog pa thams cad sems su rang snang bar shes pa'i sa'i khyad par /
NK103(pe)022:2278: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa kun mkhyen pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2279: ston pa khyod kyis gsung du gsol zhes gsol pa
NK103(pe)022:2280: dang // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' brtsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:2281: ye shes kyi rang 'od rol pa'i sgra la sems ma yengs par rtse gcig tu gtod cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2282: rgyu rkyen las ma skyes par rang byung gi ye shes rtogs pa'i sems kyi sa //
NK103(pe)022:2283: ni ngo bo dmigs su med pas 'adi'o zhes brjod
NK103(pe)022:2284: pa'i tha snyad ming tshig la sogs pa kun bral
NK103(pe)022:2285: yang // dman pa'i blo yis brjod pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)022:2286: ji ltar rig pa'i don de gsung gi sgo nas bstan par bya ste //
NK103(pe)022:2287: gang gis kyang ma bcos par rig pa rang snang
NK103(pe)022:2288: che ba'i yon tan gong na med pas bla ma'i
NK103(pe)022:2290: sbyangs pas grub pa ma yin par ye nas rgyu rkyen gyis ma bskyed par grub //
NK103(pe)022:2291: chos thams cad rig pa rang byung phyogs 'dzin rnam
NK103(pe)022:2292: par dag pas gang yang spong len med pas kun
NK103(pe)022:2293: tu bzang po rten byed pas sa //
NK103(pe)022:2294: mnyam pa nyid du dbyer med pa che ba lngas mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyis sku'o //
NK103(pe)022:2295: sngags phyi nang gi rgyud sde drug dang theg chen
NK103(pe)022:2296: gyi mdo sde bla na med pa 'bras bu'i sa
NK103(pe)022:2298: ma chags pad+ma stug po bkod //
NK103(pe)022:2299: tshogs chen yi ge 'khor lo dang //
NK103(pe)022:2300: kun tu dbye ba med pa'i sa //
NK103(pe)022:2301: de ltar sa drug tu sems nyid la bgrangs pa yang //
NK103(pe)022:2302: ma bcos rdzogs pa chen po'i sa nyid //
NK103(pe)022:2303: rtogs pa'i yon tan gyi ldog cha nas drug tu bstan pa las //
NK103(pe)022:2304: ma bcos pa'i sa la rim par blo sbyangs pa med //
NK103(pe)022:2305: sems nyid 'od gsal gyi 'bras bu la lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyogs med chen po la //
NK103(pe)022:2306: sa yi rim pa'i gong 'og gang yang med //
NK103(pe)022:2307: rang byung gi rig pa rtogs par gyur na //
NK103(pe)022:2308: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin chen la
NK103(pe)022:2309: 'dod pa thams cad lhun gyis grub pa ltar du
NK103(pe)022:2310: // sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad sems las yongs su rdzogs par byung ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)022:2311: thams cad du rang snang ba ni rang byung byang chub sems kyi sa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2312: dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni //
NK103(pe)022:2313: phyogs 'dzin las grol bas rtog pa ma yin rol
NK103(pe)022:2314: pa cir yang mi 'gag pas mi rtog pa yang
NK103(pe)022:2315: min // phyogs zhen gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin no //
NK103(pe)022:2316: gang la'ang gnas pa med ji ltar snang yang 'dzin pa dang bral ba dang rig pa'i gnas //
NK103(pe)022:2317: skyon gang yang ma spangs par kun bral ba rig
NK103(pe)022:2318: pa'i rang 'od ma sgribs gsal bar ye nas gnas
NK103(pe)022:2319: // phyogs gcig par mi gnas la phyogs kun gyi
NK103(pe)022:2320: dngos gzhir gnas pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK103(pe)022:2321: sa la tha dad ma grub pas //
NK103(pe)022:2322: skal ldan dang po lam la 'jug pa nas //
NK103(pe)022:2323: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i sa la mtho dman gyi khyad par mi 'dra ba med do //
NK103(pe)022:2324: bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa dag pas kun la
NK103(pe)022:2325: khyab pa'i thugs rje'i rang bzhin mnyam pa yin te
NK103(pe)022:2326: // ji ltar brtags pa'i rtog pa de'i rang bzhin sems su dbyer med par gcig /
NK103(pe)022:2327: ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blo yis sna tshogs su g.yos par gyur kyang //
NK103(pe)022:2328: rang byung gi 'od kyis kun gsal ba'i chos nyid
NK103(pe)022:2329: la dus dang rnam pa thams cad du 'gyur ba
NK103(pe)022:2330: med // de ltar 'gyur med du rtogs pa'i ngang la ma bcos par rang lugs su bzhag ste //
NK103(pe)022:2331: de'ang rtogs dpyod kyis ma dpyad pa'i sems kyis btang snyoms gyis nar gnas //
NK103(pe)022:2332: dbang po drug gi snang yul la gang snang ba rnams //
NK103(pe)022:2333: rang byung gi ye shes kyis rang 'od du tshogs drug kun la gsal bas kun tu 'od //
NK103(pe)022:2334: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs bkra bar gsal ba
NK103(pe)022:2335: ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor te de la brten nas
NK103(pe)022:2336: // 'od gsal rang byung gi don mtshon pas ngo mtshar che'o //
NK103(pe)022:2337: brjod pa kun dang bral ba nyid brjod pa sgra
NK103(pe)022:2338: yi dkyil 'khor zin pa dang ma zin par gnyis
NK103(pe)022:2340: rna ba'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)022:2341: rang bzhin med pa nyid dri zhim pa dang nga
NK103(pe)022:2342: ba de las gzhan pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dag
NK103(pe)022:2344: de nyid ye shes su gsal ba'i rang byung gi sems so //
NK103(pe)022:2345: ma bcos pa nyid mu kha ni lce ste ro
NK103(pe)022:2346: drug tu shar ba yi dkyil 'khor la myangs pa
NK103(pe)022:2347: las // lce ma bcos pa yi ye shes 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o //
NK103(pe)022:2348: lus shes la gsal ba'i reg bya 'jam rtsub lci
NK103(pe)022:2349: yang grang bkres skom la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du
NK103(pe)022:2350: shar ba las // rtogs pa'i shes rab chen pos lus kyi rang byung gi ye shes gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2351: rig ma rig rtog mi rtog zhen ma zhen nyams
NK103(pe)022:2352: su ye shes su 'dzin pa'i dran rig sna tshogs
NK103(pe)022:2353: pa kun de las byung zhing de nyid du 'dus
NK103(pe)022:2355: ye shes thugs kyi rig pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)022:2356: de dag ni rang bzhin gyis bde ba chen po
NK103(pe)022:2357: yang yin la dkyil 'khor yin te grangs drug go
NK103(pe)022:2358: // thams cad kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2359: rdo rje dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pa'i don
NK103(pe)022:2360: // la // rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi dus gsum
NK103(pe)022:2361: du mi 'bral bar 'dzin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2362: // la // sa'o // thams cad bdag nyid chen
NK103(pe)022:2363: po la 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzung ba'i yul la
NK103(pe)022:2365: kun mkhyen kyang zhen 'dzin gyi dri ma dang bral bas na ma bcos pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2366: ma chags pad+ma spyan gyi sa //
NK103(pe)022:2368: rang nyid chen por gsal la ma bsdus par kun 'dus pas //
NK103(pe)022:2369: tshogs chen dkyil 'khor yi ge'i sa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2370: sangs rgyas thams cad dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i sems nyid kyi cha la stug po bkod pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2371: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyi sa de la //
NK103(pe)022:2372: rgyu snang ba dbyings dang 'bras bu dran rtog gi
NK103(pe)022:2373: ye shes du dbyer med pa la blang dor med
NK103(pe)022:2374: pas // kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i sa zhes kyang bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:2375: gang la yang ma sbyangs pa'i sems nyid kyi sa dag la //
NK103(pe)022:2376: theg brgyad rtsol ba'i sa rnams ma lus pa thams cad 'di las byung zhing 'dus pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2377: rtsol bas ched du sbyangs pa'i theg brgyad kyi sa
NK103(pe)022:2378: rnams thams cad ni ngo bo dang rtogs pa la
NK103(pe)022:2379: / sbyangs pa grub pa med pa'i sa yin pa
NK103(pe)022:2380: la brtsol bas sbyangs pas na rang gi 'dod pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2381: / // bsam pas bzhag pa yin ste rang bzhin gyis de las log pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2382: mthar thug gi sa ma yin te rang gi zhe 'dod kyi sa 'o //
NK103(pe)022:2383: des na ma bcos rdzogs pa'i sa //
NK103(pe)022:2384: rang byung lhun rdzogs khyad par snang //
NK103(pe)022:2385: sa yi khyad par ci bstan kyang //
NK103(pe)022:2386: ma bcos rdzogs pa'i sa la 'dus //
NK103(pe)022:2387: tshig bzhi po 'di 'grel pa na gsal lo //
NK103(pe)022:2390: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las sa bstan pa'i le'u
NK103(pe)022:2391: ste dgu pa'o////de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes bde bar
NK103(pe)022:2392: gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:2393: phyogs ris med pas thugs rje'i ma lus pa thams
NK103(pe)022:2394: cad mnga' ba'i bdag po 'gro ba ma lus pa
NK103(pe)022:2395: skyob pa yis // gzhi lam 'bras bu'i don blos bsam gyis mi khyab chen po'i sa //
NK103(pe)022:2396: kun gyi thun mong min pas gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i theg pa khyod kyis gsungs pa 'di //
NK103(pe)022:2397: ma 'ongs dus na ji ltar 'byung ba bshad du gsol //
NK103(pe)022:2398: zhes pa'i tshig ston pa la gsol pa dang /
NK103(pe)022:2399: de'i lan de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa ni //
NK103(pe)022:2400: rtsol ba'i chu bo rnams dang bral ba gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:2401: mthar thug theg pa'i rgyud 'di dgongs pa rnams kyis
NK103(pe)022:2402: nges brgyud nas // lha'i gnas ri rab ri'i rtse mo /
NK103(pe)022:2404: yang na rtsa gsum dga' ldan 'og min /
NK103(pe)022:2405: gsum du grags par gyur pa de nas //
NK103(pe)022:2406: sprul pa'i sku las yang sprul pa'i gang zag dga'
NK103(pe)022:2407: rab rdo rje gsang bdag gi thugs kyi sras kyis
NK103(pe)022:2408: thugs kyi sras bdun la gnang ba ste /
NK103(pe)022:2409: ri rab kyi lho shing 'dzam bu yod pa'i gling
NK103(pe)022:2410: gi rgya gar gyi dbus su bstan pa rgyas par
NK103(pe)022:2411: byed // gang la rgyal ba'i gdung tshob cing rgyud
NK103(pe)022:2412: 'dzin pas sras gsang ba'i mthar thug snod dang ldan
NK103(pe)022:2413: byed // pa la // dgongs rig rna bar brgyud
NK103(pe)022:2414: nas don rig pa'i gsang sngags a ti nyid kyi
NK103(pe)022:2415: byed // pa la // don de // med la snang bas /
NK103(pe)022:2416: gang ltar 'phrul tshig ste gcig gis don mtha' yas rig pa'i sgo nas bstan pa yis //

NK103(pe)022:2474: kyi dang // 'khrul snang dag / pa'i blo //
