NK103(pe)022:2706: kyi ye shes rang gsal chen po bla dgas rang
NK103(pe)022:2708: thams cad dgos ched kyis sangs rgyas ming du btags
NK103(pe)022:2709: pa tsam las med pa de sgra la nges par
NK103(pe)022:2710: 'dzin pa'i gnyen por che bar bshad do //
NK103(pe)022:2711: dus gsum du mi 'gyur bas des thams cad la
NK103(pe)022:2712: gdal zhing khyab pa rang rig pa'i pho brang na
NK103(pe)022:2713: // lhan skyes dang gnyen po cis kyang mi bskyod
NK103(pe)022:2714: pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyid che ba ste dbyings
NK103(pe)022:2715: dang ye shes dang po 'du ba dang tha ma
NK103(pe)022:2716: 'bral ba gnyis med pas rdo rje nyid //
NK103(pe)022:2717: phyi yul dang nang shes par grub pa med pa'i gsal khyab kyi sems la //
NK103(pe)022:2718: yul shes phyi nang gsang ba'i sgo phugs med pa'i sems nyid du gsal ba la //
NK103(pe)022:2719: yul dang dbang po'i zhen 'dzin gdod nas rnam par dag pas //
NK103(pe)022:2720: rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'jil ba'i gnyen po gzugs kyi sku med pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:2721: gnyis med kyi rdo rje rang gsal bas sems dpa' mi 'gyur khyad par 'phags pas che //
NK103(pe)022:2722: phyogs med kyi ye shes nam mkha' ltar du gsal
NK103(pe)022:2723: la khyab pas kun tu bzang po'i ngo ma blos
NK103(pe)022:2724: bsam du med pa'i chos nyid kyi nam mkha' gsal
NK103(pe)022:2726: rtogs pa'i don yul sems cir yang mi dgongs pa'i chos nyid kyi ngang //
NK103(pe)022:2727: las goms pas mi 'da' bas phyag rgya las 'gyur
NK103(pe)022:2728: ba med pa'i sems nyid la sgo gsum gyis ched
NK103(pe)022:2729: du // mi rtsol zhing mu mtha' kun dang bral bas dbu ma chen po'i lam ni //
NK103(pe)022:2730: nam mkha' ltar du shes bya kun la khyab pa'i bde chen po de la skyed pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:2731: rgyu dang ltos pa'i 'bras bu gnyis med pas snga phyi med par ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)022:2733: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las rig pa'i ye shes
NK103(pe)022:2734: la thig le dang che ba rdzogs par bstan pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2735: le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////rgyud don bstan pa de nas
NK103(pe)022:2736: gang gi zhus sems dpa' rdo rjes gang la zhus
NK103(pe)022:2737: de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan grangs zhu ba'i tshig
NK103(pe)022:2738: 'di ji ltar zhus skad ces gsol to //
NK103(pe)022:2739: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag
NK103(pe)022:2740: pas kun tu bzang po mngon du mdzad pa'i ye
NK103(pe)022:2741: shes thugs thams cad mkhyen pa'i //
NK103(pe)022:2742: rgyal ba'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bde ba ni
NK103(pe)022:2743: bde ba gzhan las mchog ste brjod pa dang bral
NK103(pe)022:2744: ba'i gsung nyid smra brjod thams cad du ma 'gags
NK103(pe)022:2745: pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i mnga' ba'i bdag po //
NK103(pe)022:2746: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bya btsal med par
NK103(pe)022:2747: lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi rol pa ci
NK103(pe)022:2748: yang mi 'gag par shar ba'i sku //
NK103(pe)022:2749: rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje
NK103(pe)022:2750: gsum du bshad pa ltar mchog tu gyur pa de
NK103(pe)022:2751: la // bdag cag ji snyed 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
NK103(pe)022:2752: rnams rtogs pa dang mos pas 'dud cing phyag 'tshal
NK103(pe)022:2753: la // nas // rtsol ba mtha' dag dang bral ba'i ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud 'di //
NK103(pe)022:2754: chos nyid kyi don zhen drug log gsum rtsol brgyad
NK103(pe)022:2755: la gsang ba skal ldan gyis tshig gi sgo nas
NK103(pe)022:2756: rtogs pa 'i ched du khyod kyis gsungs //
NK103(pe)022:2758: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ji lta bar ston
NK103(pe)022:2759: pa'i rgyud 'di'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs du mchis ji
NK103(pe)022:2762: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa //
NK103(pe)022:2763: rtogs dka' bas gsang ba tshang zhing 'brel bas rgyud
NK103(pe)022:2764: theg pa thams cad kyi shes sgrub kyi bcud 'dus
NK103(pe)022:2765: pa'i snying po 'di'i mtshan grangs ni //
NK103(pe)022:2766: nyon mongs zhen pa'i phreng thag gcod pa zhes kyang
NK103(pe)022:2767: bya chos rnams gsal ba'i ye shes sgron ma zhes
NK103(pe)022:2768: kyang bya // kun tu bzang po rig pa'i thugs dang //
NK103(pe)022:2769: bde chen mdzes pa'i ye shes rgyan dang //
NK103(pe)022:2770: gsal ba'i ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud //
NK103(pe)022:2771: 'di la mtha' dbus ma mchis pas //
NK103(pe)022:2772: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud dang //
NK103(pe)022:2773: kun 'dus mnyam pa chen po zhes bya ba yang yin //
NK103(pe)022:2774: gsang ba kun 'dus rig pa'i gter ces kyang bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:2775: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rgyu rkyen med pas
NK103(pe)022:2776: rang byung gdod nas ma bsgribs pas 'od gsal ma
NK103(pe)022:2777: bcos pa'i bdag nyid chen po la //
NK103(pe)022:2778: rang bzhin dang ched du byas pa dang ltos pas zhen pa'i brtags pa dang gdod ma nas bral //
NK103(pe)022:2779: de kho na nyid ma bcos pa rang bzhin gyi
NK103(pe)022:2780: snang ba de thabs kyis ji lta bar rtogs pa
NK103(pe)022:2781: na // nyon mongs zhen cing 'dzin pa'i phreng thag gcod pa zhes so //
NK103(pe)022:2782: chos rnams thams cad byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pas na //
NK103(pe)022:2783: sems nyid las gzhan pa med cing de nyid rang
NK103(pe)022:2784: gsal ji lta bar ston pa'i ye shes kyi sgron
NK103(pe)022:2785: ma'o // ngo bo dang rtogs pa la cis kyang
NK103(pe)022:2786: mi 'gyur skyes pas rang byung zhing ma brtsal bar
NK103(pe)022:2787: ma'o // lhun grub 'di // 'khrul grol ji ltar
NK103(pe)022:2788: gnas kyang snying po'i don la 'da' mi srid pas
NK103(pe)022:2790: phyin ci log tu zhen cing 'khrul pa'i dbang gis cir yang gyur kyang //
NK103(pe)022:2791: rang bzhin nyid ni rang gsal gyi ye shes las
NK103(pe)022:2792: gzhan pa'i spang bya mi dmigs pas kun tu bzang
NK103(pe)022:2793: po // rang gi rig pa rtog pa'i bsam pa dang bral ba'i rgyal ba'i thugs //
NK103(pe)022:2794: mu bzhi'i phyogs ris med pa'i btang snyoms chen po yin pa la //
NK103(pe)022:2795: ched du byas pa'i rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde //
NK103(pe)022:2796: bde ba chen po ni bde sdug gi mtshan nyid kyi mtha' rnams kun las 'das pa de //
NK103(pe)022:2797: 'khor 'das kyi rol pa kun gyi 'byung gnas su lhun gyis grub pas phyogs ris las che //
NK103(pe)022:2798: gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i rang gsal ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid rgyal ba'i //
NK103(pe)022:2799: sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes rang snang du mdzes pa ni phan tshun las grol ba'i rgyan //
NK103(pe)022:2800: yul shes gnyis med par rang gsal ba'i ye shes
NK103(pe)022:2801: thun mong gi bde ba thams cad las grol te
NK103(pe)022:2802: tshor ba las 'das pas bde chen nyid rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2804: rnal 'byor bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dgyes pa dbyer med pa'i rgyan ces kyang bya'o //
NK103(pe)022:2805: yod med gang du'ang bsam du med pa'i nam mkha' la mtha' dang bral ba ltar du //
NK103(pe)022:2806: byang chub kyi sems lhun grub gsum la mu bzhi'i
NK103(pe)022:2807: mtha' dang de la ltos pa'i dbus su grub pa
NK103(pe)022:2808: med // bskal pa chags shing zhig kyang mi 'gyur bar nam mkha' brtan pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)022:2809: sems nyid ye gsal la skad cig dang rgyun gyis 'gyur ba gang yang med pas g.yu drung ngo //
NK103(pe)022:2810: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su btubs te 'ub chub pas //
NK103(pe)022:2811: ma lus pa thams cad kun byang chub kyi sems
NK103(pe)022:2812: su ye nas 'dus pas rtsol ba med par lhun
NK103(pe)022:2814: gdod nas rang gsal ba'i ye shes la bzang ngan spang len med pas kun tu bzang //
NK103(pe)022:2815: snang ba snod srid pa bcud 'khor ba'i ngo bo de nyid dang //
NK103(pe)022:2816: rang gzhan nam snod bcud gnyis med pa'i rgyal ba'i dgongs pa phyogs ris med pa dag mnyam //
NK103(pe)022:2817: gang du mnyam na rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal mu
NK103(pe)022:2818: matha'i phyogs ris btang nas phyogs med du snyoms pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2819: gnas lugs chen por mnyam mo //
NK103(pe)022:2820: bstan pa'i 'byung gnas theg pa'i yang rtser gyur pas
NK103(pe)022:2821: bstan pa'i shes bya dang bsgrub bya'i bcud kun 'dus
NK103(pe)022:2822: thun mong ma yin pa'i don mtshan pas gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)022:2823: thabs // rtogs dka' bas gsang ba med la mi
NK103(pe)022:2824: zad pas mdzod rang gsal bas rig pa thugs kyi
NK103(pe)022:2825: thabs // gter // nam mkhas go phye nas snang
NK103(pe)022:2826: srid gsal ba ltar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i
NK103(pe)022:2827: spyi'i don 'grel ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud ston pas
NK103(pe)022:2828: thams cad mkhyen pa'am lo tsa ba'i tshig yin pas
NK103(pe)022:2830: gu lang lung sul gi gser las byas pa'i zo ba ru //
NK103(pe)022:2831: seng ge'i dkar mo 'o ma blugs pas bcud du gyur pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)022:2832: rang gi snying gi dkyil du nyams su len pas btsa' bar gyis //
NK103(pe)022:2833: srog dang bral ba'i ro kha bzhin skal med la bsdoms //
NK103(pe)022:2834: bstan pa'i yang snying 'di rang gi snying ltar du gces spras su zung //
NK103(pe)022:2835: glegs bam gter du sba ba'i gnas ni brag brkos
NK103(pe)022:2836: pa'i gting dang chu'i gting byug pa'i rdzas kyis mi
NK103(pe)022:2837: nyams par byas la bzhag go //
NK103(pe)022:2838: de skad ces ston pas gsungs so //
NK103(pe)022:2839: ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las mtshan gyi rnam grangs
NK103(pe)022:2840: bdun dang bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////rdzogs so
NK103(pe)022:2841: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+ri sing+ha pra ba ta dang /
NK103(pe)022:2842: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa
NK103(pe)022:2843: nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing
NK103(pe)022:2844: bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)022:2846: mkhas pa'i 'grel pa la brten nas rang blos dpyad de rtsa rgyud kyi /
NK103(pe)022:2847: mchan bu legs par btab pa yin /
NK103(pe)022:2848: dge bas 'gro ba ma lus pa //
